BioLib  1.8.0
A .NET library & program for annotating, editing various microscopy imaging formats using Bioformats supported images. Including whole slide, pyramidal, and series.

1using AForge;
2using AForge.Imaging;

28namespace BioLib
29{
30 /* A class declaration. */
31 public static class Images
32 {
33 public static List<BioImage> images = new List<BioImage>();
43 public static BioImage GetImage(string ids)
44 {
45 for (int i = 0; i < images.Count; i++)
46 {
47 if (images[i].ID == ids || images[i].file == ids)
48 return images[i];
49 }
50 return null;
51 }
52
67 public static void AddImage(BioImage im, bool newtab)
68 {
69 if (images.Contains(im)) return;
70 im.Filename = GetImageName(im.ID);
71 im.ID = im.Filename;
72 images.Add(im);
73
74 //App.Image = im;
75 //NodeView.viewer.AddTab(im);
76 }
77
86 public static int GetImageCountByName(string s)
87 {
88 int i = 0;
89 string name = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(s);
90 for (int im = 0; im < images.Count; im++)
91 {
92 if (images[im].ID == s)
93 i++;
94 }
95 return i;
96 }
97
106 public static string GetImageName(string s)
107 {
108 //Here we create a unique ID for an image.
109 int i = Images.GetImageCountByName(s);
110 if (i == 0)
111 return Path.GetFileName(s);
112 string name = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(s);
113 string ext = Path.GetExtension(s);
114 int sti = name.LastIndexOf("-");
115 if (sti == -1)
116 {
117 return name + "-" + i + ext;
118
119 }
120 else
121 {
122 string stb = name.Substring(0, sti);
123 string sta = name.Substring(sti + 1, name.Length - sti - 1);
124 int ind;
125 if (int.TryParse(sta, out ind))
126 {
127 return stb + "-" + (ind + 1).ToString() + ext;
128 }
129 else
130 return name + "-" + i + ext;
131 }
132 }
133
141 public static void RemoveImage(BioImage im)
142 {
143 RemoveImage(im.ID);
144 }
145
155 public static void RemoveImage(string id)
156 {
157 BioImage im = GetImage(id);
158 if (im == null)
159 return;
160 images.Remove(im);
161 im.Dispose();
162 im = null;
163 }
164
173 public static void UpdateImage(BioImage im)
174 {
175 for (int i = 0; i < images.Count; i++)
176 {
177 if (images[i].ID == im.ID)
178 {
179 images[i] = im;
180 return;
181 }
182 }
183 }
184 }
185
186 /* A struct that is used to store the resolution of an image. */
187 public struct Resolution
188 {
189 int x;
190 int y;
191 PixelFormat format;
192 double px, py, pz, sx, sy, sz;
193 public int SizeX
194 {
195 get { return x; }
196 set { x = value; }
197 }
198 public int SizeY
199 {
200 get { return y; }
201 set { y = value; }
202 }
203 public double PhysicalSizeX
204 {
205 get { return px; }
206 set { px = value; }
207 }
208 public double PhysicalSizeY
209 {
210 get { return py; }
211 set { py = value; }
212 }
213 public double PhysicalSizeZ
214 {
215 get { return pz; }
216 set { pz = value; }
217 }
218 public double StageSizeX
219 {
220 get { return sx; }
221 set { sx = value; }
222 }
223 public double StageSizeY
224 {
225 get { return sy; }
226 set { sy = value; }
227 }
228 public double StageSizeZ
229 {
230 get { return sz; }
231 set { sz = value; }
232 }
233 public double VolumeWidth
234 {
235 get
236 {
237 return PhysicalSizeX * SizeX;
238 }
239 }
240 public double VolumeHeight
241 {
242 get
243 {
244 return PhysicalSizeY * SizeY;
245 }
246 }
247 public PixelFormat PixelFormat
248 {
249 get { return format; }
250 set { format = value; }
251 }
252 public int RGBChannelsCount
253 {
254 get
255 {
256 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
257 return 1;
258 else if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
259 return 3;
260 else
261 return 4;
262 }
263 }
264 /* The above code is defining a property called "SizeInBytes" in C#. This property returns the
265 size of an image in bytes based on its pixel format. */
266 public long SizeInBytes
267 {
268 get
269 {
270 if (format == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
271 return (long)y * (long)x;
272 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
273 return (long)y * (long)x * 2;
274 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
275 return (long)y * (long)x * 3;
276 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb || format == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
277 return (long)y * (long)x * 4;
278 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb || format == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
279 return (long)y * (long)x * 6;
280 throw new NotSupportedException(format + " is not supported.");
281 }
282 }
283 /* The above code is defining a constructor for a class called "Resolution". The constructor
284 takes in several parameters including the width and height of an image, the number of pixels
285 per unit of physical measurement, the number of bits per pixel, the physical dimensions of
286 the image, and the stage dimensions of the image. The constructor assigns these values to
287 the corresponding properties of the class. */
288 public Resolution(int w, int h, int omePx, int bitsPerPixel, double physX, double physY, double physZ, double stageX, double stageY, double stageZ)
289 {
290 x = w;
291 y = h;
292 sx = stageX;
293 sy = stageY;
294 sz = stageZ;
295 format = BioImage.GetPixelFormat(omePx, bitsPerPixel);
296 px = physX;
297 py = physY;
298 pz = physZ;
299 }
300 /* The above code is defining a constructor for a class called "Resolution". The constructor
301 takes in several parameters including width (w), height (h), pixel format (f), physical
302 dimensions (physX, physY, physZ), and stage dimensions (stageX, stageY, stageZ). The
303 constructor assigns the parameter values to corresponding class variables. */
304 public Resolution(int w, int h, PixelFormat f, double physX, double physY, double physZ, double stageX, double stageY, double stageZ)
305 {
306 x = w;
307 y = h;
308 format = f;
309 sx = stageX;
310 sy = stageY;
311 sz = stageZ;
312 px = physX;
313 py = physY;
314 pz = physZ;
315 }
316 public Resolution Copy()
317 {
318 return new Resolution(x, y, format, px, py, pz, sx, sy, sz);
319 }
320 public override string ToString()
321 {
322 return "(" + x + ", " + y + ") " + format.ToString() + " " + (SizeInBytes / 1000) + " KB";
323 }
324 }
325 /* Declaring a struct named RectangleD. */
326 public struct RectangleD
327 {
328 private double x;
329 private double y;
330 private double w;
331 private double h;
332 public double X { get { return x; } set { x = value; } }
333 public double Y { get { return y; } set { y = value; } }
334 public double W { get { return w; } set { w = value; } }
335 public double H { get { return h; } set { h = value; } }
336
337 /* The above code is defining a constructor for a class called RectangleD in C#. The
338 constructor takes four parameters: X, Y, W, and H, which represent the x-coordinate,
339 y-coordinate, width, and height of the rectangle, respectively. Inside the constructor, the
340 values of these parameters are assigned to the corresponding instance variables x, y, w, and
341 h. */
342 public RectangleD(double X, double Y, double W, double H)
343 {
344 x = X;
345 y = Y;
346 w = W;
347 h = H;
348 }
357 public Rectangle ToRectangleInt()
358 {
359 return new Rectangle((int)X, (int)Y, (int)W, (int)H);
360 }
361
373 public bool IntersectsWith(RectangleD rect1)
374 {
375 if (rect1.X + rect1.W < X || X + W < rect1.X ||
376 rect1.Y + rect1.H < Y || Y + H < rect1.Y)
377 {
378 return false;
379 }
380 return true;
381 }
382
392 public bool IntersectsWith(PointD p)
393 {
394 return IntersectsWith(p.X, p.Y);
395 }
396
408 public bool IntersectsWith(double x, double y)
409 {
410 if (X <= x && (X + W) >= x && Y <= y && (Y + H) >= y)
411 return true;
412 else
413 return false;
414 }
415
423 public RectangleF ToRectangleF()
424 {
425 return new RectangleF((float)X, (float)Y, (float)W, (float)H);
426 }
427
438 public override string ToString()
439 {
440 double w = Math.Round(W, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
441 double h = Math.Round(H, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
442 double x = Math.Round(X, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
443 double y = Math.Round(Y, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
444 return x + ", " + y + ", " + w + ", " + h;
445 }
446
447 }
448
449 /* The ROI class is a class that contains a list of points, a bounding box, and a type */
450 public class ROI
451 {
452 /* Defining an enum. */
453 public enum Type
454 {
455 Rectangle,
456 Point,
457 Line,
458 Polygon,
459 Polyline,
460 Freeform,
461 Ellipse,
462 Label
463 }
464 /* A property of a class. */
465 public PointD Point
466 {
467 get
468 {
469 if (Points.Count == 0)
470 return new PointD(0, 0);
471 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Ellipse || type == Type.Label || type == Type.Freeform)
472 return new PointD(BoundingBox.X, BoundingBox.Y);
473 return Points[0];
474 }
475 set
476 {
477 if (Points.Count == 0)
478 {
479 AddPoint(value);
480 }
481 else
482 UpdatePoint(value, 0);
483 UpdateBoundingBox();
484 }
485 }
486 /* The above code is defining a property called "Rect" of type "RectangleD". */
487 public RectangleD Rect
488 {
489 get
490 {
491 if (Points.Count == 0)
492 return new RectangleD(0, 0, 0, 0);
493 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Polyline || type == Type.Polygon || type == Type.Freeform || type == Type.Label)
494 return BoundingBox;
495 if (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse)
496 return new RectangleD(Points[0].X, Points[0].Y, Points[1].X - Points[0].X, Points[2].Y - Points[0].Y);
497 else
498 return new RectangleD(Points[0].X, Points[0].Y, 1, 1);
499 }
500 set
501 {
502 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Polyline || type == Type.Polygon || type == Type.Freeform)
503 {
504 BoundingBox = value;
505 }
506 else
507 if (Points.Count < 4 && (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse))
508 {
509 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X, value.Y));
510 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y));
511 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X, value.Y + value.H));
512 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y + value.H));
513 }
514 else
515 if (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse)
516 {
517 Points[0] = new PointD(value.X, value.Y);
518 Points[1] = new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y);
519 Points[2] = new PointD(value.X, value.Y + value.H);
520 Points[3] = new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y + value.H);
521 }
522 UpdateBoundingBox();
523 }
524 }
525 public double X
526 {
527 get
528 {
529 return Point.X;
530 }
531 set
532 {
533 Rect = new RectangleD(value, Y, W, H);
534 }
535 }
536 public double Y
537 {
538 get
539 {
540 return Point.Y;
541 }
542 set
543 {
544 Rect = new RectangleD(X, value, W, H);
545 }
546 }
547 public double W
548 {
549 get
550 {
551 if (type == Type.Point)
552 return strokeWidth;
553 else
554 return BoundingBox.W;
555 }
556 set
557 {
558 Rect = new RectangleD(X, Y, value, H);
559 }
560 }
561 public double H
562 {
563 get
564 {
565 if (type == Type.Point)
566 return strokeWidth;
567 else
568 return BoundingBox.H;
569 }
570 set
571 {
572 Rect = new RectangleD(X, Y, W, value);
573 }
574 }
575 public int Resolution
576 {
577 get { return resolution; }
578 set { resolution = value; }
579 }
580 public enum CoordinateSystem
581 {
582 pixel,
583 micron
584 }
585 public Type type;
586 public static float selectBoxSize = 8f;
587 private List<PointD> Points = new List<PointD>();
588 public List<PointD> PointsD
589 {
590 get
591 {
592 return Points;
593 }
594 }
606 public PointD[] ImagePoints(Resolution res)
607 {
608 return BioImage.ToImageSpace(PointsD,(int)res.StageSizeX, (int)res.StageSizeY, (int)res.PhysicalSizeX, (int)res.PhysicalSizeY);
609 }
610 private List<RectangleD> selectBoxs = new List<RectangleD>();
611 public List<int> selectedPoints = new List<int>();
612 public RectangleD BoundingBox;
613 public float fontSize = 12;
614 public Cairo.FontSlant slant;
615 public Cairo.FontWeight weight;
616 public string family = "Times New Roman";
617 public ZCT coord;
618 public Color strokeColor;
619 public Color fillColor;
620 public bool isFilled = false;
621 public string id = "";
622 public string roiID = "";
623 public string roiName = "";
624 public string properties = "";
625 public int serie = 0;
626 private string text = "";
627 private int resolution = 0;
628 public double strokeWidth = 1;
629 public int shapeIndex = 0;
630 public bool closed = false;
631 public bool selected = false;
632 public bool subPixel = false;
633
634 /*
635 public Size TextSize
636 {
637 get
638 {
639 return TextRenderer.MeasureText(text, font);
640 }
641 }
642 */
649 public ROI Copy()
650 {
651 ROI copy = new ROI();
652 copy.id = id;
653 copy.roiID = roiID;
654 copy.roiName = roiName;
655 copy.text = text;
656 copy.strokeWidth = strokeWidth;
657 copy.strokeColor = strokeColor;
658 copy.fillColor = fillColor;
659 copy.Points = Points;
660 copy.selected = selected;
661 copy.shapeIndex = shapeIndex;
662 copy.closed = closed;
663 copy.family = family;
664 copy.fontSize = fontSize;
665 copy.slant = slant;
666 copy.selectBoxs = selectBoxs;
667 copy.BoundingBox = BoundingBox;
668 copy.isFilled = isFilled;
669 copy.coord = coord;
670 copy.selectedPoints = selectedPoints;
671
672 return copy;
673 }
683 public ROI Copy(ZCT cord)
684 {
685 ROI copy = new ROI();
686 copy.type = type;
687 copy.id = id;
688 copy.roiID = roiID;
689 copy.roiName = roiName;
690 copy.text = text;
691 copy.strokeWidth = strokeWidth;
692 copy.strokeColor = strokeColor;
693 copy.fillColor = fillColor;
694 copy.Points.AddRange(Points);
695 copy.selected = selected;
696 copy.shapeIndex = shapeIndex;
697 copy.closed = closed;
698 copy.family = family;
699 copy.fontSize = fontSize;
700 copy.slant = slant;
701 copy.selectBoxs.AddRange(selectBoxs);
702 copy.BoundingBox = BoundingBox;
703 copy.isFilled = isFilled;
704 copy.coord = cord;
705 copy.selectedPoints = selectedPoints;
706 return copy;
707 }
708 public string Text
709 {
710 get
711 {
712 return text;
713 }
714 set
715 {
716 text = value;
717 if (type == Type.Label)
718 {
719 UpdateBoundingBox();
720 }
721 }
722 }
723
733 public RectangleD GetSelectBound(double scale)
734 {
735 double f = scale / 2;
736 return new RectangleD(BoundingBox.X - f, BoundingBox.Y - f, BoundingBox.W + scale, BoundingBox.H + scale);
737 }
738 /* The above code is defining a constructor for a class called ROI. The constructor initializes
739 the coord variable with a new instance of the ZCT class, passing in the values 0, 0, and 0
740 as parameters. It also sets the strokeColor variable to the Color.Yellow value.
741 Additionally, it creates a new instance of the RectangleD class, passing in the values 0, 0,
742 1, and 1 as parameters, and assigns it to the BoundingBox variable. */
743 public ROI()
744 {
745 coord = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
746 strokeColor = Color.Yellow;
747 BoundingBox = new RectangleD(0, 0, 1, 1);
748 }
749
758 public RectangleD[] GetSelectBoxes(double s)
759 {
760 double f = s / 2;
761 selectBoxs.Clear();
762 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
763 {
764 selectBoxs.Add(new RectangleD((float)(Points[i].X - f), (float)(Points[i].Y - f), (float)s, (float)s));
765 }
766 return selectBoxs.ToArray();
767 }
768
782 public static ROI CreatePoint(ZCT coord, double x, double y)
783 {
784 ROI an = new ROI();
785 an.coord = coord;
786 an.AddPoint(new PointD(x, y));
787 an.type = Type.Point;
788 //Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreatePoint(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), " + x + "," + y + ");");
789 return an;
790 }
791
808 public static ROI CreateLine(ZCT coord, PointD x1, PointD x2)
809 {
810 ROI an = new ROI();
811 an.coord = coord;
812 an.type = Type.Line;
813 an.AddPoint(x1);
814 an.AddPoint(x2);
815 //Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreateLine(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), new PointD(" + x1.X + "," + x1.Y + "), new PointD(" + x2.X + "," + x2.Y + "));");
816 return an;
817 }
818
834 public static ROI CreateRectangle(ZCT coord, double x, double y, double w, double h)
835 {
836 ROI an = new ROI();
837 an.coord = coord;
838 an.type = Type.Rectangle;
839 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
840 //Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreateRectangle(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), new RectangleD(" + x + "," + y + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
841 return an;
842 }
843
859 public static ROI CreateEllipse(ZCT coord, double x, double y, double w, double h)
860 {
861 ROI an = new ROI();
862 an.coord = coord;
863 an.type = Type.Ellipse;
864 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
865 //Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreateEllipse(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), new RectangleD(" + x + "," + y + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
866 return an;
867 }
868
881 public static ROI CreatePolygon(ZCT coord, PointD[] pts)
882 {
883 ROI an = new ROI();
884 an.coord = coord;
885 an.type = Type.Polygon;
886 an.AddPoints(pts);
887 an.closed = true;
888 return an;
889 }
890
904 public static ROI CreateFreeform(ZCT coord, PointD[] pts)
905 {
906 ROI an = new ROI();
907 an.coord = coord;
908 an.type = Type.Freeform;
909 an.AddPoints(pts);
910 an.closed = true;
911 return an;
912 }
913
923 public void UpdatePoint(PointD p, int i)
924 {
925 if (i < Points.Count)
926 {
927 Points[i] = p;
928 }
929 UpdateBoundingBox();
930 }
931
941 public PointD GetPoint(int i)
942 {
943 return Points[i];
944 }
945
952 public PointD[] GetPoints()
953 {
954 return Points.ToArray();
955 }
956
963 public PointF[] GetPointsF()
964 {
965 PointF[] pfs = new PointF[Points.Count];
966 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
967 {
968 pfs[i].X = (float)Points[i].X;
969 pfs[i].Y = (float)Points[i].Y;
970 }
971 return pfs;
972 }
973
979 public void AddPoint(PointD p)
980 {
981 Points.Add(p);
982 UpdateBoundingBox();
983 }
984
989 public void AddPoints(PointD[] p)
990 {
991 Points.AddRange(p);
992 UpdateBoundingBox();
993 }
994
1003 public void AddPoints(int[] xp, int[] yp)
1004 {
1005 for (int i = 0; i < xp.Length; i++)
1006 {
1007 Points.Add(new PointD(xp[i], yp[i]));
1008 }
1009 UpdateBoundingBox();
1010 }
1011
1019 public void AddPoints(float[] xp, float[] yp)
1020 {
1021 for (int i = 0; i < xp.Length; i++)
1022 {
1023 Points.Add(new PointD(xp[i], yp[i]));
1024 }
1025 UpdateBoundingBox();
1026 }
1027
1033 public void RemovePoints(int[] indexs)
1034 {
1035 List<PointD> inds = new List<PointD>();
1036 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
1037 {
1038 bool found = false;
1039 for (int ind = 0; ind < indexs.Length; ind++)
1040 {
1041 if (indexs[ind] == i)
1042 found = true;
1043 }
1044 if (!found)
1045 inds.Add(Points[i]);
1046 }
1047 Points = inds;
1048 UpdateBoundingBox();
1049 }
1050
1057 public int GetPointCount()
1058 {
1059 return Points.Count;
1060 }
1061
1072 public PointD[] stringToPoints(string s)
1073 {
1074 List<PointD> pts = new List<PointD>();
1075 string[] ints = s.Split(' ');
1076 for (int i = 0; i < ints.Length; i++)
1077 {
1078 string[] sints;
1079 if (s.Contains("\t"))
1080 sints = ints[i].Split('\t');
1081 else
1082 sints = ints[i].Split(',');
1083 double x = double.Parse(sints[0], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
1084 double y = double.Parse(sints[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
1085 pts.Add(new PointD(x, y));
1086 }
1087 return pts.ToArray();
1088 }
1089
1099 public string PointsToString(BioImage b)
1100 {
1101 string pts = "";
1102 PointD[] ps = b.ToImageSpace(Points);
1103 for (int j = 0; j < ps.Length; j++)
1104 {
1105 if (j == ps.Length - 1)
1106 pts += ps[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + ps[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
1107 else
1108 pts += ps[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + ps[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + " ";
1109 }
1110 return pts;
1111 }
1112
1117 public void UpdateBoundingBox()
1118 {
1119 PointD min = new PointD(double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue);
1120 PointD max = new PointD(double.MinValue, double.MinValue);
1121 foreach (PointD p in Points)
1122 {
1123 if (min.X > p.X)
1124 min.X = p.X;
1125 if (min.Y > p.Y)
1126 min.Y = p.Y;
1127
1128 if (max.X < p.X)
1129 max.X = p.X;
1130 if (max.Y < p.Y)
1131 max.Y = p.Y;
1132 }
1133 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
1134 r.X = min.X;
1135 r.Y = min.Y;
1136 r.W = max.X - min.X;
1137 r.H = max.Y - min.Y;
1138 if (r.W == 0)
1139 r.W = 1;
1140 if (r.H == 0)
1141 r.H = 1;
1142 BoundingBox = r;
1143 }
1144
1145 public override string ToString()
1146 {
1147 double w = Math.Round(W, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
1148 double h = Math.Round(H, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
1149 double x = Math.Round(Point.X, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
1150 double y = Math.Round(Point.Y, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
1151 return type.ToString() + ", " + Text + " (" + w + ", " + h + ") " + " (" + x + ", " + y + ") " + coord.ToString();
1152 }
1153 }
1154
1155 /* It's a class that holds a string, an IFilter, and a Type */
1156 public class Filt
1157 {
1158 /* Defining an enum. */
1159 public enum Type
1160 {
1161 Base = 0,
1162 Base2 = 1,
1163 InPlace = 2,
1164 InPlace2 = 3,
1165 InPlacePartial = 4,
1166 Resize = 5,
1167 Rotate = 6,
1168 Transformation = 7,
1169 Copy = 8
1170 }
1171 public string name;
1172 public IFilter filt;
1173 public Type type;
1174 public Filt(string s, IFilter f, Type t)
1175 {
1176 name = s;
1177 filt = f;
1178 type = t;
1179 }
1180 }
1181 public static class Filters
1182 {
1183 public static int[,] indexs;
1184
1193 public static Filt GetFilter(string name)
1194 {
1195 foreach (Filt item in filters)
1196 {
1197 if (item.name == name)
1198 return item;
1199 }
1200 return null;
1201 }
1202
1213 public static Filt GetFilter(int type, int index)
1214 {
1215 return filters[indexs[type, index]];
1216 }
1217 public static List<Filt> filters = new List<Filt>();
1218
1233 public static BioImage Base(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1234 {
1235 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1236 if (!inPlace)
1237 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1238 try
1239 {
1240 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1241 BaseFilter fi = (BaseFilter)f.filt;
1242 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1243 {
1244 Bitmap bm = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1245 img.Buffers[i] = bm;
1246 }
1247 if (!inPlace)
1248 {
1249 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1250 }
1251 //Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Base(" + '"' + id +
1252 // '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
1253 }
1254 catch (Exception e)
1255 {
1256 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1257 dialog.Show();
1258 }
1259 return img;
1260 }
1261
1279 public static BioImage Base2(string id, string id2, string name, bool inPlace)
1280 {
1281 BioImage c2 = Images.GetImage(id);
1282 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id2);
1283 if (!inPlace)
1284 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1285 try
1286 {
1287 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1288 BaseFilter2 fi = (BaseFilter2)f.filt;
1289 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1290 {
1291 fi.OverlayImage = c2.Buffers[i];
1292 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1293 }
1294 if (!inPlace)
1295 {
1296 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1297 }
1298 //Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Base2(" + '"' + id + '"' + "," +
1299 // '"' + id2 + '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
1300 return img;
1301 }
1302 catch (Exception e)
1303 {
1304 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1305 dialog.Show();
1306 }
1307 return img;
1308 }
1309
1325 public static BioImage InPlace(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1326 {
1327 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1328 if (!inPlace)
1329 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1330 try
1331 {
1332 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1333 BaseInPlaceFilter fi = (BaseInPlaceFilter)f.filt;
1334 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1335 {
1336 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i]);
1337 }
1338 if (!inPlace)
1339 {
1340 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1341 }
1342 //Recorder.AddLine("Filters.InPlace(" + '"' + id +
1343 // '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
1344 return img;
1345 }
1346 catch (Exception e)
1347 {
1348 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1349 dialog.Show();
1350 }
1351 return img;
1352 }
1353
1371 public static BioImage InPlace2(string id, string id2, string name, bool inPlace)
1372 {
1373 BioImage c2 = Images.GetImage(id);
1374 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id2);
1375 if (!inPlace)
1376 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1377 try
1378 {
1379 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1380 BaseInPlaceFilter2 fi = (BaseInPlaceFilter2)f.filt;
1381 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1382 {
1383 fi.OverlayImage = c2.Buffers[i];
1384 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1385 }
1386 if (!inPlace)
1387 {
1388 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1389 }
1390 //Recorder.AddLine("Filters.InPlace2(" + '"' + id + '"' + "," +
1391 // '"' + id2 + '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
1392 return img;
1393 }
1394 catch (Exception e)
1395 {
1396 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1397 dialog.Show();
1398 }
1399 return img;
1400 }
1401
1418 public static BioImage InPlacePartial(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1419 {
1420 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1421 if (!inPlace)
1422 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1423 try
1424 {
1425 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1426 BaseInPlacePartialFilter fi = (BaseInPlacePartialFilter)f.filt;
1427 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1428 {
1429 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1430 }
1431 if (!inPlace)
1432 {
1433 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1434 }
1435 //Recorder.AddLine("Filters.InPlacePartial(" + '"' + id +
1436 // '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
1437 return img;
1438 }
1439 catch (Exception e)
1440 {
1441 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1442 dialog.Show();
1443 }
1444 return img;
1445 }
1446
1466 public static BioImage Resize(string id, string name, bool inPlace, int w, int h)
1467 {
1468 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1469 if (!inPlace)
1470 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1471 try
1472 {
1473 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1474 BaseResizeFilter fi = (BaseResizeFilter)f.filt;
1475 fi.NewHeight = h;
1476 fi.NewWidth = w;
1477 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1478 {
1479 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1480 }
1481 if (!inPlace)
1482 {
1483 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1484 }
1485 //Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Resize(" + '"' + id +
1486 // '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
1487 }
1488 catch (Exception e)
1489 {
1490 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1491 dialog.Show();
1492 }
1493 return img;
1494 }
1495
1523 public static BioImage Rotate(string id, string name, bool inPlace, float angle, int a, int r, int g, int b)
1524 {
1525 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1526 if (!inPlace)
1527 img = BioImage.Copy(Images.GetImage(id));
1528 try
1529 {
1530 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1531 BaseRotateFilter fi = (BaseRotateFilter)f.filt;
1532 fi.Angle = angle;
1533 fi.FillColor = Color.FromArgb(a, r, g, b);
1534 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1535 {
1536 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1537 }
1538 if (!inPlace)
1539 {
1540 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1541 }
1542 //Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Rotate(" + '"' + id +
1543 // '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + "," + angle.ToString() + "," +
1544 // a + "," + r + "," + g + "," + b + ");");
1545 }
1546 catch (Exception e)
1547 {
1548 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1549 dialog.Show();
1550 }
1551 return img;
1552
1553 }
1554
1574 public static BioImage Transformation(string id, string name, bool inPlace, float angle)
1575 {
1576 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1577 if (!inPlace)
1578 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1579 try
1580 {
1581 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1582 BaseTransformationFilter fi = (BaseTransformationFilter)f.filt;
1583 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1584 {
1585 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1586 }
1587 if (!inPlace)
1588 {
1589 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1590 }
1591 //Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Transformation(" + '"' + id +
1592 // '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + "," + angle + ");");
1593 }
1594 catch (Exception e)
1595 {
1596 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1597 dialog.Show();
1598 }
1599 return img;
1600 }
1601
1618 public static BioImage Copy(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1619 {
1620 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1621 if (!inPlace)
1622 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1623 try
1624 {
1625 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1626 BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter fi = (BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter)f.filt;
1627 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1628 {
1629 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i]);
1630 }
1631 if (!inPlace)
1632 {
1633 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1634 }
1635 //Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Copy(" + '"' + id +
1636 // '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
1637 }
1638 catch (Exception e)
1639 {
1640 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1641 dialog.Show();
1642 }
1643 return img;
1644 }
1645
1662 public static BioImage Crop(string id, double x, double y, double w, double h)
1663 {
1664 BioImage c = Images.GetImage(id);
1665 RectangleF r = c.ToImageSpace(new RectangleD(x, y, w, h));
1666 Rectangle rec = new Rectangle((int)r.X, (int)r.Y, (int)Math.Abs(r.Width), (int)Math.Abs(r.Height));
1667 BioImage img = BioImage.Copy(c, false);
1668 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1669 {
1670 img.Buffers[i].Crop(rec);
1671 }
1672 BioImage.AutoThreshold(img, true);
1673 if (img.bitsPerPixel > 8)
1674 img.StackThreshold(true);
1675 else
1676 img.StackThreshold(false);
1677 //Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Crop(" + '"' + id + '"' + "," + x + "," + y + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
1678 //App.tabsView.AddTab(img);
1679 return img;
1680 }
1681
1693 public static BioImage Crop(string id, RectangleD r)
1694 {
1695 return Crop(id, r.X, r.Y, r.W, r.H);
1696 }
1697
1698
1702 public static void Init()
1703 {
1704 //Base Filters
1705 indexs = new int[9, 32];
1706 indexs[0, 0] = filters.Count;
1707 Filt f = new Filt("AdaptiveSmoothing", new AdaptiveSmoothing(), Filt.Type.Base);
1708 filters.Add(f);
1709 indexs[0, 1] = filters.Count;
1710 f = new Filt("BayerFilter", new BayerFilter(), Filt.Type.Base);
1711 filters.Add(f);
1712 indexs[0, 2] = filters.Count;
1713 f = new Filt("BayerFilterOptimized", new BayerFilterOptimized(), Filt.Type.Base);
1714 filters.Add(f);
1715 indexs[0, 3] = filters.Count;
1716 f = new Filt("BayerDithering", new BayerDithering(), Filt.Type.Base);
1717 filters.Add(f);
1718 indexs[0, 4] = filters.Count;
1719 f = new Filt("ConnectedComponentsLabeling", new ConnectedComponentsLabeling(), Filt.Type.Base);
1720 filters.Add(f);
1721 indexs[0, 5] = filters.Count;
1722 f = new Filt("ExtractChannel", new ExtractChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
1723 filters.Add(f);
1724 indexs[0, 6] = filters.Count;
1725 f = new Filt("ExtractNormalizedRGBChannel", new ExtractNormalizedRGBChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
1726 filters.Add(f);
1727 indexs[0, 7] = filters.Count;
1728 f = new Filt("Grayscale", new Grayscale(0.2125, 0.7154, 0.0721), Filt.Type.Base);
1729 filters.Add(f);
1730 //f = new Filt("TexturedFilter", new TexturedFilter());
1731 //filters.Add(f);
1732 indexs[0, 8] = filters.Count;
1733 f = new Filt("WaterWave", new WaterWave(), Filt.Type.Base);
1734 filters.Add(f);
1735 indexs[0, 9] = filters.Count;
1736 f = new Filt("YCbCrExtractChannel", new YCbCrExtractChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
1737 filters.Add(f);
1738 indexs[0, 10] = filters.Count;
1739 //BaseFilter2
1740
1741 f = new Filt("ThresholdedDifference", new ThresholdedDifference(), Filt.Type.Base2);
1742 filters.Add(f);
1743 indexs[1, 0] = filters.Count;
1744 f = new Filt("ThresholdedEuclideanDifference", new ThresholdedEuclideanDifference(), Filt.Type.Base2);
1745 filters.Add(f);
1746 indexs[1, 1] = filters.Count;
1747
1748 //BaseInPlaceFilter
1749 indexs[2, 0] = filters.Count;
1750 f = new Filt("BackwardQuadrilateralTransformation", new BackwardQuadrilateralTransformation(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1751 filters.Add(f);
1752 indexs[2, 1] = filters.Count;
1753 f = new Filt("BlobsFiltering", new BlobsFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1754 filters.Add(f);
1755 indexs[2, 2] = filters.Count;
1756 f = new Filt("BottomHat", new BottomHat(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1757 filters.Add(f);
1758 indexs[2, 3] = filters.Count;
1759 f = new Filt("BradleyLocalThresholding", new BradleyLocalThresholding(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1760 filters.Add(f);
1761 indexs[2, 4] = filters.Count;
1762 f = new Filt("CanvasCrop", new CanvasCrop(new Rectangle(0, 0, 0, 0)), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1763 filters.Add(f);
1764 indexs[2, 5] = filters.Count;
1765 f = new Filt("CanvasFill", new CanvasFill(new Rectangle(0, 0, 0, 0)), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1766 filters.Add(f);
1767 indexs[2, 6] = filters.Count;
1768 f = new Filt("CanvasMove", new CanvasMove(new IntPoint()), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1769 filters.Add(f);
1770 indexs[2, 7] = filters.Count;
1771 f = new Filt("FillHoles", new FillHoles(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1772 filters.Add(f);
1773 indexs[2, 8] = filters.Count;
1774 f = new Filt("FlatFieldCorrection", new FlatFieldCorrection(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1775 filters.Add(f);
1776 indexs[2, 9] = filters.Count;
1777 f = new Filt("TopHat", new TopHat(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1778 filters.Add(f);
1779
1780 //BaseInPlaceFilter2
1781 indexs[3, 0] = filters.Count;
1782 f = new Filt("Add", new Add(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1783 filters.Add(f);
1784 indexs[3, 1] = filters.Count;
1785 f = new Filt("Difference", new Difference(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1786 filters.Add(f);
1787 indexs[3, 2] = filters.Count;
1788 f = new Filt("Intersect", new Intersect(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1789 filters.Add(f);
1790 indexs[3, 3] = filters.Count;
1791 f = new Filt("Merge", new Merge(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1792 filters.Add(f);
1793 indexs[3, 4] = filters.Count;
1794 f = new Filt("Morph", new Morph(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1795 filters.Add(f);
1796 indexs[3, 5] = filters.Count;
1797 f = new Filt("MoveTowards", new MoveTowards(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1798 filters.Add(f);
1799 indexs[3, 6] = filters.Count;
1800 f = new Filt("StereoAnaglyph", new StereoAnaglyph(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1801 filters.Add(f);
1802 indexs[3, 7] = filters.Count;
1803 f = new Filt("Subtract", new Subtract(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1804 filters.Add(f);
1805 //f = new Filt("Add", new TexturedMerge(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1806 //filters.Add(f);
1807
1808 //BaseInPlacePartialFilter
1809 indexs[4, 0] = filters.Count;
1810 f = new Filt("AdditiveNoise", new AdditiveNoise(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1811 filters.Add(f);
1812 //f = new Filt("ApplyMask", new ApplyMask(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial2);
1813 //filters.Add(f);
1814 indexs[4, 1] = filters.Count;
1815 f = new Filt("BrightnessCorrection", new BrightnessCorrection(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1816 filters.Add(f);
1817 indexs[4, 2] = filters.Count;
1818 f = new Filt("ChannelFiltering", new ChannelFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1819 filters.Add(f);
1820 indexs[4, 3] = filters.Count;
1821 f = new Filt("ColorFiltering", new ColorFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1822 filters.Add(f);
1823 indexs[4, 4] = filters.Count;
1824 f = new Filt("ColorRemapping", new ColorRemapping(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1825 filters.Add(f);
1826 indexs[4, 5] = filters.Count;
1827 f = new Filt("ContrastCorrection", new ContrastCorrection(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1828 filters.Add(f);
1829 indexs[4, 6] = filters.Count;
1830 f = new Filt("ContrastStretch", new ContrastStretch(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1831 filters.Add(f);
1832
1833 //f = new Filt("ErrorDiffusionDithering", new ErrorDiffusionDithering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1834 //filters.Add(f);
1835 indexs[4, 7] = filters.Count;
1836 f = new Filt("EuclideanColorFiltering", new EuclideanColorFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1837 filters.Add(f);
1838 indexs[4, 8] = filters.Count;
1839 f = new Filt("GammaCorrection", new GammaCorrection(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1840 filters.Add(f);
1841 indexs[4, 9] = filters.Count;
1842 f = new Filt("HistogramEqualization", new HistogramEqualization(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1843 filters.Add(f);
1844 indexs[4, 10] = filters.Count;
1845 f = new Filt("HorizontalRunLengthSmoothing", new HorizontalRunLengthSmoothing(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1846 filters.Add(f);
1847 indexs[4, 11] = filters.Count;
1848 f = new Filt("HSLFiltering", new HSLFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1849 filters.Add(f);
1850 indexs[4, 12] = filters.Count;
1851 f = new Filt("HueModifier", new HueModifier(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1852 filters.Add(f);
1853 indexs[4, 13] = filters.Count;
1854 f = new Filt("Invert", new Invert(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1855 filters.Add(f);
1856 indexs[4, 14] = filters.Count;
1857 f = new Filt("LevelsLinear", new LevelsLinear(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1858 filters.Add(f);
1859 indexs[4, 15] = filters.Count;
1860 f = new Filt("LevelsLinear16bpp", new LevelsLinear16bpp(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1861 filters.Add(f);
1862 //indexs[4, 16] = 46;
1863 //f = new Filt("MaskedFilter", new MaskedFilter(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1864 //filters.Add(f);
1865 //f = new Filt("Mirror", new Mirror(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1866 //filters.Add(f);
1867 indexs[4, 16] = filters.Count;
1868 f = new Filt("OrderedDithering", new OrderedDithering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1869 filters.Add(f);
1870 indexs[4, 17] = filters.Count;
1871 f = new Filt("OtsuThreshold", new OtsuThreshold(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1872 filters.Add(f);
1873 indexs[4, 19] = filters.Count;
1874 f = new Filt("Pixellate", new Pixellate(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1875 filters.Add(f);
1876 indexs[4, 20] = filters.Count;
1877 f = new Filt("PointedColorFloodFill", new PointedColorFloodFill(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1878 filters.Add(f);
1879 indexs[4, 21] = filters.Count;
1880 f = new Filt("PointedMeanFloodFill", new PointedMeanFloodFill(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1881 filters.Add(f);
1882 indexs[4, 22] = filters.Count;
1883 f = new Filt("ReplaceChannel", new Invert(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1884 filters.Add(f);
1885 indexs[4, 23] = filters.Count;
1886 f = new Filt("RotateChannels", new LevelsLinear(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1887 filters.Add(f);
1888 indexs[4, 24] = filters.Count;

1890 filters.Add(f);
1891 indexs[4, 25] = filters.Count;
1892 f = new Filt("SaturationCorrection", new SaturationCorrection(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1893 filters.Add(f);
1894 indexs[4, 26] = filters.Count;
1895 f = new Filt("Sepia", new Sepia(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1896 filters.Add(f);
1897 indexs[4, 26] = filters.Count;
1898 f = new Filt("SimplePosterization", new SimplePosterization(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1899 filters.Add(f);
1900 indexs[4, 27] = filters.Count;
1901 f = new Filt("SISThreshold", new SISThreshold(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1902 filters.Add(f);
1903 //f = new Filt("Texturer", new Texturer(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1904 //filters.Add(f);
1905 //f = new Filt("Threshold", new Threshold(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1906 //filters.Add(f);
1907 indexs[4, 28] = filters.Count;
1908 f = new Filt("ThresholdWithCarry", new ThresholdWithCarry(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1909 filters.Add(f);
1910 indexs[4, 29] = filters.Count;
1911 f = new Filt("VerticalRunLengthSmoothing", new VerticalRunLengthSmoothing(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1912 filters.Add(f);
1913 indexs[4, 30] = filters.Count;
1914 f = new Filt("YCbCrFiltering", new YCbCrFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1915 filters.Add(f);
1916 indexs[4, 31] = filters.Count;
1917 f = new Filt("YCbCrLinear", new YCbCrLinear(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1918 filters.Add(f);
1919 //f = new Filt("YCbCrReplaceChannel", new YCbCrReplaceChannel(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1920 //filters.Add(f);
1921
1922 //BaseResizeFilter
1923 indexs[5, 0] = filters.Count;
1924 f = new Filt("ResizeBicubic", new ResizeBicubic(0, 0), Filt.Type.Resize);
1925 filters.Add(f);
1926 indexs[5, 1] = filters.Count;
1927 f = new Filt("ResizeBilinear", new ResizeBilinear(0, 0), Filt.Type.Resize);
1928 filters.Add(f);
1929 indexs[5, 2] = filters.Count;
1930 f = new Filt("ResizeNearestNeighbor", new ResizeNearestNeighbor(0, 0), Filt.Type.Resize);
1931 filters.Add(f);
1932
1933 //BaseRotateFilter
1934 indexs[6, 0] = filters.Count;
1935 f = new Filt("RotateBicubic", new RotateBicubic(0), Filt.Type.Rotate);
1936 filters.Add(f);
1937 indexs[6, 1] = filters.Count;
1938 f = new Filt("RotateBilinear", new RotateBilinear(0), Filt.Type.Rotate);
1939 filters.Add(f);
1940 indexs[6, 2] = filters.Count;
1941 f = new Filt("RotateNearestNeighbor", new RotateNearestNeighbor(0), Filt.Type.Rotate);
1942 filters.Add(f);
1943
1944 //Transformation
1945 indexs[7, 0] = filters.Count;
1946 f = new Filt("Crop", new Crop(new Rectangle(0, 0, 0, 0)), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1947 filters.Add(f);
1948 indexs[7, 1] = filters.Count;
1949 f = new Filt("QuadrilateralTransformation", new QuadrilateralTransformation(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1950 filters.Add(f);
1951 //f = new Filt("QuadrilateralTransformationBilinear", new QuadrilateralTransformationBilinear(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1952 //filters.Add(f);
1953 //f = new Filt("QuadrilateralTransformationNearestNeighbor", new QuadrilateralTransformationNearestNeighbor(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1954 //filters.Add(f);
1955 indexs[7, 2] = filters.Count;
1956 f = new Filt("Shrink", new Shrink(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1957 filters.Add(f);
1958 indexs[7, 3] = filters.Count;
1959 f = new Filt("SimpleQuadrilateralTransformation", new SimpleQuadrilateralTransformation(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1960 filters.Add(f);
1961 indexs[7, 4] = filters.Count;
1962 f = new Filt("TransformFromPolar", new TransformFromPolar(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1963 filters.Add(f);
1964 indexs[7, 5] = filters.Count;
1965 f = new Filt("TransformToPolar", new TransformToPolar(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1966 filters.Add(f);
1967
1968 //BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter
1969 indexs[8, 0] = filters.Count;
1970 f = new Filt("BinaryDilatation3x3", new BinaryDilatation3x3(), Filt.Type.Copy);
1971 filters.Add(f);
1972 indexs[8, 1] = filters.Count;
1973 f = new Filt("BilateralSmoothing ", new BilateralSmoothing(), Filt.Type.Copy);
1974 filters.Add(f);
1975 indexs[8, 2] = filters.Count;
1976 f = new Filt("BinaryErosion3x3 ", new BinaryErosion3x3(), Filt.Type.Copy);
1977 filters.Add(f);
1978
1979 }
1980 }
1981 public class ImageInfo
1982 {
1983 bool HasPhysicalXY = false;
1984 bool HasPhysicalXYZ = false;
1985 private double physicalSizeX = -1;
1986 private double physicalSizeY = -1;
1987 private double physicalSizeZ = -1;
1988 public double PhysicalSizeX
1989 {
1990 get { return physicalSizeX; }
1991 set
1992 {
1993 physicalSizeX = value;
1994 HasPhysicalXY = true;
1995 }
1996 }
1997 public double PhysicalSizeY
1998 {
1999 get { return physicalSizeY; }
2000 set
2001 {
2002 physicalSizeY = value;
2003 HasPhysicalXY = true;
2004 }
2005 }
2006 public double PhysicalSizeZ
2007 {
2008 get { return physicalSizeZ; }
2009 set
2010 {
2011 physicalSizeZ = value;
2012 HasPhysicalXYZ = true;
2013 }
2014 }
2015
2016 bool HasStageXY = false;
2017 bool HasStageXYZ = false;
2018 public double stageSizeX = -1;
2019 public double stageSizeY = -1;
2020 public double stageSizeZ = -1;
2021 public double StageSizeX
2022 {
2023 get { return stageSizeX; }
2024 set
2025 {
2026 stageSizeX = value;
2027 HasStageXY = true;
2028 }
2029 }
2030 public double StageSizeY
2031 {
2032 get { return stageSizeY; }
2033 set
2034 {
2035 stageSizeY = value;
2036 HasStageXY = true;
2037 }
2038 }
2039 public double StageSizeZ
2040 {
2041 get { return stageSizeZ; }
2042 set
2043 {
2044 stageSizeZ = value;
2045 HasStageXYZ = true;
2046 }
2047 }
2048
2049 private int series = 0;
2050 public int Series
2051 {
2052 get { return series; }
2053 set { series = value; }
2054 }
2055
2063 public ImageInfo Copy()
2064 {
2065 ImageInfo inf = new ImageInfo();
2066 inf.PhysicalSizeX = PhysicalSizeX;
2067 inf.PhysicalSizeY = PhysicalSizeY;
2068 inf.PhysicalSizeZ = PhysicalSizeZ;
2069 inf.StageSizeX = StageSizeX;
2070 inf.StageSizeY = StageSizeY;
2071 inf.StageSizeZ = StageSizeZ;
2072 inf.HasPhysicalXY = HasPhysicalXY;
2073 inf.HasPhysicalXYZ = HasPhysicalXYZ;
2074 inf.StageSizeX = StageSizeX;
2075 inf.StageSizeY = StageSizeY;
2076 inf.StageSizeZ = StageSizeZ;
2077 inf.HasStageXY = HasStageXY;
2078 inf.HasStageXYZ = HasStageXYZ;
2079 return inf;
2080 }
2081
2082 }

2091 return coordinate;
2092 }
2093 set
2094 {
2095 coordinate = value;
2096 }

2099 private string id;
2100 public List<Channel> Channels = new List<Channel>();
2101 public List<Resolution> Resolutions = new List<Resolution>();
2102 public List<AForge.Bitmap> Buffers = new List<AForge.Bitmap>();
2103 public List<NetVips.Image> vipPages = new List<NetVips.Image>();

2105 {
2106 get { return resolution; }
2107 set { resolution = value; }
2108 }

2110 public List<ROI> Annotations = new List<ROI>();
2111 public string filename = "";
2112 public string script = "";

2114 {
2115 get
2116 {
2117 return filename;
2118 }
2119 set

2122 }

2128 {

2130 }

2134 public int seriesCount = 1;

2136 public bool littleEndian = false;

2168 public static BioImage Copy(BioImage b, bool rois)
2169 {
2170 BioImage bi = new BioImage(b.ID);
2171 if (rois)
2172 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
2173 {
2174 bi.Annotations.Add(an);
2175 }
2176 foreach (Bitmap bf in b.Buffers)
2177 {
2178 bi.Buffers.Add(bf.Copy());
2179 }
2180 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
2181 {
2182 bi.Channels.Add(c);
2183 }
2184 bi.Volume = b.Volume;
2185 bi.Coords = b.Coords;
2186 bi.sizeZ = b.sizeZ;
2187 bi.sizeC = b.sizeC;
2188 bi.sizeT = b.sizeT;
2189 bi.series = b.series;
2190 bi.seriesCount = b.seriesCount;
2191 bi.frameInterval = b.frameInterval;
2192 bi.littleEndian = b.littleEndian;
2193 bi.isGroup = b.isGroup;
2194 bi.imageInfo = b.imageInfo;
2195 bi.bitsPerPixel = b.bitsPerPixel;
2196 bi.file = b.file;
2197 bi.filename = b.filename;
2198 bi.Resolutions = b.Resolutions;
2199 bi.statistics = b.statistics;
2200 return bi;
2201 }
2202
2212 public static BioImage Copy(BioImage b)
2213 {
2214 return Copy(b, true);
2215 }
2216

2228 {
2229 return BioImage.Copy(this, rois);
2230 }

2239 public BioImage Copy()
2240 {
2241 return BioImage.Copy(this, true);
2242 }
2243
2258 public static BioImage CopyInfo(BioImage b, bool copyAnnotations, bool copyChannels)
2259 {
2260 BioImage bi = new BioImage(b.ID);
2261 if (copyAnnotations)
2262 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
2263 {
2264 bi.Annotations.Add(an);
2265 }
2266 if (copyChannels)
2267 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
2268 {
2269 bi.Channels.Add(c.Copy());
2270 }
2271
2272 bi.Coords = b.Coords;
2273 bi.Volume = b.Volume;
2274 bi.sizeZ = b.sizeZ;
2275 bi.sizeC = b.sizeC;
2276 bi.sizeT = b.sizeT;
2277 bi.series = b.series;
2278 bi.seriesCount = b.seriesCount;
2279 bi.frameInterval = b.frameInterval;
2280 bi.littleEndian = b.littleEndian;
2281 bi.isGroup = b.isGroup;
2282 bi.imageInfo = b.imageInfo;
2283 bi.bitsPerPixel = b.bitsPerPixel;
2284 bi.Resolutions = b.Resolutions;
2285 bi.Coordinate = b.Coordinate;
2286 bi.file = b.file;
2287 bi.Filename = b.Filename;
2288 bi.ID = Images.GetImageName(b.file);
2289 bi.statistics = b.statistics;
2290 return bi;
2291 }

2347 static bool initialized = false;
2348 public Channel RChannel
2349 {
2350 get
2351 {
2352 if (Channels[0].range.Length == 1)
2353 return Channels[rgbChannels[0]];
2354 else
2355 return Channels[0];
2356 }
2357 }
2358 /* The above code is defining a property called "GChannel" in C#. This property returns a
2359 Channel object. */
2360 public Channel GChannel
2361 {
2362 get
2363 {
2364 if (Channels[0].range.Length == 1)
2365 return Channels[rgbChannels[1]];
2366 else
2367 return Channels[0];
2368 }
2369 }
2370 /* The above code is defining a property called "BChannel" in C#. This property returns a
2371 Channel object. */
2372 public Channel BChannel
2373 {
2374 get
2375 {
2376 if (Channels[0].range.Length == 1)
2377 return Channels[rgbChannels[2]];
2378 else
2379 return Channels[0];
2380 }
2381 }
2382
2383 public class ImageJDesc
2384 {
2385 public string ImageJ;
2386 public int images = 0;
2387 public int channels = 0;
2388 public int slices = 0;
2389 public int frames = 0;
2390 public bool hyperstack;
2391 public string mode;
2392 public string unit;
2393 public double finterval = 0;
2394 public double spacing = 0;
2395 public bool loop;
2396 public double min = 0;
2397 public double max = 0;
2398 public int count;
2399 public bool bit8color = false;
2400
2412 public ImageJDesc FromImage(BioImage b)
2413 {
2414 ImageJ = "";
2415 images = b.ImageCount;
2416 channels = b.SizeC;
2417 slices = b.SizeZ;
2418 frames = b.SizeT;
2419 hyperstack = true;
2420 mode = "grayscale";
2421 unit = "micron";
2422 finterval = b.frameInterval;
2423 spacing = b.PhysicalSizeZ;
2424 loop = false;
2425 /*
2426 double dmax = double.MinValue;
2427 double dmin = double.MaxValue;
2428 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
2429 {
2430 if(dmax < c.Max)
2431 dmax = c.Max;
2432 if(dmin > c.Min)
2433 dmin = c.Min;
2434 }
2435 min = dmin;
2436 max = dmax;
2437 */
2438 min = b.Channels[0].RangeR.Min;
2439 max = b.Channels[0].RangeR.Max;
2440 return this;
2441 }
2442
2450 public string GetString()
2451 {
2452 string s = "";
2453 s += "ImageJ=" + ImageJ + "\n";
2454 s += "images=" + images + "\n";
2455 s += "channels=" + channels.ToString() + "\n";
2456 s += "slices=" + slices.ToString() + "\n";
2457 s += "frames=" + frames.ToString() + "\n";
2458 s += "hyperstack=" + hyperstack.ToString() + "\n";
2459 s += "mode=" + mode.ToString() + "\n";
2460 s += "unit=" + unit.ToString() + "\n";
2461 s += "finterval=" + finterval.ToString() + "\n";
2462 s += "spacing=" + spacing.ToString() + "\n";
2463 s += "loop=" + loop.ToString() + "\n";
2464 s += "min=" + min.ToString() + "\n";
2465 s += "max=" + max.ToString() + "\n";
2466 return s;
2467 }
2468
2481 public void SetString(string desc)
2482 {
2483 string[] lines = desc.Split(new string[] { "\r\n", "\r", "\n" }, StringSplitOptions.None);
2484 int maxlen = 20;
2485 for (int i = 0; i < lines.Length; i++)
2486 {
2487 if (i < maxlen)
2488 {
2489 string[] sp = lines[i].Split('=');
2490 if (sp[0] == "ImageJ")
2491 ImageJ = sp[1];
2492 if (sp[0] == "images")
2493 images = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2494 if (sp[0] == "channels")
2495 channels = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2496 if (sp[0] == "slices")
2497 slices = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2498 if (sp[0] == "frames")
2499 frames = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2500 if (sp[0] == "hyperstack")
2501 hyperstack = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
2502 if (sp[0] == "mode")
2503 mode = sp[1];
2504 if (sp[0] == "unit")
2505 unit = sp[1];
2506 if (sp[0] == "finterval")
2507 finterval = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2508 if (sp[0] == "spacing")
2509 spacing = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2510 if (sp[0] == "loop")
2511 loop = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
2512 if (sp[0] == "min")
2513 min = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2514 if (sp[0] == "max")
2515 max = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2516 if (sp[0] == "8bitcolor")
2517 bit8color = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
2518 }
2519 else
2520 return;
2521 }
2522
2523 }
2524 }
2525 public int SizeX
2526 {
2527 get
2528 {
2529 if (Buffers.Count > 0)
2530 return Buffers[0].SizeX;
2531 else return 0;
2532 }
2533 }
2534 public int SizeY
2535 {
2536 get
2537 {
2538 if (Buffers.Count > 0)
2539 return Buffers[0].SizeY;
2540 else return 0;
2541 }
2542 }
2543 public int SizeZ
2544 {
2545 get { return sizeZ; }
2546 }
2547 public int SizeC
2548 {
2549 get { return sizeC; }
2550 }
2551 public int SizeT
2552 {
2553 get { return sizeT; }
2554 }
2555 public static bool Planes = false;
2556 public IntRange RRange
2557 {
2558 get
2559 {
2560 return RChannel.RangeR;
2561 }
2562 }
2563 public IntRange GRange
2564 {
2565 get
2566 {
2567 return GChannel.RangeG;
2568 }
2569 }
2570 public IntRange BRange
2571 {
2572 get
2573 {
2574 return BChannel.RangeB;
2575 }
2576 }
2577 public Bitmap SelectedBuffer
2578 {
2579 get
2580 {
2581 return Buffers[Coords[Coordinate.Z, Coordinate.C, Coordinate.T]];
2582 }
2583 }
2584 public Stopwatch watch = new Stopwatch();
2585 public bool isRGB
2586 {
2587 get
2588 {
2589 if (RGBChannelCount == 3 || RGBChannelCount == 4)
2590 return true;
2591 else
2592 return false;
2593 }
2594 }
2595 public bool isTime
2596 {
2597 get
2598 {
2599 if (SizeT > 1)
2600 return true;
2601 else
2602 return false;
2603 }
2604 }
2605 public bool isSeries
2606 {
2607 get
2608 {
2609 if (seriesCount > 1)
2610 return true;
2611 else
2612 return false;
2613 }
2614 }
2615 public bool isPyramidal
2616 {
2617 get
2618 {
2619 return ispyramidal;
2620 }
2621 set
2622 {
2623 ispyramidal = value;
2624 }
2625 }
2626 public string file;
2627 static int progress = 0;
2628 public static int progressValue
2629 {
2630 get
2631 {
2632 return progress;
2633 }
2634 set
2635 {
2636 progress = value;
2637 }
2638 }
2639 public static string status;
2640 public static string progFile;
2641 /* The above code is defining a public static property called "Initialized" in C#. The property
2642 has a getter method that returns the value of a private static boolean variable called
2643 "initialized". */
2644 public static bool Initialized
2645 {
2646 get
2647 {
2648 return initialized;
2649 }
2650 }
2651
2659 public void To8Bit()
2660 {
2661 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
2662 To24Bit();
2663 PixelFormat px = Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
2664 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2665 return;
2666 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2667 {
2668 To24Bit();
2669 List<AForge.Bitmap> bfs = new List<AForge.Bitmap>();
2670 int index = 0;
2671 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2672 {
2673 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB24To8(Buffers[i]);
2674 Bitmap br = new Bitmap(ID, bs[2], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2675 Bitmap bg = new Bitmap(ID, bs[1], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
2676 Bitmap bb = new Bitmap(ID, bs[0], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
2677 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2678 {
2679 bs[b].Dispose();
2680 }
2681 bs = null;
2682 GC.Collect();
2683 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
2684 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
2685 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
2686 bfs.Add(br);
2687 bfs.Add(bg);
2688 bfs.Add(bb);
2689 index += 3;
2690 }
2691 Buffers = bfs;
2692 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
2693 }
2694 else if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2695 {
2696 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2697 int index = 0;
2698 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2699 {
2700 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB24To8(Buffers[i]);
2701 Bitmap br = new Bitmap(ID, bs[2], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2702 Bitmap bg = new Bitmap(ID, bs[1], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
2703 Bitmap bb = new Bitmap(ID, bs[0], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
2704 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2705 {
2706 bs[b].Dispose();
2707 bs[b] = null;
2708 }
2709 bs = null;
2710 GC.Collect();
2711 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
2712 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
2713 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
2714 bfs.Add(br);
2715 bfs.Add(bg);
2716 bfs.Add(bb);
2717 index += 3;
2718 }
2719 Buffers = bfs;
2720 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
2721 }
2722 else
2723 {
2724 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2725 {
2726 Bitmap b = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp(Buffers[i]);
2727 Buffers[i] = b;
2728 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
2729 }
2730 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2731 {
2732 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 8;
2733 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2734 {
2735 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
2736 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
2737 }
2738 }
2739
2740 }
2741 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
2742 do
2743 {
2744 Thread.Sleep(100);
2745 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
2746 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
2747 AutoThreshold(this, false);
2748 bitsPerPixel = 8;
2749 }
2750
2757 public void To16Bit()
2758 {
2759 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
2760 To24Bit();
2761 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2762 return;
2763 bitsPerPixel = 16;
2764 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2765 {
2766 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2767 int index = 0;
2768 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2769 {
2770 Array.Reverse(Buffers[i].Bytes);
2771 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB48To16(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].Stride, Buffers[i].Bytes, Buffers[i].Coordinate, index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2772 bfs.AddRange(bs);
2773 index += 3;
2774 }
2775 Buffers = bfs;
2776 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, SizeC * 3, SizeT);
2777 if (Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel == 3)
2778 {
2779 Channel c = Channels[0].Copy();
2780 c.SamplesPerPixel = 1;
2781 c.range = new IntRange[1];
2782 Channels.Clear();
2783 Channels.Add(c);
2784 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
2785 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
2786 Channels[1].Index = 1;
2787 Channels[2].Index = 2;
2788 }
2789 }
2790 else if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2791 {
2792 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2793 {
2794 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp(Buffers[i]);
2795 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
2796 }
2797 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2798 {
2799 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2800 {
2801 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2802 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2803 }
2804 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
2805 }
2806 }
2807 else if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2808 {
2809 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2810 int index = 0;
2811 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2812 {
2813 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB24To8(Buffers[i]);
2814 Bitmap br = new Bitmap(ID, bs[2].Image, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2815 Bitmap bg = new Bitmap(ID, bs[1].Image, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
2816 Bitmap bb = new Bitmap(ID, bs[0].Image, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
2817 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2818 {
2819 bs[b].Dispose();
2820 bs[b] = null;
2821 }
2822 bs = null;
2823 GC.Collect();
2824 br.To16Bit();
2825 bg.To16Bit();
2826 bb.To16Bit();
2827 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
2828 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
2829 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
2830 bfs.Add(br);
2831 bfs.Add(bg);
2832 bfs.Add(bb);
2833 index += 3;
2834 }
2835 Buffers = bfs;
2836 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
2837 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2838 {
2839 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2840 {
2841 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2842 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2843 }
2844 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
2845 }
2846 }
2847 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
2848 do
2849 {
2850 Thread.Sleep(100);
2851 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
2852 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
2853 AutoThreshold(this, false);
2854 StackThreshold(true);
2855 }
2856
2864 public void To24Bit()
2865 {
2866 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2867 return;
2868 bitsPerPixel = 8;
2869 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb)
2870 {
2871 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2872 {
2873 Buffers[i] = Bitmap.To24Bit(Buffers[i]);
2874 }
2875 if (Channels.Count == 4)
2876 {
2877 Channels.RemoveAt(0);
2878 }
2879 else
2880 {
2881 Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel = 3;
2882 }
2883 }
2884 else
2885 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2886 {
2887 //We run 8bit so we get 24 bit rgb.
2888 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2889 {
2890 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp(Buffers[i]);
2891 }
2892 }
2893 else
2894 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2895 {
2896 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2897 {
2898 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2899 {
2900 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp(Buffers[i]);
2901 }
2902 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2903 {
2904 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2905 {
2906 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
2907 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
2908 }
2909 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 8;
2910 }
2911 }
2912 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2913 if (Buffers.Count % 3 != 0 && Buffers.Count % 2 != 0)
2914 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2915 {
2916 Bitmap bs = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
2917 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB16To48(bs);
2918 bs.Dispose();
2919 bs = null;
2920 bfs.Add(bbs);
2921 }
2922 else
2923 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += Channels.Count)
2924 {
2925 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
2926 bs[2] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
2927 bs[1] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 1].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 1].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.T), i + 1, Buffers[i + 1].Plane);
2928 if (Channels.Count > 2)
2929 bs[0] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 2].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 2].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.T), i + 2, Buffers[i + 2].Plane);
2930 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB8To24(bs);
2931 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2932 {
2933 if (bs[b] != null)
2934 bs[b].Dispose();
2935 bs[b] = null;
2936 }
2937 bfs.Add(bbs);
2938 }
2939 Buffers = bfs;
2940 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
2941 }
2942
2943 AutoThreshold(this, true);
2944 StackThreshold(false);
2945 }
2946
2955 public void To32Bit()
2956 {
2957 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
2958 return;
2959 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat != PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2960 {
2961 To24Bit();
2962 }
2963 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2964 {
2965 UnmanagedImage b = Bitmap.To32Bit(Buffers[i]);
2966 Buffers[i].Image = b;
2967 }
2968 AutoThreshold(this, true);
2969 }
2970
2978 public void To48Bit()
2979 {
2980 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
2981 To24Bit();
2982 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2983 return;
2984 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2985 {
2986 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2987 {
2988 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2989 {
2990 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp(Buffers[i]);
2991 }
2992 }
2993 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2994 if (Buffers.Count % 3 != 0 && Buffers.Count % 2 != 0)
2995 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2996 {
2997 Bitmap bs = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
2998 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB16To48(bs);
2999 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbs);
3000 bs.Dispose();
3001 bs = null;
3002 bfs.Add(bbs);
3003 }
3004 else
3005 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += Channels.Count)
3006 {
3007 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
3008 bs[0] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
3009 bs[1] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 1].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 1].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.T), i + 1, Buffers[i + 1].Plane);
3010 if (Channels.Count > 2)
3011 bs[2] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 2].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 2].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.T), i + 2, Buffers[i + 2].Plane);
3012 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB16To48(bs);
3013 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
3014 {
3015 if (bs[b] != null)
3016 bs[b].Dispose();
3017 bs[b] = null;
3018 }
3019 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbs);
3020 bfs.Add(bbs);
3021 }
3022 GC.Collect();
3023 Buffers = bfs;
3024 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
3025 Channel c = Channels[0].Copy();
3026 c.SamplesPerPixel = 3;
3027 rgbChannels[0] = 0;
3028 rgbChannels[1] = 0;
3029 rgbChannels[2] = 0;
3030 Channels.Clear();
3031 Channels.Add(c);
3032 }
3033 else
3034 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
3035 {
3036 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
3037 {
3038 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp(Buffers[i]);
3039 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
3040 }
3041 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
3042 {
3043 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
3044 {
3045 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
3046 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
3047 }
3048 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
3049 }
3050 }
3051 else
3052 {
3053 int index = 0;
3054 List<Bitmap> buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
3055 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += 3)
3056 {
3057 Bitmap[] bf = new Bitmap[3];
3058 bf[0] = Buffers[i];
3059 bf[1] = Buffers[i + 1];
3060 bf[2] = Buffers[i + 2];
3061 Bitmap inf = Bitmap.RGB16To48(bf);
3062 buffers.Add(inf);
3063 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
3064 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
3065 {
3066 bf[b].Dispose();
3067 }
3068 index++;
3069 }
3070 Buffers = buffers;
3071 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
3072 }
3073 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3074 do
3075 {
3076 Thread.Sleep(50);
3077 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3078 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3079 bitsPerPixel = 16;
3080 AutoThreshold(this, false);
3081 StackThreshold(true);
3082 }
3083
3091 public void RotateFlip(AForge.RotateFlipType rot)
3092 {
3093 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
3094 {
3095 Buffers[i].RotateFlip(rot);
3096 }
3097 Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ), new Point3D(PhysicalSizeX * SizeX, PhysicalSizeY * SizeY, PhysicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
3098 }
3099
3114 public void Bake(int rmin, int rmax, int gmin, int gmax, int bmin, int bmax)
3115 {
3116 Bake(new IntRange(rmin, rmax), new IntRange(gmin, gmax), new IntRange(bmin, bmax));
3117 }
3118
3134 public void Bake(IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
3135 {
3136 BioImage bm = new BioImage(Images.GetImageName(ID));
3137 bm = CopyInfo(this, true, true);
3138 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
3139 {
3140 ZCT co = Buffers[i].Coordinate;
3141 UnmanagedImage b = GetFiltered(i, rf, gf, bf);
3142 Bitmap inf = new Bitmap(bm.ID, b, co, i);
3143 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
3144 bm.Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = i;
3145 bm.Buffers.Add(inf);
3146 }
3147 foreach (Channel item in bm.Channels)
3148 {
3149 for (int i = 0; i < item.range.Length; i++)
3150 {
3151 item.range[i].Min = 0;
3152 if (bm.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3153 item.range[i].Max = ushort.MaxValue;
3154 else
3155 item.range[i].Max = 255;
3156 }
3157 }
3158 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3159 do
3160 {
3161 Thread.Sleep(50);
3162 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3163 AutoThreshold(bm, false);
3164 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3165 Images.AddImage(bm, true);
3166 }
3167
3172 public void UpdateCoords()
3173 {
3174 int z = 0;
3175 int c = 0;
3176 int t = 0;
3177 Coords = new int[SizeZ, SizeC, SizeT];
3178 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
3179 {
3180 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
3181 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
3182 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
3183 if (c < SizeC - 1)
3184 c++;
3185 else
3186 {
3187 c = 0;
3188 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
3189 z++;
3190 else
3191 {
3192 z = 0;
3193 if (t < SizeT - 1)
3194 t++;
3195 else
3196 t = 0;
3197 }
3198 }
3199 }
3200 }
3201
3213 public void UpdateCoords(int sz, int sc, int st)
3214 {
3215 int z = 0;
3216 int c = 0;
3217 int t = 0;
3218 sizeZ = sz;
3219 sizeC = sc;
3220 sizeT = st;
3221 Coords = new int[sz, sc, st];
3222 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
3223 {
3224 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
3225 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
3226 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
3227 if (c < SizeC - 1)
3228 c++;
3229 else
3230 {
3231 c = 0;
3232 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
3233 z++;
3234 else
3235 {
3236 z = 0;
3237 if (t < SizeT - 1)
3238 t++;
3239 else
3240 t = 0;
3241 }
3242 }
3243 }
3244 }
3245
3258 public void UpdateCoords(int sz, int sc, int st, string order)
3259 {
3260 int z = 0;
3261 int c = 0;
3262 int t = 0;
3263 sizeZ = sz;
3264 sizeC = sc;
3265 sizeT = st;
3266 Coords = new int[sz, sc, st];
3267 if (order == "XYCZT")
3268 {
3269 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
3270 {
3271 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
3272 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
3273 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
3274 if (c < SizeC - 1)
3275 c++;
3276 else
3277 {
3278 c = 0;
3279 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
3280 z++;
3281 else
3282 {
3283 z = 0;
3284 if (t < SizeT - 1)
3285 t++;
3286 else
3287 t = 0;
3288 }
3289 }
3290 }
3291 }
3292 else if (order == "XYZCT")
3293 {
3294 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
3295 {
3296 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
3297 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
3298 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
3299 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
3300 z++;
3301 else
3302 {
3303 z = 0;
3304 if (c < SizeC - 1)
3305 c++;
3306 else
3307 {
3308 c = 0;
3309 if (t < SizeT - 1)
3310 t++;
3311 else
3312 t = 0;
3313 }
3314 }
3315 }
3316 }
3317 }
3318
3327 public double ToImageSizeX(double d)
3328 {
3329 return d / PhysicalSizeX;
3330 }
3331
3340 public double ToImageSizeY(double d)
3341 {
3342 return d / PhysicalSizeY;
3343 }
3344
3353 public double ToImageSpaceX(double x)
3354 {
3355 if (isPyramidal)
3356 return x;
3357 return (float)((x - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
3358 }
3359
3368 public double ToImageSpaceY(double y)
3369 {
3370 if (isPyramidal)
3371 return y;
3372 return (float)((y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
3373 }
3374
3384 public PointD ToImageSpace(PointD p)
3385 {
3386 PointD pp = new PointD();
3387 pp.X = (float)((p.X - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
3388 pp.Y = (float)((p.Y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
3389 return pp;
3390 }
3391
3401 public PointD[] ToImageSpace(List<PointD> p)
3402 {
3403 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Count];
3404 for (int i = 0; i < p.Count; i++)
3405 {
3406 PointD pp = new PointD();
3407 pp.X = ((p[i].X - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
3408 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
3409 ps[i] = pp;
3410 }
3411 return ps;
3412 }
3428 public static PointD[] ToImageSpace(List<PointD> p, int stageSizeX,int stageSizeY, int physicalSizeX,int physicalSizeY)
3429 {
3430 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Count];
3431 for (int i = 0; i < p.Count; i++)
3432 {
3433 PointD pp = new PointD();
3434 pp.X = ((p[i].X - stageSizeX) / physicalSizeX);
3435 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y - stageSizeY) / physicalSizeY);
3436 ps[i] = pp;
3437 }
3438 return ps;
3439 }
3440
3449 public PointF[] ToImageSpace(PointF[] p)
3450 {
3451 PointF[] ps = new PointF[p.Length];
3452 for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
3453 {
3454 PointF pp = new PointF();
3455 pp.X = (float)((p[i].X - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
3456 pp.Y = (float)((p[i].Y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
3457 ps[i] = pp;
3458 }
3459 return ps;
3460 }
3461
3471 public RectangleF ToImageSpace(RectangleD p)
3472 {
3473 RectangleF r = new RectangleF();
3474 Point pp = new Point();
3475 r.X = (int)((p.X - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
3476 r.Y = (int)((p.Y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
3477 r.Width = (int)(p.W / PhysicalSizeX);
3478 r.Height = (int)(p.H / PhysicalSizeY);
3479 return r;
3480 }
3481
3490 public PointD ToStageSpace(PointD p)
3491 {
3492 PointD pp = new PointD();
3493 if (isPyramidal)
3494 {
3495 pp.X = ((p.X * Resolutions[resolution].PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
3496 pp.Y = ((p.Y * Resolutions[resolution].PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
3497 return pp;
3498 }
3499 else
3500 {
3501 pp.X = ((p.X * PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
3502 pp.Y = ((p.Y * PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
3503 return pp;
3504 }
3505 }
3506
3519 public PointD ToStageSpace(PointD p, int resolution)
3520 {
3521 PointD pp = new PointD();
3522 pp.X = ((p.X * Resolutions[resolution].PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
3523 pp.Y = ((p.Y * Resolutions[resolution].PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
3524 return pp;
3525 }
3526
3545 public static PointD ToStageSpace(PointD p, double physicalSizeX, double physicalSizeY, double volumeX, double volumeY)
3546 {
3547 PointD pp = new PointD();
3548 pp.X = ((p.X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
3549 pp.Y = ((p.Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
3550 return pp;
3551 }
3552
3564 public RectangleD ToStageSpace(RectangleD p)
3565 {
3566 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
3567 r.X = ((p.X * PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
3568 r.Y = ((p.Y * PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
3569 r.W = (p.W * PhysicalSizeX);
3570 r.H = (p.H * PhysicalSizeY);
3571 return r;
3572 }
3573
3592 public static RectangleD ToStageSpace(RectangleD p, double physicalSizeX, double physicalSizeY, double volumeX, double volumeY)
3593 {
3594 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
3595 r.X = ((p.X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
3596 r.Y = ((p.Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
3597 r.W = (p.W * physicalSizeX);
3598 r.H = (p.H * physicalSizeY);
3599 return r;
3600 }
3601
3611 public PointD[] ToStageSpace(PointD[] p)
3612 {
3613 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Length];
3614 for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
3615 {
3616 PointD pp = new PointD();
3617 pp.X = ((p[i].X * PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
3618 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y * PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
3619 ps[i] = pp;
3620 }
3621 return ps;
3622 }
3623
3641 public static PointD[] ToStageSpace(PointD[] p, double physicalSizeX, double physicalSizeY, double volumeX, double volumeY)
3642 {
3643 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Length];
3644 for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
3645 {
3646 PointD pp = new PointD();
3647 pp.X = ((p[i].X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
3648 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
3649 ps[i] = pp;
3650 }
3651 return ps;
3652 }
3653 /* The above code is defining a constructor for the BioImage class in C#. The constructor takes
3654 a string parameter called "file". */
3655 public BioImage(string file)
3656 {
3657 id = file;
3658 this.file = file;
3659 filename = Images.GetImageName(id);
3660 Coordinate = new ZCT();
3661 rgbChannels[0] = 0;
3662 rgbChannels[1] = 0;
3663 rgbChannels[2] = 0;
3664 }
3665
3688 public static BioImage Substack(BioImage orig, int ser, int zs, int ze, int cs, int ce, int ts, int te)
3689 {
3690 BioImage b = CopyInfo(orig, false, false);
3691 b.ID = Images.GetImageName(orig.ID);
3692 int i = 0;
3693 b.Coords = new int[ze - zs, ce - cs, te - ts];
3694 b.sizeZ = ze - zs;
3695 b.sizeC = ce - cs;
3696 b.sizeT = te - ts;
3697 for (int ti = 0; ti < b.SizeT; ti++)
3698 {
3699 for (int zi = 0; zi < b.SizeZ; zi++)
3700 {
3701 for (int ci = 0; ci < b.SizeC; ci++)
3702 {
3703 int ind = orig.Coords[zs + zi, cs + ci, ts + ti];
3704 Bitmap bf = new Bitmap(Images.GetImageName(orig.id), orig.SizeX, orig.SizeY, orig.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, orig.Buffers[ind].Bytes, new ZCT(zi, ci, ti), i);
3705 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
3706 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
3707 b.Coords[zi, ci, ti] = i;
3708 i++;
3709 }
3710 }
3711 }
3712 for (int ci = cs; ci < ce; ci++)
3713 {
3714 b.Channels.Add(orig.Channels[ci]);
3715 }
3716 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3717 do
3718 {
3719 Thread.Sleep(100);
3720 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3721 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3722 AutoThreshold(b, false);
3723 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3724 b.StackThreshold(true);
3725 else
3726 b.StackThreshold(false);
3727 Images.AddImage(b, true);
3728 //Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.Substack(" + '"' + orig.Filename + '"' + "," + ser + "," + zs + "," + ze + "," + cs + "," + ce + "," + ts + "," + te + ");");
3729 return b;
3730 }
3731
3747 public static BioImage MergeChannels(BioImage b2, BioImage b)
3748 {
3749 BioImage res = new BioImage(b2.ID);
3750 res.ID = Images.GetImageName(b2.ID);
3751 res.series = b2.series;
3752 res.sizeZ = b2.SizeZ;
3753 int cOrig = b2.SizeC;
3754 res.sizeC = b2.SizeC + b.SizeC;
3755 res.sizeT = b2.SizeT;
3756 res.bitsPerPixel = b2.bitsPerPixel;
3757 res.imageInfo = b2.imageInfo;
3758 res.littleEndian = b2.littleEndian;
3759 res.seriesCount = b2.seriesCount;
3760 res.imagesPerSeries = res.ImageCount / res.seriesCount;
3761 res.Coords = new int[res.SizeZ, res.SizeC, res.SizeT];
3762
3763 int i = 0;
3764 int cc = 0;
3765 for (int ti = 0; ti < res.SizeT; ti++)
3766 {
3767 for (int zi = 0; zi < res.SizeZ; zi++)
3768 {
3769 for (int ci = 0; ci < res.SizeC; ci++)
3770 {
3771 ZCT co = new ZCT(zi, ci, ti);
3772 if (ci < cOrig)
3773 {
3774 //If this channel is part of the image b1 we add planes from it.
3775 Bitmap copy = new Bitmap(b2.id, b2.SizeX, b2.SizeY, b2.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b2.Buffers[i].Bytes, co, i);
3776 if (b2.littleEndian)
3777 copy.RotateFlip(AForge.RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
3778 res.Coords[zi, ci, ti] = i;
3779 res.Buffers.Add(b2.Buffers[i]);
3780 res.Buffers.Add(copy);
3781 //Lets copy the ROI's from the original image.
3782 List<ROI> anns = b2.GetAnnotations(zi, ci, ti);
3783 if (anns.Count > 0)
3784 res.Annotations.AddRange(anns);
3785 }
3786 else
3787 {
3788 //This plane is not part of b1 so we add the planes from b2 channels.
3789 Bitmap copy = new Bitmap(b.id, b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.Buffers[i].Bytes, co, i);
3790 if (b2.littleEndian)
3791 copy.RotateFlip(AForge.RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
3792 res.Coords[zi, ci, ti] = i;
3793 res.Buffers.Add(b.Buffers[i]);
3794 res.Buffers.Add(copy);
3795
3796 //Lets copy the ROI's from the original image.
3797 List<ROI> anns = b.GetAnnotations(zi, cc, ti);
3798 if (anns.Count > 0)
3799 res.Annotations.AddRange(anns);
3800 }
3801 i++;
3802 }
3803 }
3804 }
3805 for (int ci = 0; ci < res.SizeC; ci++)
3806 {
3807 if (ci < cOrig)
3808 {
3809 res.Channels.Add(b2.Channels[ci].Copy());
3810 }
3811 else
3812 {
3813 res.Channels.Add(b.Channels[cc].Copy());
3814 res.Channels[cOrig + cc].Index = ci;
3815 cc++;
3816 }
3817 }
3818 Images.AddImage(res, true);
3819 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3820 do
3821 {
3822 Thread.Sleep(100);
3823 } while (res.Buffers[res.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3824 AutoThreshold(res, false);
3825 if (res.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3826 res.StackThreshold(true);
3827 else
3828 res.StackThreshold(false);
3829 //Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.MergeChannels(" + '"' + b.ID + '"' + "," + '"' + b2.ID + '"' + ");");
3830 return res;
3831 }
3832
3844 public static BioImage MergeChannels(string bname, string b2name)
3845 {
