3846 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(bname);
3847 BioImage b2 = Images.GetImage(b2name);
3848 return MergeChannels(b, b2);
3849 }
3850
3861 public static BioImage MergeZ(BioImage b)
3862 {
3863 BioImage bi = BioImage.CopyInfo(b, true, true);
3864 int ind = 0;
3865 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
3866 {
3867 for (int t = 0; t < b.sizeT; t++)
3868 {
3869 Merge m = new Merge(b.Buffers[b.Coords[0, c, t]]);
3870 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat);
3871 for (int i = 1; i < b.sizeZ; i++)
3872 {
3873 m.OverlayImage = bm;
3874 bm = m.Apply(b.Buffers[b.Coords[i, c, t]]);
3875 }
3876 Bitmap bf = new Bitmap(b.file, bm, new ZCT(0, c, t), ind);
3877 bi.Buffers.Add(bf);
3878 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
3879 ind++;
3880 }
3881 }
3882 Images.AddImage(bi, true);
3883 bi.UpdateCoords(1, b.SizeC, b.SizeT);
3884 bi.Coordinate = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
3885 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3886 do
3887 {
3888 Thread.Sleep(100);
3889 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3890 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3891 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
3892 if (bi.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3893 bi.StackThreshold(true);
3894 else
3895 bi.StackThreshold(false);
3896 //Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.MergeZ(" + '"' + b.ID + '"' + ");");
3897 return bi;
3898 }
3899
3910 public static BioImage MergeT(BioImage b)
3911 {
3912 BioImage bi = BioImage.CopyInfo(b, true, true);
3913 int ind = 0;
3914 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
3915 {
3916 for (int z = 0; z < b.sizeZ; z++)
3917 {
3918 Merge m = new Merge(b.Buffers[b.Coords[z, c, 0]]);
3919 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat);
3920 for (int i = 1; i < b.sizeT; i++)
3921 {
3922 m.OverlayImage = bm;
3923 bm = m.Apply(b.Buffers[b.Coords[z, c, i]]);
3924 }
3925 Bitmap bf = new Bitmap(b.file, bm, new ZCT(z, c, 0), ind);
3926 bi.Buffers.Add(bf);
3927 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
3928 ind++;
3929 }
3930 }
3931 Images.AddImage(bi, true);
3932 bi.UpdateCoords(1, b.SizeC, b.SizeT);
3933 bi.Coordinate = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
3934 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3935 do
3936 {
3937 Thread.Sleep(100);
3938 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3939 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3940 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
3941 if (bi.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3942 bi.StackThreshold(true);
3943 else
3944 bi.StackThreshold(false);
3945 //Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.MergeT(" + '"' + b.ID + '"' + ");");
3946 return bi;
3947 }
3948
3956 public BioImage[] SplitChannels()
3957 {
3958 BioImage[] bms;
3959 if (isRGB)
3960 {
3961 bms = new BioImage[3];
3962 BioImage ri = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-1" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
3963 BioImage gi = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-2" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
3964 BioImage bi = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-3" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
3965
3966 ri.sizeC = 1;
3967 gi.sizeC = 1;
3968 bi.sizeC = 1;
3969 ri.sizeZ = SizeZ;
3970 gi.sizeZ = SizeZ;
3971 bi.sizeZ = SizeZ;
3972 ri.sizeT = SizeT;
3973 gi.sizeT = SizeT;
3974 bi.sizeT = SizeT;
3975
3976 ri.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
3977 gi.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
3978 bi.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
3979 int ind = 0;
3980 for (int i = 0; i < ImageCount; i++)
3981 {
3982 if (Buffers[i].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
3983 {
3984 //For 48bit images we need to use our own function as AForge won't give us a proper image.
3985 Bitmap[] bfs = Bitmap.RGB48To16(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].Stride, Buffers[i].Bytes, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind, Buffers[i].Plane);
3986 ind += 3;
3987 ri.Buffers.Add(bfs[0]);
3988 gi.Buffers.Add(bfs[1]);
3989 bi.Buffers.Add(bfs[2]);
3990 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[0]);
3991 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[1]);
3992 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[2]);
3993 ri.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3994 gi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3995 bi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3996 }
3997 else
3998 {
3999
4000 Bitmap rImage = extractR.Apply(Buffers[i]);
4001 Bitmap rbf = new Bitmap(ri.ID, rImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
4002 Statistics.CalcStatistics(rbf);
4003 ri.Buffers.Add(rbf);
4004 ri.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
4005
4006 Bitmap gImage = extractG.Apply(Buffers[i]);
4007 Bitmap gbf = new Bitmap(gi.ID, gImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
4008 Statistics.CalcStatistics(gbf);
4009 gi.Buffers.Add(gbf);
4010 gi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
4011
4012 Bitmap bImage = extractB.Apply(Buffers[i]);
4013 //Clipboard.SetImage(bImage);
4014 Bitmap bbf = new Bitmap(bi.ID, bImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
4015 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbf);
4016 bi.Buffers.Add(bbf);
4017 bi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
4018
4019 }
4020 }
4021 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
4022 do
4023 {
4024 Thread.Sleep(100);
4025 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
4026
4027 ri.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
4028 gi.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
4029 bi.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
4030 AutoThreshold(ri, false);
4031 AutoThreshold(gi, false);
4032 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
4033 Images.AddImage(ri, true);
4034 Images.AddImage(gi, true);
4035 Images.AddImage(bi, true);
4036 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
4037 bms[0] = ri;
4038 bms[1] = gi;
4039 bms[2] = bi;
4040 }
4041 else
4042 {
4043 bms = new BioImage[SizeC];
4044 for (int c = 0; c < SizeC; c++)
4045 {
4046 BioImage b = BioImage.Substack(this, 0, 0, SizeZ, c, c + 1, 0, SizeT);
4047 bms[c] = b;
4048 }
4049 }
4050
4051 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
4052 //Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.SplitChannels(" + '"' + Filename + '"' + ");");
4053 return bms;
4054 }
4055
4066 public static BioImage[] SplitChannels(BioImage bb)
4067 {
4068 return bb.SplitChannels();
4069 }
4079 public static BioImage[] SplitChannels(string name)
4080 {
4081 return SplitChannels(Images.GetImage(name));
4082 }
4083
4084 /* Creating a new instance of the LevelsLinear class. */
4085 public static LevelsLinear filter8 = new LevelsLinear();
4086 public static LevelsLinear16bpp filter16 = new LevelsLinear16bpp();
4087 private static ExtractChannel extractR = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.R);
4088 private static ExtractChannel extractG = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.G);
4089 private static ExtractChannel extractB = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.B);
4090
4091
4104 public Bitmap GetImageByCoord(int z, int c, int t)
4105 {
4106 return Buffers[Coords[z, c, t]];
4107 }
4108
4121 public Bitmap GetBitmap(int z, int c, int t)
4122 {
4123 return Buffers[Coords[z, c, t]];
4124 }
4125
4136 public int GetIndex(int ix, int iy)
4137 {
4138 if (ix > SizeX || iy > SizeY || ix < 0 || iy < 0)
4139 return 0;
4140 int stridex = SizeX;
4141 int x = ix;
4142 int y = iy;
4143 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
4144 {
4145 return (y * stridex + x) * 2;
4146 }
4147 else
4148 {
4149 return (y * stridex + x);
4150 }
4151 }
4167 public int GetIndexRGB(int ix, int iy, int index)
4168 {
4169 int stridex = SizeX;
4170 //For 16bit (2*8bit) images we multiply buffer index by 2
4171 int x = ix;
4172 int y = iy;
4173 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
4174 {
4175 return (y * stridex + x) * 2 * index;
4176 }
4177 else
4178 {
4179 return (y * stridex + x) * index;
4180 }
4181 }
4182
4192 public ushort GetValue(ZCTXY coord)
4193 {
4194 if (coord.X < 0 || coord.Y < 0 || coord.X > SizeX || coord.Y > SizeY)
4195 {
4196 return 0;
4197 }
4198 if (isRGB)
4199 {
4200 if (coord.C == 0)
4201 return GetValueRGB(coord, 0);
4202 else if (coord.C == 1)
4203 return GetValueRGB(coord, 1);
4204 else if (coord.C == 2)
4205 return GetValueRGB(coord, 2);
4206 }
4207 else
4208 return GetValueRGB(coord, 0);
4209 return 0;
4210 }
4211
4225 public ushort GetValueRGB(ZCTXY coord, int index)
4226 {
4227 int ind = 0;
4228 if (coord.C >= SizeC)
4229 {
4230 coord.C = 0;
4231 }
4232 ind = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
4233 ColorS c = Buffers[ind].GetPixel(coord.X, coord.Y);
4234 if (index == 0)
4235 return c.R;
4236 else
4237 if (index == 1)
4238 return c.G;
4239 else
4240 if (index == 2)
4241 return c.B;
4242 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException();
4243 }
4244
4259 public ushort GetValue(ZCT coord, int x, int y)
4260 {
4261 return GetValueRGB(new ZCTXY(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T, x, y), 0);
4262 }
4263
4278 public ushort GetValue(int z, int c, int t, int x, int y)
4279 {
4280 return GetValue(new ZCTXY(z, c, t, x, y));
4281 }
4282
4299 public ushort GetValueRGB(ZCT coord, int x, int y, int RGBindex)
4300 {
4301 ZCTXY c = new ZCTXY(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T, x, y);
4302 if (isRGB)
4303 {
4304 return GetValueRGB(c, RGBindex);
4305 }
4306 else
4307 return GetValue(coord, x, y);
4308 }
4330 public ushort GetValueRGB(int z, int c, int t, int x, int y, int RGBindex)
4331 {
4332 return GetValueRGB(new ZCT(z, c, t), x, y, RGBindex);
4333 }
4334
4342 public void SetValue(ZCTXY coord, ushort value)
4343 {
4344 int i = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
4345 Buffers[i].SetValue(coord.X, coord.Y, value);
4346 }
4359 public void SetValue(int x, int y, int ind, ushort value)
4360 {
4361 Buffers[ind].SetValue(x, y, value);
4362 }
4363
4377 public void SetValue(int x, int y, ZCT coord, ushort value)
4378 {
4379 SetValue(x, y, Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T], value);
4380 }
4381
4393 public void SetValueRGB(ZCTXY coord, int RGBindex, ushort value)
4394 {
4395 int ind = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
4396 Buffers[ind].SetValueRGB(coord.X, coord.Y, RGBindex, value);
4397 }
4398
4407 public Bitmap GetBitmap(ZCT coord)
4408 {
4409 return (Bitmap)GetImageByCoord(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T);
4410 }
4411
4431 public Bitmap GetFiltered(ZCT coord, IntRange r, IntRange g, IntRange b)
4432 {
4433 int index = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
4434 return GetFiltered(index, r, g, b);
4435 }
4436
4458 public Bitmap GetFiltered(int ind, IntRange r, IntRange g, IntRange b)
4459 {
4460 if (Buffers[ind].BitsPerPixel > 8)
4461 {
4462 BioImage.filter16.InRed = r;
4463 BioImage.filter16.InGreen = g;
4464 BioImage.filter16.InBlue = b;
4465 return BioImage.filter16.Apply(Buffers[ind]);
4466 }
4467 else
4468 {
4469 // set ranges
4470 BioImage.filter8.InRed = r;
4471 BioImage.filter8.InGreen = g;
4472 BioImage.filter8.InBlue = b;
4473 return BioImage.filter8.Apply(Buffers[ind]);
4474 }
4475 }
4476
4489 public UnmanagedImage GetChannelImage(int ind, short s)
4490 {
4491 Bitmap bf = Buffers[ind];
4492 if (bf.isRGB)
4493 {
4494 if (s == 0)
4495 return extractR.Apply(Buffers[ind].Image);
4496 else
4497 if (s == 1)
4498 return extractG.Apply(Buffers[ind].Image);
4499 else
4500 return extractB.Apply(Buffers[ind].Image);
4501 }
4502 else
4503 throw new InvalidOperationException();
4504 }
4505
4528 public Bitmap GetEmission(ZCT coord, IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
4529 {
4530 if (RGBChannelCount == 1)
4531 {
4532 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[Channels.Count];
4533 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
4534 {
4535 int index = Coords[coord.Z, c, coord.T];
4536 bs[c] = Buffers[index];
4537 }
4538 Bitmap bm = (Bitmap)Bitmap.GetEmissionBitmap(bs, Channels.ToArray());
4539 return bm;
4540 }
4541 else
4542 {
4543 int index = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
4544 return Buffers[index];
4545 }
4546 }
4547
4570 public Bitmap GetRGBBitmap(ZCT coord, IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
4571 {
4572 int index = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
4573 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
4574 {
4575 if (Channels.Count >= 3)
4576 {
4577 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
4578 bs[2] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index];
4579 bs[1] = Buffers[index + GChannel.Index];
4580 bs[0] = Buffers[index + BChannel.Index];
4581 return Bitmap.GetRGBBitmap(bs, rf, gf, bf);
4582 }
4583 else
4584 {
4585 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
4586 bs[2] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index];
4587 bs[1] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index + 1];
4588 bs[0] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index + 2];
4589 return Bitmap.GetRGBBitmap(bs, rf, gf, bf);
4590 }
4591 }
4592 else
4593 return Buffers[index];
4594 }
4595
4611 public static unsafe Bitmap GetBitmapRGB(int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts)
4612 {
4613 if (px == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
4614 {
4615 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
4616 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4617 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
4618 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
4619 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
4620 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
4621 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4622 {
4623 //getting the pixels of current row
4624 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
4625 int rowRGB = y * w * 4;
4626 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4627 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4628 {
4629 int indexRGB = x * 4;
4630 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
4631 row[indexRGBA + 3] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3];//byte A
4632 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
4633 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
4634 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
4635 }
4636 }
4637 //unlocking bits and disposing image
4638 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
4639 return bmp;
4640 }
4641 else if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
4642 {
4643 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
4644 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4645 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
4646 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
4647 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
4648 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
4649 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4650 {
4651 //getting the pixels of current row
4652 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
4653 int rowRGB = y * w * 3;
4654 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4655 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4656 {
4657 int indexRGB = x * 3;
4658 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
4659 row[indexRGBA + 3] = byte.MaxValue;//byte A
4660 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
4661 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
4662 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
4663 }
4664 }
4665 //unlocking bits and disposing image
4666 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
4667 return bmp;
4668 }
4669 else
4670 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
4671 {
4672 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
4673 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4674 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
4675 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
4676 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
4677 unsafe
4678 {
4679 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
4680 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4681 {
4682 //getting the pixels of current row
4683 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
4684 int rowRGB = y * w * 6;
4685 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4686 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4687 {
4688 int indexRGB = x * 6;
4689 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
4690 int b = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
4691 int g = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 2) / 255);
4692 int r = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 4) / 255);
4693 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
4694 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
4695 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(g);//byte G
4696 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(r);//byte B
4697 }
4698 }
4699 }
4700 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
4701 return bmp;
4702 }
4703 else
4704 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
4705 {
4706 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
4707 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4708 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
4709 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
4710 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
4711 unsafe
4712 {
4713 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
4714 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4715 {
4716 //getting the pixels of current row
4717 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
4718 int rowRGB = y * w;
4719 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4720 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4721 {
4722 int indexRGB = x;
4723 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
4724 byte b = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];
4725 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
4726 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
4727 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
4728 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
4729 }
4730 }
4731 }
4732 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
4733 return bmp;
4734 }
4735 else
4736 if (px == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
4737 {
4738 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
4739 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4740 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
4741 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
4742 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
4743 unsafe
4744 {
4745 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
4746 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4747 {
4748 //getting the pixels of current row
4749 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
4750 int rowRGB = y * w * 2;
4751 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4752 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4753 {
4754 int indexRGB = x * 2;
4755 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
4756 ushort b = (ushort)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
4757 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
4758 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
4759 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
4760 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
4761 }
4762 }
4763 }
4764 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
4765 return bmp;
4766 }
4767
4768 throw new NotSupportedException("Pixelformat " + px + " is not supported.");
4769 }
4770 public static Stopwatch swatch = new Stopwatch();
4771
4781 public List<ROI> GetAnnotations(ZCT coord)
4782 {
4783 List<ROI> annotations = new List<ROI>();
4784 foreach (ROI an in Annotations)
4785 {
4786 if (an == null)
4787 continue;
4788 if (an.coord == coord)
4789 annotations.Add(an);
4790 }
4791 return annotations;
4792 }
4793
4807 public List<ROI> GetAnnotations(int Z, int C, int T)
4808 {
4809 List<ROI> annotations = new List<ROI>();
4810 foreach (ROI an in Annotations)
4811 {
4812 if (an.coord.Z == Z && an.coord.Z == Z && an.coord.C == C && an.coord.T == T)
4813 annotations.Add(an);
4814 }
4815 return annotations;
4816 }
4817
4818 public bool Loading = false;
4819
4828 public static void Initialize()
4829 {
4830 if (!OMESupport())
4831 return;
4832 //We initialize OME on a seperate thread so the user doesn't have to wait for initialization to
4833 //view images.
4834 System.Threading.Thread t = new System.Threading.Thread(new System.Threading.ThreadStart(InitOME));
4835 t.Start();
4836 }
4841 private static void InitOME()
4842 {
4843 factory = new ServiceFactory();
4844 service = (OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService));
4845 reader = new ImageReader();
4846 writer = new ImageWriter();
4847 initialized = true;
4848 }
4849
4857 public static void SaveFile(string file, string ID)
4858 {
4859 string[] sts = new string[1];
4860 sts[0] = ID;
4861 SaveSeries(sts, file);
4862 }
4863
4872 public static void SaveSeries(string[] IDs, string file)
4873 {
4874 string desc = "";
4875 int stride = 0;
4876 ImageJDesc j = new ImageJDesc();
4877 BioImage bi = Images.GetImage(IDs[0]);
4878 j.FromImage(bi);
4879 desc = j.GetString();
4880 for (int fi = 0; fi < IDs.Length; fi++)
4881 {
4882 string id = IDs[fi];
4883 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(id);
4884 string fn = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(id);
4885 string dir = Path.GetDirectoryName(file);
4886 stride = b.Buffers[0].Stride;
4887
4888 //Save ROIs to CSV file.
4889 if (b.Annotations.Count > 0)
4890 {
4891 string f = dir + "//" + fn + ".csv";
4892 ExportROIsCSV(f, b.Annotations);
4893 }
4894
4895 //Embed ROI's to image description.
4896 for (int i = 0; i < b.Annotations.Count; i++)
4897 {
4898 desc += "-ROI:" + b.series + ":" + ROIToString(b.Annotations[i]) + NewLine;
4899 }
4900 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
4901 {
4902 string cj = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(c.info, Formatting.None);
4903 desc += "-Channel:" + fi + ":" + cj + NewLine;
4904 }
4905 string json = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(b.imageInfo, Formatting.None);
4906 desc += "-ImageInfo:" + fi + ":" + json + NewLine;
4907 }
4908
4909 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "w");
4910 for (int fi = 0; fi < IDs.Length; fi++)
4911 {
4912 int im = 0;
4913 string id = IDs[fi];
4914 //Progress pr = new //Progress(file, "Saving");
4915 //pr.Show();
4916 //Application.DoEvents();
4917 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(id);
4918 int sizec = 1;
4919 if (!b.isRGB)
4920 {
4921 sizec = b.SizeC;
4922 }
4923 byte[] buffer;
4924 for (int c = 0; c < sizec; c++)
4925 {
4926 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
4927 {
4928 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
4929 {
4930 image.SetDirectory((short)(im + (b.Buffers.Count * fi)));
4931 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH, b.SizeX);
4932 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION, desc);
4933 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH, b.SizeY);
4934 image.SetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE, b.bitsPerPixel);
4935 image.SetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL, b.RGBChannelCount);
4936 image.SetField(TiffTag.ROWSPERSTRIP, b.SizeY);
4937 image.SetField(TiffTag.ORIENTATION, BitMiracle.LibTiff.Classic.Orientation.TOPLEFT);
4938 image.SetField(TiffTag.PLANARCONFIG, PlanarConfig.CONTIG);
4939 image.SetField(TiffTag.PHOTOMETRIC, Photometric.MINISBLACK);
4940 image.SetField(TiffTag.ROWSPERSTRIP, image.DefaultStripSize(0));
4941 if (b.PhysicalSizeX != -1 && b.PhysicalSizeY != -1)
4942 {
4943 image.SetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION, (b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX) / ((b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX) * b.PhysicalSizeX));
4944 image.SetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION, (b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY) / ((b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY) * b.PhysicalSizeY));
4945 image.SetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT, ResUnit.NONE);
4946 }
4947 else
4948 {
4949 image.SetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION, 100.0);
4950 image.SetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION, 100.0);
4951 image.SetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT, ResUnit.INCH);
4952 }
4953 // specify that it's a page within the multipage file
4954 image.SetField(TiffTag.SUBFILETYPE, FileType.PAGE);
4955 // specify the page number
4956 buffer = b.Buffers[im].GetSaveBytes(true);
4957 image.SetField(TiffTag.PAGENUMBER, im + (b.Buffers.Count * fi), b.Buffers.Count * IDs.Length);
4958 for (int i = 0, offset = 0; i < b.SizeY; i++)
4959 {
4960 image.WriteScanline(buffer, offset, i, 0);
4961 offset += stride;
4962 }
4963 image.WriteDirectory();
4964 //pr.Update//ProgressF((float)im / (float)b.ImageCount);
4965 //Application.DoEvents();
4966 im++;
4967 }
4968 }
4969 }
4970 //pr.Close();
4971 }
4972 image.Dispose();
4973
4974 }
4975
4989 public static BioImage[] OpenSeries(string file, bool tab)
4990 {
4991 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
4992 int pages = image.NumberOfDirectories();
4993 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
4994 int sp = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
4995 ImageJDesc imDesc = new ImageJDesc();
4996 int count = 1;
4997 if (f != null)
4998 {
4999 string desc = f[0].ToString();
5000 if (desc.StartsWith("ImageJ"))
5001 {
5002 imDesc.SetString(desc);
5003 if (imDesc.channels != 0)
5004 count = imDesc.channels;
5005 }
5006 }
5007 int scount = (pages * sp) / count;
5008 BioImage[] bs = new BioImage[pages];
5009 image.Close();
5010 for (int i = 0; i < pages; i++)
5011 {
5012 bs[i] = OpenFile(file, i, tab, true);
5013 }
5014 return bs;
5015 }
5016
5026 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file)
5027 {
5028 return OpenFile(file, 0, true, true);
5029 }
5041 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, bool tab)
5042 {
5043 return OpenFile(file, 0, tab, true);
5044 }
5045
5066 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, int series, bool tab, bool addToImages)
5067 {
5068 return OpenFile(file, series, tab, addToImages, false, 0, 0, 0, 0);
5069 }
5077 static bool IsTiffTiled(string imagePath)
5078 {
5079 if (imagePath.EndsWith(".tif") || imagePath.EndsWith(".tiff"))
5080 {
5081 using (Tiff tiff = Tiff.Open(imagePath, "r"))
5082 {
5083 if (tiff == null)
5084 {
5085 throw new Exception("Failed to open TIFF image.");
5086 }
5087 bool t = tiff.IsTiled();
5088 tiff.Close();
5089 return t;
5090 }
5091 }
5092 else return false;
5093 }
5105 static void InitDirectoryResolution(BioImage b, Tiff image, ImageJDesc jdesc = null)
5106 {
5107 Resolution res = new Resolution();
5108 FieldValue[] rs = image.GetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT);
5109 string unit = "NONE";
5110 if (rs != null)
5111 unit = rs[0].ToString();
5112 if (jdesc != null)
5113 res.PhysicalSizeZ = jdesc.finterval;
5114 else
5115 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 2.54 / 96;
5116 if (unit == "CENTIMETER")
5117 {
5118 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
5119 {
5120 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
5121 res.PhysicalSizeX = (1000 / x);
5122 }
5123 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
5124 {
5125 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
5126 res.PhysicalSizeY = (1000 / y);
5127 }
5128 }
5129 else
5130 if (unit == "INCH")
5131 {
5132 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
5133 {
5134 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
5135 res.PhysicalSizeX = (2.54 / x) / 2.54;
5136 }
5137 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
5138 {
5139 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
5140 res.PhysicalSizeY = (2.54 / y) / 2.54;
5141 }
5142 }
5143 else
5144 if (unit == "NONE")
5145 {
5146 if (jdesc != null)
5147 {
5148 if (jdesc.unit == "micron")
5149 {
5150 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
5151 {
5152 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
5153 res.PhysicalSizeX = (2.54 / x) / 2.54;
5154 }
5155 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
5156 {
5157 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
5158 res.PhysicalSizeY = (2.54 / y) / 2.54;
5159 }
5160 }
5161 }
5162 else
5163 {
5164 res.PhysicalSizeX = 2.54 / 96;
5165 res.PhysicalSizeY = 2.54 / 96;
5166 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 2.54 / 96;
5167 }
5168 }
5169 res.SizeX = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH)[0].ToInt();
5170 res.SizeY = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH)[0].ToInt();
5171 int bitsPerPixel = image.GetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE)[0].ToInt();
5172 int RGBChannelCount = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
5173 res.PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, bitsPerPixel);
5174 b.Resolutions.Add(res);
5175 }
5176
5204 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, int series, bool tab, bool addToImages, bool tile, int tileX, int tileY, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY)
5205 {
5206 string fs = file.Replace("\\", "/");
5207 vips = VipsSupport(file);
5208 Console.WriteLine("Opening BioImage: " + file);
5209 bool ome = isOME(file);
5210 if (ome) return OpenOME(file, series, tab, addToImages, tile, tileX, tileY, tileSizeX, tileSizeY);
5211 bool tiled = IsTiffTiled(file);
5212 Console.WriteLine("IsTiled=" + tiled.ToString());
5213 tile = tiled;
5214
5215 Stopwatch st = new Stopwatch();
5216 st.Start();
5217 status = "Opening Image";
5218 progFile = file;
5219 progressValue = 0;
5220 BioImage b = new BioImage(file);
5221 if (tiled && file.EndsWith(".tif") && !file.EndsWith(".ome.tif"))
5222 {
5223 //To open this we need libvips
5224 vips = VipsSupport(b.file);
5225 }
5226 b.series = series;
5227 b.file = file;
5228 b.ispyramidal = tiled;
5229 string fn = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(file);
5230 string dir = Path.GetDirectoryName(file);
5231 if (File.Exists(fn + ".csv"))
5232 {
5233 string f = dir + "//" + fn + ".csv";
5234 b.Annotations = BioImage.ImportROIsCSV(f);
5235 }
5236 if (file.EndsWith("tif") || file.EndsWith("tiff") || file.EndsWith("TIF") || file.EndsWith("TIFF"))
5237 {
5238 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
5239 b.tifRead = image;
5240 int SizeX = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH)[0].ToInt();
5241 int SizeY = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH)[0].ToInt();
5242 b.bitsPerPixel = image.GetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE)[0].ToInt();
5243 b.littleEndian = !image.IsBigEndian();
5244 int RGBChannelCount = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
5245 string desc = "";
5246
5247 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
5248 desc = f[0].ToString();
5249 ImageJDesc imDesc = null;
5250 b.sizeC = 1;
5251 b.sizeT = 1;
5252 b.sizeZ = 1;
5253 if (f != null && !tile)
5254 {
5255 imDesc = new ImageJDesc();
5256 desc = f[0].ToString();
5257 if (desc.StartsWith("ImageJ"))
5258 {
5259 imDesc.SetString(desc);
5260 if (imDesc.channels != 0)
5261 b.sizeC = imDesc.channels;
5262 else
5263 b.sizeC = 1;
5264 if (imDesc.slices != 0)
5265 b.sizeZ = imDesc.slices;
5266 else
5267 b.sizeZ = 1;
5268 if (imDesc.frames != 0)
5269 b.sizeT = imDesc.frames;
5270 else
5271 b.sizeT = 1;
5272 if (imDesc.finterval != 0)
5273 b.frameInterval = imDesc.finterval;
5274 else
5275 b.frameInterval = 1;
5276 if (imDesc.spacing != 0)
5277 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = imDesc.spacing;
5278 else
5279 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
5280 }
5281 }
5282 int stride = 0;
5283 PixelFormat PixelFormat;
5284 if (RGBChannelCount == 1)
5285 {
5286 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5287 {
5288 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
5289 stride = SizeX * 2;
5290 }
5291 else
5292 {
5293 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
5294 stride = SizeX;
5295 }
5296 }
5297 else
5298 if (RGBChannelCount == 3)
5299 {
5300 b.sizeC = 1;
5301 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5302 {
5303 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
5304 stride = SizeX * 2 * 3;
5305 }
5306 else
5307 {
5308 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
5309 stride = SizeX * 3;
5310 }
5311 }
5312 else
5313 {
5314 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
5315 stride = SizeX * 4;
5316 }
5317
5318 string[] sts = desc.Split('\n');
5319 int index = 0;
5320 for (int i = 0; i < sts.Length; i++)
5321 {
5322 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-Channel"))
5323 {
5324 string val = sts[i].Substring(9);
5325 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
5326 int serie = int.Parse(val);
5327 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 7)
5328 {
5329 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
5330 Channel.ChannelInfo info = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<Channel.ChannelInfo>(cht);
5331 Channel ch = new Channel(index, b.bitsPerPixel, info.SamplesPerPixel);
5332 ch.info = info;
5333 b.Channels.Add(ch);
5334 if (index == 0)
5335 {
5336 b.rgbChannels[0] = 0;
5337 }
5338 else
5339 if (index == 1)
5340 {
5341 b.rgbChannels[1] = 1;
5342 }
5343 else
5344 if (index == 2)
5345 {
5346 b.rgbChannels[2] = 2;
5347 }
5348 index++;
5349 }
5350 }
5351 else
5352 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ROI"))
5353 {
5354 string val = sts[i].Substring(5);
5355 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
5356 int serie = int.Parse(val);
5357 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 7)
5358 {
5359 string s = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf("ROI:") + 4, sts[i].Length - (sts[i].IndexOf("ROI:") + 4));
5360 string ro = s.Substring(s.IndexOf(":") + 1, s.Length - (s.IndexOf(':') + 1));
5361 ROI roi = StringToROI(ro);
5362 b.Annotations.Add(roi);
5363 }
5364 }
5365 else
5366 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ImageInfo"))
5367 {
5368 string val = sts[i].Substring(11);
5369 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
5370 int serie = int.Parse(val);
5371 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 10)
5372 {
5373 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
5374 b.imageInfo = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<ImageInfo>(cht);
5375 }
5376 }
5377 }
5378 b.Coords = new int[b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT];
5379 if (tiled && tileSizeX == 0 && tileSizeY == 0)
5380 {
5381 tileSizeX = 1920;
5382 tileSizeY = 1080;
5383 }
5384
5385 //If this is a tiff file not made by Bio we init channels based on RGBChannels.
5386 if (b.Channels.Count == 0)
5387 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, RGBChannelCount));
5388
5389 //Lets check to see the channels are correctly defined in this file
5390 for (int ch = 0; ch < b.Channels.Count; ch++)
5391 {
5392 if (b.Channels[ch].SamplesPerPixel != RGBChannelCount)
5393 {
5394 b.Channels[ch].SamplesPerPixel = RGBChannelCount;
5395 }
5396 }
5397
5398 b.Buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
5399 int pages = image.NumberOfDirectories() / b.seriesCount;
5400 int str = image.ScanlineSize();
5401 bool inter = true;
5402 if (stride != str)
5403 inter = false;
5404 InitDirectoryResolution(b, image, imDesc);
5405 if (tiled)
5406 {
5407 Console.WriteLine("Opening tiles.");
5408 if (vips)
5409 OpenVips(b, b.Resolutions.Count);
5410 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
5411 {
5412 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
5413 {
5414 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
5415 {
5416 Bitmap bmp = GetTile(b, new ZCT(z, c, t), series, tileX, tileY, tileSizeX, tileSizeY);
5417 b.Buffers.Add(bmp);
5418 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bmp);
5419 }
5420 }
5421 }
5422 Console.WriteLine("Calculating statisitics.");
5423 }
5424 else
5425 {
5426 for (int p = series * pages; p < (series + 1) * pages; p++)
5427 {
5428 image.SetDirectory((short)p);
5429
5430 byte[] bytes = new byte[stride * SizeY];
5431 for (int im = 0, offset = 0; im < SizeY; im++)
5432 {
5433 image.ReadScanline(bytes, offset, im, 0);
5434 offset += stride;
5435 }
5436 Bitmap inf = new Bitmap(file, SizeX, SizeY, b.Resolutions[series].PixelFormat, bytes, new ZCT(0, 0, 0), p, null, b.littleEndian, inter);
5437 b.Buffers.Add(inf);
5438 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
5439 progressValue = (int)(p / (float)(series + 1) * pages);
5440 }
5441 }
5442 image.Close();
5443 b.UpdateCoords();
5444 }
5445 if (b.StageSizeX == -1)
5446 {
5447 b.imageInfo.Series = 0;
5448 b.StageSizeX = 0;
5449 b.StageSizeY = 0;
5450 b.StageSizeZ = 0;
5451 }
5452 b.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ * b.SizeZ));
5453
5454 //If file is ome and we have OME support then check for annotation in metadata.
5455 if (ome && OmeSupport)
5456 {
5457 b.Annotations.AddRange(OpenOMEROIs(file, series));
5458 }
5459
5460 //We wait for histogram image statistics calculation
5461 do
5462 {
5463 Thread.Sleep(50);
5464 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
5465 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
5466 AutoThreshold(b, false);
5467 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5468 b.StackThreshold(true);
5469 else
5470 b.StackThreshold(false);
5471 //Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.Open(" + '"' + file + '"' + ");");
5472 if (addToImages)
5473 Images.AddImage(b, tab);
5474 //pr.Close();
5475 //pr.Dispose();
5476 st.Stop();
5477 b.loadTimeMS = st.ElapsedMilliseconds;
5478 Console.WriteLine("BioImage loaded " + b.ToString());
5479 return b;
5480 }
5481
5491 public static bool isTiffSeries(string file)
5492 {
5493 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
5494 string desc = "";
5495 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
5496 image.Close();
5497 string[] sts = desc.Split('\n');
5498 int index = 0;
5499 for (int i = 0; i < sts.Length; i++)
5500 {
5501 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ImageInfo"))
5502 {
5503 string val = sts[i].Substring(11);
5504 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
5505 int serie = int.Parse(val);
5506 if (sts[i].Length > 10)
5507 {
5508 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
5509 ImageInfo info = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<ImageInfo>(cht);
5510 if (info.Series > 1)
5511 return true;
5512 else
5513 return false;
5514 }
5515 }
5516 }
5517 return false;
5518 }
5528 public static bool isOME(string file)
5529 {
5530 if (file.EndsWith("ome.tif") || file.EndsWith("ome.tiff"))
5531 {
5532 return true;
5533 }
5534 if (file.EndsWith(".tif") || file.EndsWith(".TIF") || file.EndsWith("tiff") || file.EndsWith("TIFF"))
5535 {
5536 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
5537 string desc = "";
5538 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
5539 desc = f[0].ToString();
5540 image.Close();
5541 if (desc.Contains("OME-XML"))
5542 return true;
5543 else
5544 return false;
5545 }
5546 if (!(file.EndsWith("png") || file.EndsWith("PNG") || file.EndsWith("jpg") || file.EndsWith("JPG") ||
5547 file.EndsWith("jpeg") || file.EndsWith("JPEG") || file.EndsWith("bmp") || file.EndsWith("BMP")))
5548 {
5549 return true;
5550 }
5551 else return false;
5552 }
5553
5564 public static bool isOMESeries(string file)
5565 {
5566 if (!isOME(file))
5567 return false;
5568 ImageReader reader = new ImageReader();
5569 var meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)new ServiceFactory().getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
5570 reader.setMetadataStore((MetadataStore)meta);
5571 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
5572 reader.setId(file);
5573 bool ser = false;
5574 if (reader.getSeriesCount() > 1)
5575 ser = true;
5576 reader.close();
5577 reader = null;
5578 return ser;
5579 }
5592 public static void SaveOME(string file, string ID)
5593 {
5594 if (!OMESupport())
5595 return;
5596 BioImage[] sts = new BioImage[1];
5597 sts[0] = Images.GetImage(ID);
5598 SaveOMESeries(sts, file, BioImage.Planes);
5599 }
5600
5613 public static void SaveOME(BioImage image, string file)
5614 {
5615 if (!OMESupport())
5616 return;
5617 BioImage[] sts = new BioImage[1];
5618 sts[0] = image;
5619 SaveOMESeries(sts, file, BioImage.Planes);
5620 }
5626 public static void SaveOMESeries(BioImage[] files, string f, bool planes)
5627 {
5628 if (!OMESupport())
5629 return;
5630 if (File.Exists(f))
5631 File.Delete(f);
5632 loci.formats.meta.IMetadata omexml = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
5633 progressValue = 0;
5634 status = "Saving OME Image Metadata.";
5635 for (int fi = 0; fi < files.Length; fi++)
5636 {
5637 int serie = fi;
5638 BioImage b = files[fi];
5639 // create OME-XML metadata store
5640 omexml.setImageID("Image:" + serie, serie);
5641 omexml.setPixelsID("Pixels:" + serie, serie);
5642 omexml.setPixelsInterleaved(java.lang.Boolean.TRUE, serie);
5643 omexml.setPixelsDimensionOrder(ome.xml.model.enums.DimensionOrder.XYCZT, serie);
5644 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5645 omexml.setPixelsType(ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16, serie);
5646 else
5647 omexml.setPixelsType(ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8, serie);
5648 omexml.setPixelsSizeX(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeX)), serie);
5649 omexml.setPixelsSizeY(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeY)), serie);
5650 omexml.setPixelsSizeZ(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeZ)), serie);
5651 int samples = 1;
5652 if (b.isRGB)
5653 samples = 3;
5654 omexml.setPixelsSizeC(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeC)), serie);
5655 omexml.setPixelsSizeT(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeT)), serie);
5656 if (BitConverter.IsLittleEndian)
5657 omexml.setPixelsBigEndian(java.lang.Boolean.FALSE, serie);
5658 else
5659 omexml.setPixelsBigEndian(java.lang.Boolean.TRUE, serie);
5660 ome.units.quantity.Length p1 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeX), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5661 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeX(p1, serie);
5662 ome.units.quantity.Length p2 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeY), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5663 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeY(p2, serie);
5664 ome.units.quantity.Length p3 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeZ), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5665 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(p3, serie);
5666 ome.units.quantity.Length s1 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5667 omexml.setStageLabelX(s1, serie);
5668 ome.units.quantity.Length s2 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5669 omexml.setStageLabelY(s2, serie);
5670 ome.units.quantity.Length s3 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5671 omexml.setStageLabelZ(s3, serie);
5672 omexml.setStageLabelName("StageLabel:" + serie, serie);
5673
5674 for (int channel = 0; channel < b.Channels.Count; channel++)
5675 {
5676 Channel c = b.Channels[channel];
5677 for (int r = 0; r < c.range.Length; r++)
5678 {
5679 omexml.setChannelID("Channel:" + channel + ":" + serie, serie, channel + r);
5680 omexml.setChannelSamplesPerPixel(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), serie, channel + r);
5681 if (c.LightSourceWavelength != 0)
5682 {
5683 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsID("LightSourceSettings:" + channel, serie, channel + r);
5684 ome.units.quantity.Length lw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.LightSourceWavelength), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
5685 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsWavelength(lw, serie, channel + r);
5686 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(PercentFraction.valueOf(c.LightSourceAttenuation), serie, channel + r);
5687 }
5688 omexml.setChannelName(c.Name, serie, channel + r);
5689 if (c.Color != null)
5690 {
5691 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(c.Color.Value.R, c.Color.Value.G, c.Color.Value.B, c.Color.Value.A);
5692 omexml.setChannelColor(col, serie, channel + r);
5693 }
5694 if (c.Emission != 0)
5695 {
5696 ome.units.quantity.Length em = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.Emission), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
5697 omexml.setChannelEmissionWavelength(em, serie, channel + r);
5698 ome.units.quantity.Length ex = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.Excitation), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
5699 omexml.setChannelExcitationWavelength(ex, serie, channel + r);
5700 }
5701 /*
5702 if (c.ContrastMethod != null)
5703 {
5704 ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod cm = (ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod)Enum.Parse(typeof(ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod), c.ContrastMethod);
5705 omexml.setChannelContrastMethod(cm, serie, channel + r);
5706 }
5707 if (c.IlluminationType != null)
5708 {
5709 ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType il = (ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType)Enum.Parse(typeof(ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType), c.IlluminationType.ToUpper());
5710 omexml.setChannelIlluminationType(il, serie, channel + r);
5711 }
5712 if (c.AcquisitionMode != null)
5713 {
5714 ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode am = (ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode)Enum.Parse(typeof(ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode), c.AcquisitionMode.ToUpper());
5715 omexml.setChannelAcquisitionMode(am, serie, channel + r);
5716 }
5717 */
5718 omexml.setChannelFluor(c.Fluor, serie, channel + r);
5719 if (c.LightSourceIntensity != 0)
5720 {
5721 ome.units.quantity.Power pw = new ome.units.quantity.Power(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.LightSourceIntensity), ome.units.UNITS.VOLT);
5722 omexml.setLightEmittingDiodePower(pw, serie, channel + r);
5723 omexml.setLightEmittingDiodeID(c.DiodeName, serie, channel + r);
5724 }
5725 }
5726 }
5727
5728 int i = 0;
5729 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
5730 {
5731 if (an.roiID == "")
5732 omexml.setROIID("ROI:" + i.ToString() + ":" + serie, i);
5733 else
5734 omexml.setROIID(an.roiID, i);
5735 omexml.setROIName(an.roiName, i);
5736 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Point)
5737 {
5738 if (an.id != "")
5739 omexml.setPointID(an.id, i, serie);
5740 else
5741 omexml.setPointID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5742 omexml.setPointX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.X)), i, serie);
5743 omexml.setPointY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Y)), i, serie);
5744 omexml.setPointTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5745 omexml.setPointTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5746 omexml.setPointTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5747 if (an.Text != "")
5748 omexml.setPointText(an.Text, i, serie);
5749 else
5750 omexml.setPointText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5751 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5752 omexml.setPointFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5753 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5754 omexml.setPointStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5755 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5756 omexml.setPointStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5757 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5758 omexml.setPointFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5759 }
5760 else
5761 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Polygon || an.type == ROI.Type.Freeform)
5762 {
5763 if (an.id != "")
5764 omexml.setPolygonID(an.id, i, serie);
5765 else
5766 omexml.setPolygonID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5767 omexml.setPolygonPoints(an.PointsToString(b), i, serie);
5768 omexml.setPolygonTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5769 omexml.setPolygonTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5770 omexml.setPolygonTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5771 if (an.Text != "")
5772 omexml.setPolygonText(an.Text, i, serie);
5773 else
5774 omexml.setPolygonText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5775 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5776 omexml.setPolygonFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5777 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5778 omexml.setPolygonStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5779 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5780 omexml.setPolygonStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5781 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5782 omexml.setPolygonFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5783 }
5784 else
5785 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Rectangle)
5786 {
5787 if (an.id != "")
5788 omexml.setRectangleID(an.id, i, serie);
5789 else
5790 omexml.setRectangleID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5791 omexml.setRectangleWidth(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeX(an.W)), i, serie);
5792 omexml.setRectangleHeight(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeY(an.H)), i, serie);
5793 omexml.setRectangleX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
5794 omexml.setRectangleY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
5795 omexml.setRectangleTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5796 omexml.setRectangleTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5797 omexml.setRectangleTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5798 omexml.setRectangleText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5799 if (an.Text != "")
5800 omexml.setRectangleText(an.Text, i, serie);
5801 else
5802 omexml.setRectangleText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5803 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5804 omexml.setRectangleFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5805 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5806 omexml.setRectangleStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5807 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5808 omexml.setRectangleStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5809 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5810 omexml.setRectangleFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5811 }
5812 else
5813 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Line)
5814 {
5815 if (an.id != "")
5816 omexml.setLineID(an.id, i, serie);
5817 else
5818 omexml.setLineID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5819 omexml.setLineX1(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.GetPoint(0).X)), i, serie);
5820 omexml.setLineY1(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.GetPoint(0).Y)), i, serie);
5821 omexml.setLineX2(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.GetPoint(1).X)), i, serie);
5822 omexml.setLineY2(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.GetPoint(1).Y)), i, serie);
5823 omexml.setLineTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5824 omexml.setLineTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5825 omexml.setLineTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5826 if (an.Text != "")
5827 omexml.setLineText(an.Text, i, serie);
5828 else
5829 omexml.setLineText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5830 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5831 omexml.setLineFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5832 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5833 omexml.setLineStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5834 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5835 omexml.setLineStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5836 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5837 omexml.setLineFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5838 }
5839 else
5840 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Ellipse)
5841 {
5842
5843 if (an.id != "")
5844 omexml.setEllipseID(an.id, i, serie);
5845 else
5846 omexml.setEllipseID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5847 //We need to change System.Drawing.Rectangle to ellipse radius;
5848 double w = (double)an.W / 2;
5849 double h = (double)an.H / 2;
5850 omexml.setEllipseRadiusX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeX(w)), i, serie);
5851 omexml.setEllipseRadiusY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeY(h)), i, serie);
5852
5853 double x = an.Point.X + w;
5854 double y = an.Point.Y + h;
5855 omexml.setEllipseX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(x)), i, serie);
5856 omexml.setEllipseY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(y)), i, serie);
5857 omexml.setEllipseTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5858 omexml.setEllipseTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5859 omexml.setEllipseTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5860 if (an.Text != "")
5861 omexml.setEllipseText(an.Text, i, serie);
5862 else
5863 omexml.setEllipseText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5864 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5865 omexml.setEllipseFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5866 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5867 omexml.setEllipseStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5868 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5869 omexml.setEllipseStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5870 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5871 omexml.setEllipseFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5872 }
5873 else
5874 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Label)
5875 {
5876 if (an.id != "")
5877 omexml.setLabelID(an.id, i, serie);
5878 else
5879 omexml.setLabelID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5880 omexml.setLabelX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
5881 omexml.setLabelY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
5882 omexml.setLabelTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5883 omexml.setLabelTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5884 omexml.setLabelTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5885 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5886 if (an.Text != "")
5887 omexml.setLabelText(an.Text, i, serie);
5888 else
5889 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5890 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5891 omexml.setLabelFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5892 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5893 omexml.setLabelStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5894 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5895 omexml.setLabelStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5896 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5897 omexml.setLabelFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5898 }
5899 i++;
5900 }
5901
5902 if (b.Buffers[0].Plane != null && planes)
5903 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
5904 {
5905 //Correct order of parameters.
5906 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Delta != 0)
5907 {
5908 ome.units.quantity.Time t = new ome.units.quantity.Time(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Delta), ome.units.UNITS.MILLISECOND);
5909 omexml.setPlaneDeltaT(t, serie, bu);
5910 }
5911 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure != 0)
5912 {
5913 ome.units.quantity.Time et = new ome.units.quantity.Time(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure), ome.units.UNITS.MILLISECOND);
5914 omexml.setPlaneExposureTime(et, serie, bu);
5915 }
5916 ome.units.quantity.Length lx = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5917 ome.units.quantity.Length ly = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5918 ome.units.quantity.Length lz = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5919 omexml.setPlanePositionX(lx, serie, bu);
5920 omexml.setPlanePositionY(ly, serie, bu);
5921 omexml.setPlanePositionZ(lz, serie, bu);
5922 omexml.setPlaneTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), serie, bu);
5923 omexml.setPlaneTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), serie, bu);
5924 omexml.setPlaneTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), serie, bu);
5925
5926 omexml.setTiffDataPlaneCount(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), serie, bu);
5927 omexml.setTiffDataIFD(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(bu)), serie, bu);
5928 omexml.setTiffDataFirstC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), serie, bu);
5929 omexml.setTiffDataFirstZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), serie, bu);
5930 omexml.setTiffDataFirstT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), serie, bu);
5931
5932 }
5933
5934 }
5935 writer.setMetadataRetrieve(omexml);
5936 f = f.Replace("\\", "/");
5937 writer.setId(f);
5938 status = "Saving OME Image Planes.";
5939 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
5940 {
5941 BioImage b = files[i];
5942 writer.setSeries(i);
5943 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
5944 {
5945 writer.saveBytes(bu, b.Buffers[bu].GetSaveBytes(BitConverter.IsLittleEndian));
5946 }
5947 }
5948 bool stop = false;
5949 do
5950 {
5951 try
5952 {
5953 writer.close();
5954 stop = true;
5955 }
5956 catch (Exception e)
5957 {
5958 //Scripting.LogLine(e.Message);
5959 }
5960
5961 } while (!stop);
5962 }
5976 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file, bool tab)
5977 {
5978 if (!OMESupport())
5979 return null;
5980 return OpenOMESeries(file, tab, true)[0];
5981 }
5982
5994 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file, int serie)
5995 {
5996 if (!OMESupport())
5997 return null;
5998 //Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.OpenOME(\"" + file + "\"," + serie + ");");
5999 return OpenOME(file, serie, true, false, false, 0, 0, 0, 0);
6000 }
6001
6019 public static BioImage FilesToStack(string[] files, int sizeZ, int sizeC, int sizeT)
6020 {
6021 BioImage b = new BioImage(files[0]);
6022 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
6023 {
6024 BioImage bb = OpenFile(files[i], false);
6025 b.Buffers.AddRange(bb.Buffers);
6026 }
6027 b.UpdateCoords(sizeZ, sizeC, sizeT);
6028 Images.AddImage(b, true);
6029 return b;
6030 }
6031
6044 public static BioImage FolderToStack(string path, bool tab)
6045 {
6046 string[] files = Directory.GetFiles(path);
6047 BioImage b = new BioImage(files[0]);
6048 int z = 0;
6049 int c = 0;
6050 int t = 0;
6051 BioImage bb = null;
6052 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
6053 {
6054 string[] st = files[i].Split('_');
6055 if (st.Length > 3)
6056 {
6057 z = int.Parse(st[1].Replace("Z", ""));
6058 c = int.Parse(st[2].Replace("C", ""));
6059 t = int.Parse(st[3].Replace("T", ""));
6060 }
6061 bb = OpenFile(files[i], tab);
6062 b.Buffers.AddRange(bb.Buffers);
6063 }
6064 if (z == 0)
6065 {
6066 /*TO DO
6067 ImagesToStack im = new ImagesToStack();
6068 if (im.ShowDialog() != DialogResult.OK)
6069 return null;
6070 b.UpdateCoords(im.SizeZ, im.SizeC, im.SizeT);
6071 */
6072 }
6073 else
6074 b.UpdateCoords(z + 1, c + 1, t + 1);
6075 Images.AddImage(b, tab);
6076 //Recorder.AddLine("BioImage.FolderToStack(\"" + path + "\");");
6077 return b;
6078 }
6079
6080 static bool vips = false;
6090 public static void OpenVips(BioImage b, int pagecount)
6091 {
6092 try
6093 {
6094 for (int i = 0; i < pagecount; i++)
6095 {
6096 b.vipPages.Add(NetVips.Image.Tiffload(b.file, i));
6097 }
6098 }
6099 catch (Exception e)
6100 {
6101 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
6102 }
6103
6104 }
6127 public static Bitmap ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff(BioImage b, int x, int y, int width, int height, int res)
6128 {
6129 try
6130 {
6131 NetVips.Image subImage = b.vipPages[res].Crop(x, y, width, height);
6132 if (b.vipPages[res].Format == Enums.BandFormat.Uchar)
6133 {
6134 Bitmap bm;
6135 byte[] imageData = subImage.WriteToMemory();
6136 if (b.Resolutions[res].RGBChannelsCount == 3)
6137 bm = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, imageData, new ZCT(), b.file);
6138 else
6139 bm = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed, imageData, new ZCT(), b.file);
6140 return bm;
6141
6142 }
6143 else if (b.vipPages[res].Format == Enums.BandFormat.Ushort)
6144 {
6145 Bitmap bm;
6146 byte[] imageData = subImage.WriteToMemory();
6147 if (b.Resolutions[res].RGBChannelsCount == 3)
6148 bm = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb, imageData, new ZCT(), b.file);
6149 else
6150 bm = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale, imageData, new ZCT(), b.file);
6151 return bm;
6152 }
6153 }
6154 catch (Exception ex)
6155 {
6156 Console.WriteLine($"Error: {ex.Message}");
6157 return null;
6158 }
6159 return null;
6160 }
6161 /* Reading the OME-XML metadata and creating a BioImage object. */
6162 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file, int serie, bool tab, bool addToImages, bool tile, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY)
6163 {
6164 if (tileSizeX == 0)
6165 tileSizeX = 1920;
6166 if (tileSizeY == 0)
6167 tileSizeY = 1080;
6168 do
6169 {
6170 Thread.Sleep(50);
6171 } while (!initialized);
6172 if (file == null || file == "")
6173 throw new InvalidDataException("File is empty or null");
6174 progressValue = 0;
6175 progFile = file;
6176 BioImage b = new BioImage(file);
6177 b.Loading = true;
6178 if (b.meta == null)
6179 b.meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)new ServiceFactory().getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
6180 string f = file.Replace("\\", "/");
6181 string cf = reader.getCurrentFile();
6182 if (cf != null)
6183 cf = cf.Replace("\\", "/");
6184 if (cf != f)
6185 {
6186 status = "Opening OME Image.";
6187 reader.close();
6188 reader.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
6189 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
6190 reader.setId(file);
6191 }
6192 status = "Reading OME Metadata.";
6193 reader.setSeries(serie);
6194 int RGBChannelCount = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
6195 if (reader.getOptimalTileWidth() != reader.getSizeX())
6196 {
6197 b.ispyramidal = true;
6198 tile = true;
6199 }
6200 //OME reader.getBitsPerPixel(); sometimes returns incorrect bits per pixel, like when opening ImageJ images.
6201 //So we check the pixel type from xml metadata and if it fails we use the readers value.
6202 PixelFormat PixelFormat;
6203 try
6204 {
6205 PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, b.meta.getPixelsType(serie));
6206 }
6207 catch (Exception)
6208 {
6209 PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, reader.getBitsPerPixel());
6210 }
6211
6212 b.id = file;
6213 b.file = file;
6214 int SizeX, SizeY;
6215 SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
6216 SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
6217 int SizeZ = reader.getSizeZ();
6218 b.sizeC = reader.getSizeC();
6219 b.sizeZ = reader.getSizeZ();
6220 b.sizeT = reader.getSizeT();
6221 b.littleEndian = reader.isLittleEndian();
6222 b.seriesCount = reader.getSeriesCount();
6223 b.imagesPerSeries = reader.getImageCount();
6224 b.bitsPerPixel = reader.getBitsPerPixel();
6225 b.series = serie;
6226 string order = reader.getDimensionOrder();
6227
6228 //Lets get the channels and initialize them
6229 int i = 0;
6230 while (true)
6231 {
6232 Channel ch = new Channel(i, b.bitsPerPixel, 1);
6233 bool def = false;
6234 try
6235 {
6236 if (b.meta.getChannelSamplesPerPixel(serie, i) != null)
6237 {
6238 int s = b.meta.getChannelSamplesPerPixel(serie, i).getNumberValue().intValue();
6239 ch.SamplesPerPixel = s;
6240 def = true;
6241 }
6242 if (b.meta.getChannelName(serie, i) != null)
6243 ch.Name = b.meta.getChannelName(serie, i);
6244 if (b.meta.getChannelAcquisitionMode(serie, i) != null)
6245 ch.AcquisitionMode = b.meta.getChannelAcquisitionMode(serie, i).ToString();
6246 if (b.meta.getChannelID(serie, i) != null)
6247 ch.info.ID = b.meta.getChannelID(serie, i);
6248 if (b.meta.getChannelFluor(serie, i) != null)
6249 ch.Fluor = b.meta.getChannelFluor(serie, i);
6250 if (b.meta.getChannelColor(serie, i) != null)
6251 {
6252 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color cc = b.meta.getChannelColor(serie, i);
6253 ch.Color = Color.FromArgb(cc.getRed(), cc.getGreen(), cc.getBlue());
6254 }
6255 if (b.meta.getChannelIlluminationType(serie, i) != null)
6256 ch.IlluminationType = b.meta.getChannelIlluminationType(serie, i).ToString();
6257 if (b.meta.getChannelContrastMethod(serie, i) != null)
6258 ch.ContrastMethod = b.meta.getChannelContrastMethod(serie, i).ToString();
6259 if (b.meta.getChannelEmissionWavelength(serie, i) != null)
6260 ch.Emission = b.meta.getChannelEmissionWavelength(serie, i).value().intValue();
6261 if (b.meta.getChannelExcitationWavelength(serie, i) != null)
6262 ch.Excitation = b.meta.getChannelExcitationWavelength(serie, i).value().intValue();
6263 if (b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodePower(serie, i) != null)
6264 ch.LightSourceIntensity = b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodePower(serie, i).value().doubleValue();
6265 if (b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodeID(serie, i) != null)
6266 ch.DiodeName = b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodeID(serie, i);
6267 if (b.meta.getChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(serie, i) != null)
6268 ch.LightSourceAttenuation = b.meta.getChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(serie, i).toString();
6269
6270 }
6271 catch (Exception e)
6272 {
6273 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
6274 }
6275 //If this channel is not defined we have loaded all the channels in the file.
6276 if (!def)
6277 break;
6278 else
6279 b.Channels.Add(ch);
6280 if (i == 0)
6281 {
6282 b.rgbChannels[0] = 0;
6283 }
6284 else
6285 if (i == 1)
6286 {
6287 b.rgbChannels[1] = 1;
6288 }
6289 else
6290 if (i == 2)
6291 {
6292 b.rgbChannels[2] = 2;
6293 }
6294 i++;
6295 }
6296
6297 //If the file doens't have channels we initialize them.
6298 if (b.Channels.Count == 0)
6299 {
6300 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, RGBChannelCount));
6301 }
6302
6303 //Bioformats gives a size of 3 for C when saved in ImageJ as RGB. We need to correct for this as C should be 1 for RGB.
6304 if ((PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb) && b.SizeC == 3)
6305 {
6306 b.sizeC = 1;
6307 }
6308 b.Coords = new int[b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT];
6309
6310 int resc = reader.getResolutionCount();
6311 for (int s = 0; s < b.seriesCount; s++)
6312 {
6313 reader.setSeries(s);
6314 for (int r = 0; r < reader.getResolutionCount(); r++)
6315 {
6316 Resolution res = new Resolution();
6317 try
6318 {
6319 int rgbc = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
6320 int bps = reader.getBitsPerPixel();
6321 PixelFormat px;
6322 try
6323 {
6324 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, b.meta.getPixelsType(s));
6325 }
6326 catch (Exception)
6327 {
6328 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, bps);
6329 }
6330 res.PixelFormat = px;
6331 res.SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
6332 res.SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
6333 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(s) != null)
6334 {
6335 res.PhysicalSizeX = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(s).value().doubleValue();
6336 }
6337 else
6338 res.PhysicalSizeX = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
6339 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(s) != null)
6340 {
6341 res.PhysicalSizeY = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(s).value().doubleValue();
6342 }
6343 else
6344 res.PhysicalSizeY = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
6345
6346 if (b.meta.getStageLabelX(s) != null)
6347 res.StageSizeX = b.meta.getStageLabelX(s).value().doubleValue();
6348 if (b.meta.getStageLabelY(s) != null)
6349 res.StageSizeY = b.meta.getStageLabelY(s).value().doubleValue();
6350 if (b.meta.getStageLabelZ(s) != null)
6351 res.StageSizeZ = b.meta.getStageLabelZ(s).value().doubleValue();
6352 else
6353 res.StageSizeZ = 1;
6354 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(s) != null)
6355 {
6356 res.PhysicalSizeZ = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(s).value().doubleValue();
6357 }
6358 else
6359 {
6360 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
6361 }
6362 }
6363 catch (Exception e)
6364 {
6365 Console.WriteLine("No Stage Coordinates. PhysicalSize:(" + res.PhysicalSizeX + "," + res.PhysicalSizeY + "," + res.PhysicalSizeZ + ")");
6366 }
6367 b.Resolutions.Add(res);
6368 }
6369 }
6370 b.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(b.PhysicalSizeX * SizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY * SizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
6371
6372 int rc = b.meta.getROICount();
6373 for (int im = 0; im < rc; im++)
6374 {
6375 string roiID = b.meta.getROIID(im);
6376 string roiName = b.meta.getROIName(im);
6377 ZCT co = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
6378 int scount = 1;
6379 try
6380 {
6381 scount = b.meta.getShapeCount(im);
6382 }
6383 catch (Exception e)
6384 {
6385 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
6386 }
6387 for (int sc = 0; sc < scount; sc++)
6388 {
6389 string type = b.meta.getShapeType(im, sc);
6390 ROI an = new ROI();
6391 an.roiID = roiID;
6392 an.roiName = roiName;
6393 an.shapeIndex = sc;
6394 if (type == "Point")
6395 {
6396 an.type = ROI.Type.Point;
6397 an.id = b.meta.getPointID(im, sc);
6398 double dx = b.meta.getPointX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6399 double dy = b.meta.getPointY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6400 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(dx, dy)));
6401 an.coord = new ZCT();
6402 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPointTheZ(im, sc);
6403 if (nz != null)
6404 an.coord.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6405 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPointTheC(im, sc);
6406 if (nc != null)
6407 an.coord.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6408 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPointTheT(im, sc);
6409 if (nt != null)
6410 an.coord.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6411 an.Text = b.meta.getPointText(im, sc);
6412 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
6413 if (fl != null)
6414 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6415 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc);
6416 if (ff != null)
6417 an.family = ff.name();
6418 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
6419 if (col != null)
6420 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6421 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPointStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6422 if (fw != null)
6423 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6424 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
6425 if (colf != null)
6426 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6427 continue;
6428 }
6429 else
6430 if (type == "Line")
6431 {
6432 an.type = ROI.Type.Line;
6433 an.id = b.meta.getLineID(im, sc);
6434 double px1 = b.meta.getLineX1(im, sc).doubleValue();
6435 double py1 = b.meta.getLineY1(im, sc).doubleValue();
6436 double px2 = b.meta.getLineX2(im, sc).doubleValue();
6437 double py2 = b.meta.getLineY2(im, sc).doubleValue();
6438 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(px1, py1)));
6439 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(px2, py2)));
6440 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getLineTheZ(im, sc);
6441 if (nz != null)
6442 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6443 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getLineTheC(im, sc);
6444 if (nc != null)
6445 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6446 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getLineTheT(im, sc);
6447 if (nt != null)
6448 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6449 an.coord = co;
6450 an.Text = b.meta.getLineText(im, sc);
6451 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getLineFontSize(im, sc);
6452 if (fl != null)
6453 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6454 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getLineFontFamily(im, sc);
6455 if (ff != null)
6456 an.family = ff.name();
6457 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getLineStrokeColor(im, sc);
6458 if (col != null)
6459 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6460 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getLineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6461 if (fw != null)
6462 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6463 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getLineFillColor(im, sc);
6464 if (colf != null)
6465 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6466 continue;
6467 }
6468 else
6469 if (type == "Rectangle")
6470 {
6471 an.type = ROI.Type.Rectangle;
6472 an.id = b.meta.getRectangleID(im, sc);
6473 double px = b.meta.getRectangleX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6474 double py = b.meta.getRectangleY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6475 double pw = b.meta.getRectangleWidth(im, sc).doubleValue();
6476 double ph = b.meta.getRectangleHeight(im, sc).doubleValue();
6477 an.Rect = b.ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, pw, ph));
6478 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getRectangleTheZ(im, sc);
6479 if (nz != null)
6480 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6481 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getRectangleTheC(im, sc);
6482 if (nc != null)
6483 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6484 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getRectangleTheT(im, sc);
6485 if (nt != null)
6486 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6487 an.coord = co;
6488
6489 an.Text = b.meta.getRectangleText(im, sc);
6490 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getRectangleFontSize(im, sc);
6491 if (fl != null)
6492 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6493 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getRectangleFontFamily(im, sc);
6494 if (ff != null)
6495 an.family = ff.name();
6496 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getRectangleStrokeColor(im, sc);
6497 if (col != null)
6498 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6499 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getRectangleStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6500 if (fw != null)
6501 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6502 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getRectangleFillColor(im, sc);
6503 if (colf != null)
6504 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6505 ome.xml.model.enums.FillRule fr = b.meta.getRectangleFillRule(im, sc);
6506 continue;
6507 }
6508 else
6509 if (type == "Ellipse")
6510 {
6511 an.type = ROI.Type.Ellipse;
6512 an.id = b.meta.getEllipseID(im, sc);
6513 double px = b.meta.getEllipseX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6514 double py = b.meta.getEllipseY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6515 double ew = b.meta.getEllipseRadiusX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6516 double eh = b.meta.getEllipseRadiusY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6517 //We convert the ellipse radius to Rectangle
6518 double w = ew * 2;
6519 double h = eh * 2;
6520 double x = px - ew;
6521 double y = py - eh;
6522 an.Rect = b.ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(x, y, w, h));
6523 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getEllipseTheZ(im, sc);
6524 if (nz != null)
6525 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6526 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getEllipseTheC(im, sc);
6527 if (nc != null)
6528 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6529 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getEllipseTheT(im, sc);
6530 if (nt != null)
6531 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6532 an.coord = co;
6533 an.Text = b.meta.getEllipseText(im, sc);
6534 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getEllipseFontSize(im, sc);
6535 if (fl != null)
6536 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6537 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getEllipseFontFamily(im, sc);
6538 if (ff != null)
6539 an.family = ff.name();
6540 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getEllipseStrokeColor(im, sc);
6541 if (col != null)
6542 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6543 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getEllipseStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6544 if (fw != null)
6545 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6546 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getEllipseFillColor(im, sc);
6547 if (colf != null)
6548 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6549 }
6550 else
6551 if (type == "Polygon")
6552 {
6553 an.type = ROI.Type.Polygon;
6554 an.id = b.meta.getPolygonID(im, sc);
6555 an.closed = true;
6556 string pxs = b.meta.getPolygonPoints(im, sc);
6557 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
6558 pts = b.ToStageSpace(pts);
6559 if (pts.Length > 100)
6560 {
6561 an.type = ROI.Type.Freeform;
6562 }
6563 an.AddPoints(pts);
6564 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPolygonTheZ(im, sc);
6565 if (nz != null)
6566 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6567 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPolygonTheC(im, sc);
6568 if (nc != null)
6569 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6570 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPolygonTheT(im, sc);
6571 if (nt != null)
6572 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6573 an.coord = co;
6574 an.Text = b.meta.getPolygonText(im, sc);
6575 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPolygonFontSize(im, sc);
6576 if (fl != null)
6577 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6578 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPolygonFontFamily(im, sc);
6579 if (ff != null)
6580 an.family = ff.name();
6581 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPolygonStrokeColor(im, sc);
6582 if (col != null)
6583 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6584 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPolygonStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6585 if (fw != null)
6586 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6587 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPolygonFillColor(im, sc);
6588 if (colf != null)
6589 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6590 }
6591 else
6592 if (type == "Polyline")
6593 {
6594 an.type = ROI.Type.Polyline;
6595 an.id = b.meta.getPolylineID(im, sc);
6596 string pxs = b.meta.getPolylinePoints(im, sc);
6597 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
6598 for (int pi = 0; pi < pts.Length; pi++)
6599 {
6600 pts[pi] = b.ToStageSpace(pts[pi]);
6601 }
6602 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(pxs));
6603 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPolylineTheZ(im, sc);
6604 if (nz != null)
6605 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6606 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPolylineTheC(im, sc);
6607 if (nc != null)
6608 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6609 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPolylineTheT(im, sc);
6610 if (nt != null)
6611 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6612 an.coord = co;
6613 an.Text = b.meta.getPolylineText(im, sc);
6614 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPolylineFontSize(im, sc);
6615 if (fl != null)
6616 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6617 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPolylineFontFamily(im, sc);
6618 if (ff != null)
6619 an.family = ff.name();
6620 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPolylineStrokeColor(im, sc);
6621 if (col != null)
6622 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6623 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPolylineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6624 if (fw != null)
6625 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6626 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPolylineFillColor(im, sc);
6627 if (colf != null)
6628 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6629 }
6630 else
6631 if (type == "Label")
6632 {
6633 an.type = ROI.Type.Label;
6634 an.id = b.meta.getLabelID(im, sc);
6635
6636 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getLabelTheZ(im, sc);
6637 if (nz != null)
6638 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6639 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getLabelTheC(im, sc);
6640 if (nc != null)
6641 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6642 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getLabelTheT(im, sc);
6643 if (nt != null)
6644 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6645 an.coord = co;
6646
6647 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getLabelFontSize(im, sc);
6648 if (fl != null)
6649 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6650 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getLabelFontFamily(im, sc);
6651 if (ff != null)
6652 an.family = ff.name();
6653 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getLabelStrokeColor(im, sc);
6654 if (col != null)
6655 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6656 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getLabelStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6657 if (fw != null)
6658 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6659 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getLabelFillColor(im, sc);
6660 if (colf != null)
6661 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6662 PointD p = new PointD(b.meta.getLabelX(im, sc).doubleValue(), b.meta.getLabelY(im, sc).doubleValue());
6663 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(p));
6664 an.Text = b.meta.getLabelText(im, sc);
6665 }
6666 if (b.Volume.Intersects(new PointD(an.BoundingBox.X, an.BoundingBox.Y)))
6667 b.Annotations.Add(an);
6668 }
6669 }
6670
6671 List<string> serFiles = new List<string>();
6672 serFiles.AddRange(reader.getSeriesUsedFiles());
6673
6674 b.Buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
6675 // read the image data bytes
6676 int pages = reader.getImageCount();
6677 bool inter = reader.isInterleaved();
