6678 int z = 0;
6679 int c = 0;
6680 int t = 0;
6681 status = "Reading OME Image Planes";
6682 if (!tile)
6683 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
6684 {
6685 Bitmap bf;
6686 progressValue = (int)p / pages;
6687 byte[] bytes = reader.openBytes(p);
6688 bf = new Bitmap(file, SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, bytes, new ZCT(z, c, t), p, null, b.littleEndian, inter);
6689 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
6690 Statistics.CalcStatistics(b.Buffers.Last());
6691 }
6692 else
6693 {
6694 b.Buffers.Add(GetTile(b, new ZCT(z, c, t), serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY));
6695 Statistics.CalcStatistics(b.Buffers.Last());
6696 }
6697 int pls;
6698 try
6699 {
6700 pls = b.meta.getPlaneCount(serie);
6701 }
6702 catch (Exception)
6703 {
6704 pls = 0;
6705 }
6706 if (pls == b.Buffers.Count)
6707 for (int bi = 0; bi < b.Buffers.Count; bi++)
6708 {
6709 Plane pl = new Plane();
6710 pl.Coordinate = new ZCT();
6711 double px = 0; double py = 0; double pz = 0;
6712 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionX(serie, bi) != null)
6713 px = b.meta.getPlanePositionX(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6714 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionY(serie, bi) != null)
6715 py = b.meta.getPlanePositionY(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6716 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionZ(serie, bi) != null)
6717 pz = b.meta.getPlanePositionZ(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6718 pl.Location = new AForge.Point3D(px, py, pz);
6719 int cc = 0; int zc = 0; int tc = 0;
6720 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi) != null)
6721 cc = b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
6722 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi) != null)
6723 zc = b.meta.getPlaneTheZ(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
6724 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi) != null)
6725 tc = b.meta.getPlaneTheT(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
6726 pl.Coordinate = new ZCT(zc, cc, tc);
6727 if (b.meta.getPlaneDeltaT(serie, bi) != null)
6728 pl.Delta = b.meta.getPlaneDeltaT(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6729 if (b.meta.getPlaneExposureTime(serie, bi) != null)
6730 pl.Exposure = b.meta.getPlaneExposureTime(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6731 b.Buffers[bi].Plane = pl;
6732 }
6733
6734 b.UpdateCoords(b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT, order);
6735 //We wait for histogram image statistics calculation
6736 do
6737 {
6738 Thread.Sleep(50);
6739 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6740 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
6741
6742 AutoThreshold(b, true);
6743 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
6744 b.StackThreshold(true);
6745 else
6746 b.StackThreshold(false);
6747 if (addToImages)
6748 Images.AddImage(b, tab);
6749 //We use a try block to close the reader as sometimes this will cause an error.
6750 bool stop = false;
6751 do
6752 {
6753 try
6754 {
6755 reader.close();
6756 stop = true;
6757 }
6758 catch (Exception)
6759 {
6760
6761 }
6762 } while (!stop);
6763 b.Loading = false;
6764 return b;
6765 }
6766 public ImageReader imRead;
6767 public Tiff tifRead;
6768 static Bitmap bm;
6781 public static Bitmap GetTile(BioImage b, ZCT coord, int serie, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY)
6782 {
6783 if ((!OMESupport() && b.file.EndsWith("ome.tif") && vips) || (b.file.EndsWith(".tif") && vips))
6784 {
6785 //We can get a tile faster with libvips rather than bioformats.
6786 //and incase we are on mac we can't use bioformats due to IKVM not supporting mac.
6787 return ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff(b, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY, serie);
6788 }
6789 string curfile = reader.getCurrentFile();
6790 if (curfile == null)
6791 {
6792 b.meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
6793 reader.close();
6794 reader.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
6795 b.file = b.file.Replace("\\", "/");
6796 reader.setId(b.file);
6797 }
6798 else
6799 {
6800 if (curfile != b.file)
6801 {
6802 reader.close();
6803 b.meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
6804 reader.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
6805 b.file = b.file.Replace("\\", "/");
6806 reader.setId(b.file);
6807 }
6808 }
6809 if (reader.getSeries() != serie)
6810 reader.setSeries(serie);
6811 int SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
6812 int SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
6813 int p = b.Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
6814 bool littleEndian = reader.isLittleEndian();
6815 PixelFormat PixelFormat = b.Resolutions[serie].PixelFormat;
6816 if (tilex < 0)
6817 tilex = 0;
6818 if (tiley < 0)
6819 tiley = 0;
6820 if (tilex >= SizeX)
6821 tilex = SizeX;
6822 if (tiley >= SizeY)
6823 tiley = SizeY;
6824 int sx = tileSizeX;
6825 if (tilex + tileSizeX > SizeX)
6826 sx -= (tilex + tileSizeX) - (SizeX);
6827 int sy = tileSizeY;
6828 if (tiley + tileSizeY > SizeY)
6829 sy -= (tiley + tileSizeY) - (SizeY);
6830 //For some reason calling openBytes with 1x1px area causes an exception.
6831 if (sx <= 1)
6832 return null;
6833 if (sy <= 1)
6834 return null;
6835 byte[] bytesr = reader.openBytes(b.Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T], tilex, tiley, sx, sy);
6836 bool interleaved = reader.isInterleaved();
6837 if (bm != null)
6838 bm.Dispose();
6839 bm = new Bitmap(b.file, sx, sy, PixelFormat, bytesr, coord, p, null, littleEndian, interleaved);
6840 if (bm.isRGB && !interleaved)
6841 bm.SwitchRedBlue();
6842 return bm;
6843 }
6844
6845 public static void SaveOMEStiched(BioImage[] bms, string file, string compression)
6846 {
6847 if (File.Exists(file))
6848 File.Delete(file);
6849 loci.formats.meta.IMetadata omexml = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
6850 //We need to go through the images and find the ones belonging to each resolution.
6851 //As well we need to determine the dimensions of the tiles.
6852 Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>> bis = new Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>>();
6853 Dictionary<double, Point3D> min = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
6854 Dictionary<double, Point3D> max = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
6855 for (int i = 0; i < bms.Length; i++)
6856 {
6857 Resolution res = bms[i].Resolutions[bms[i].Resolution];
6858 if (bis.ContainsKey(res.PhysicalSizeX))
6859 {
6860 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
6861 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
6862 {
6863 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
6864 }
6865 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
6866 {
6867 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
6868 }
6869 }
6870 else
6871 {
6872 bis.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new List<BioImage>());
6873 min.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(res.StageSizeX, res.StageSizeY, res.StageSizeZ));
6874 max.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(res.StageSizeX, res.StageSizeY, res.StageSizeZ));
6875 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
6876 }
6877 }
6878 int s = 0;
6879 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
6880 {
6881 int xi = 1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].X - min[px].X) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[bis[px][0].Resolution].VolumeWidth);
6882 int yi = 1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].Y - min[px].Y) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[bis[px][0].Resolution].VolumeHeight);
6883 BioImage b = bis[px][0];
6884 int serie = s;
6885 // create OME-XML metadata store.
6886 omexml.setImageID("Image:" + serie, serie);
6887 omexml.setPixelsID("Pixels:" + serie, serie);
6888 omexml.setPixelsInterleaved(java.lang.Boolean.TRUE, serie);
6889 omexml.setPixelsDimensionOrder(ome.xml.model.enums.DimensionOrder.XYCZT, serie);
6890 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
6891 omexml.setPixelsType(ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16, serie);
6892 else
6893 omexml.setPixelsType(ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8, serie);
6894 omexml.setPixelsSizeX(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeX * xi)), serie);
6895 omexml.setPixelsSizeY(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeY * yi)), serie);
6896 omexml.setPixelsSizeZ(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeZ)), serie);
6897 omexml.setPixelsSizeC(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeC)), serie);
6898 omexml.setPixelsSizeT(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeT)), serie);
6899 if (BitConverter.IsLittleEndian)
6900 omexml.setPixelsBigEndian(java.lang.Boolean.FALSE, serie);
6901 else
6902 omexml.setPixelsBigEndian(java.lang.Boolean.TRUE, serie);
6903 ome.units.quantity.Length p1 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeX), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
6904 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeX(p1, serie);
6905 ome.units.quantity.Length p2 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeY), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
6906 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeY(p2, serie);
6907 ome.units.quantity.Length p3 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeZ), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
6908 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(p3, serie);
6909 ome.units.quantity.Length s1 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
6910 omexml.setStageLabelX(s1, serie);
6911 ome.units.quantity.Length s2 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
6912 omexml.setStageLabelY(s2, serie);
6913 ome.units.quantity.Length s3 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
6914 omexml.setStageLabelZ(s3, serie);
6915 omexml.setStageLabelName("StageLabel:" + serie, serie);
6916
6917 for (int channel = 0; channel < b.Channels.Count; channel++)
6918 {
6919 Channel c = b.Channels[channel];
6920 for (int r = 0; r < c.range.Length; r++)
6921 {
6922 omexml.setChannelID("Channel:" + channel + ":" + serie, serie, channel + r);
6923 omexml.setChannelSamplesPerPixel(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), serie, channel + r);
6924 if (c.LightSourceWavelength != 0)
6925 {
6926 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsID("LightSourceSettings:" + channel, serie, channel + r);
6927 ome.units.quantity.Length lw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.LightSourceWavelength), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
6928 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsWavelength(lw, serie, channel + r);
6929 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(PercentFraction.valueOf(c.LightSourceAttenuation), serie, channel + r);
6930 }
6931 omexml.setChannelName(c.Name, serie, channel + r);
6932 if (c.Color != null)
6933 {
6934 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(c.Color.Value.R, c.Color.Value.G, c.Color.Value.B, c.Color.Value.A);
6935 omexml.setChannelColor(col, serie, channel + r);
6936 }
6937 if (c.Emission != 0)
6938 {
6939 ome.units.quantity.Length em = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.Emission), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
6940 omexml.setChannelEmissionWavelength(em, serie, channel + r);
6941 ome.units.quantity.Length ex = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.Excitation), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
6942 omexml.setChannelExcitationWavelength(ex, serie, channel + r);
6943 }
6944 omexml.setChannelContrastMethod((ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod)Enum.Parse(typeof(ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod), c.ContrastMethod), serie, channel + r);
6945 omexml.setChannelFluor(c.Fluor, serie, channel + r);
6946 omexml.setChannelIlluminationType((ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType)Enum.Parse(typeof(ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType), c.IlluminationType), serie, channel + r);
6947
6948 if (c.LightSourceIntensity != 0)
6949 {
6950 ome.units.quantity.Power pw = new ome.units.quantity.Power(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.LightSourceIntensity), ome.units.UNITS.VOLT);
6951 omexml.setLightEmittingDiodePower(pw, serie, channel + r);
6952 omexml.setLightEmittingDiodeID(c.DiodeName, serie, channel + r);
6953 }
6954 if (c.AcquisitionMode != null)
6955 omexml.setChannelAcquisitionMode((ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode)Enum.Parse(typeof(ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode),c.AcquisitionMode), serie, channel + r);
6956 }
6957 }
6958
6959 int i = 0;
6960 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
6961 {
6962 if (an.roiID == "")
6963 omexml.setROIID("ROI:" + i.ToString() + ":" + serie, i);
6964 else
6965 omexml.setROIID(an.roiID, i);
6966 omexml.setROIName(an.roiName, i);
6967 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Point)
6968 {
6969 if (an.id != "")
6970 omexml.setPointID(an.id, i, serie);
6971 else
6972 omexml.setPointID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
6973 omexml.setPointX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.X)), i, serie);
6974 omexml.setPointY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Y)), i, serie);
6975 omexml.setPointTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
6976 omexml.setPointTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
6977 omexml.setPointTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
6978 if (an.Text != "")
6979 omexml.setPointText(an.Text, i, serie);
6980 else
6981 omexml.setPointText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
6982 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
6983 omexml.setPointFontSize(fl, i, serie);
6984 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
6985 omexml.setPointStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
6986 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
6987 omexml.setPointStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
6988 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
6989 omexml.setPointFillColor(colf, i, serie);
6990 }
6991 else
6992 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Polygon || an.type == ROI.Type.Freeform)
6993 {
6994 if (an.id != "")
6995 omexml.setPolygonID(an.id, i, serie);
6996 else
6997 omexml.setPolygonID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
6998 omexml.setPolygonPoints(an.PointsToString(b), i, serie);
6999 omexml.setPolygonTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
7000 omexml.setPolygonTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
7001 omexml.setPolygonTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
7002 if (an.Text != "")
7003 omexml.setPolygonText(an.Text, i, serie);
7004 else
7005 omexml.setPolygonText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
7006 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
7007 omexml.setPolygonFontSize(fl, i, serie);
7008 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
7009 omexml.setPolygonStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
7010 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
7011 omexml.setPolygonStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
7012 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
7013 omexml.setPolygonFillColor(colf, i, serie);
7014 }
7015 else
7016 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Rectangle)
7017 {
7018 if (an.id != "")
7019 omexml.setRectangleID(an.id, i, serie);
7020 else
7021 omexml.setRectangleID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
7022 omexml.setRectangleWidth(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeX(an.W)), i, serie);
7023 omexml.setRectangleHeight(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeY(an.H)), i, serie);
7024 omexml.setRectangleX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
7025 omexml.setRectangleY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
7026 omexml.setRectangleTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
7027 omexml.setRectangleTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
7028 omexml.setRectangleTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
7029 omexml.setRectangleText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
7030 if (an.Text != "")
7031 omexml.setRectangleText(an.Text, i, serie);
7032 else
7033 omexml.setRectangleText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
7034 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
7035 omexml.setRectangleFontSize(fl, i, serie);
7036 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
7037 omexml.setRectangleStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
7038 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
7039 omexml.setRectangleStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
7040 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
7041 omexml.setRectangleFillColor(colf, i, serie);
7042 }
7043 else
7044 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Line)
7045 {
7046 if (an.id != "")
7047 omexml.setLineID(an.id, i, serie);
7048 else
7049 omexml.setLineID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
7050 omexml.setLineX1(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.GetPoint(0).X)), i, serie);
7051 omexml.setLineY1(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.GetPoint(0).Y)), i, serie);
7052 omexml.setLineX2(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.GetPoint(1).X)), i, serie);
7053 omexml.setLineY2(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.GetPoint(1).Y)), i, serie);
7054 omexml.setLineTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
7055 omexml.setLineTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
7056 omexml.setLineTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
7057 if (an.Text != "")
7058 omexml.setLineText(an.Text, i, serie);
7059 else
7060 omexml.setLineText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
7061 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
7062 omexml.setLineFontSize(fl, i, serie);
7063 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
7064 omexml.setLineStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
7065 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
7066 omexml.setLineStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
7067 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
7068 omexml.setLineFillColor(colf, i, serie);
7069 }
7070 else
7071 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Ellipse)
7072 {
7073
7074 if (an.id != "")
7075 omexml.setEllipseID(an.id, i, serie);
7076 else
7077 omexml.setEllipseID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
7078 //We need to change System.Drawing.Rectangle to ellipse radius;
7079 double w = (double)an.W / 2;
7080 double h = (double)an.H / 2;
7081 omexml.setEllipseRadiusX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeX(w)), i, serie);
7082 omexml.setEllipseRadiusY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeY(h)), i, serie);
7083
7084 double x = an.Point.X + w;
7085 double y = an.Point.Y + h;
7086 omexml.setEllipseX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(x)), i, serie);
7087 omexml.setEllipseY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(y)), i, serie);
7088 omexml.setEllipseTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
7089 omexml.setEllipseTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
7090 omexml.setEllipseTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
7091 if (an.Text != "")
7092 omexml.setEllipseText(an.Text, i, serie);
7093 else
7094 omexml.setEllipseText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
7095 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
7096 omexml.setEllipseFontSize(fl, i, serie);
7097 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
7098 omexml.setEllipseStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
7099 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
7100 omexml.setEllipseStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
7101 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
7102 omexml.setEllipseFillColor(colf, i, serie);
7103 }
7104 else
7105 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Label)
7106 {
7107 if (an.id != "")
7108 omexml.setLabelID(an.id, i, serie);
7109 else
7110 omexml.setLabelID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
7111 omexml.setLabelX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
7112 omexml.setLabelY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
7113 omexml.setLabelTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
7114 omexml.setLabelTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
7115 omexml.setLabelTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
7116 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
7117 if (an.Text != "")
7118 omexml.setLabelText(an.Text, i, serie);
7119 else
7120 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
7121 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
7122 omexml.setLabelFontSize(fl, i, serie);
7123 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
7124 omexml.setLabelStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
7125 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
7126 omexml.setLabelStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
7127 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
7128 omexml.setLabelFillColor(colf, i, serie);
7129 }
7130 i++;
7131 }
7132 /*
7133 if (b.Buffers[0].Plane != null)
7134 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
7135 {
7136 //Correct order of parameters.
7137 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Delta != 0)
7138 {
7139 ome.units.quantity.Time t = new ome.units.quantity.Time(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Delta), ome.units.UNITS.MILLISECOND);
7140 omexml.setPlaneDeltaT(t, bu, serie);
7141 }
7142 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure != 0)
7143 {
7144 ome.units.quantity.Time et = new ome.units.quantity.Time(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure), ome.units.UNITS.MILLISECOND);
7145 omexml.setPlaneExposureTime(et, bu, serie);
7146 }
7147 ome.units.quantity.Length lx = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
7148 ome.units.quantity.Length ly = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
7149 ome.units.quantity.Length lz = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
7150 omexml.setPlanePositionX(lx, bu, serie);
7151 omexml.setPlanePositionY(ly, bu, serie);
7152 omexml.setPlanePositionZ(lz, bu, serie);
7153 omexml.setPlaneTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), bu, serie);
7154 omexml.setPlaneTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), bu, serie);
7155 omexml.setPlaneTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), bu, serie);
7156
7157 omexml.setTiffDataPlaneCount(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), bu, serie);
7158 omexml.setTiffDataIFD(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(bu)), bu, serie);
7159 omexml.setTiffDataFirstC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), bu, serie);
7160 omexml.setTiffDataFirstZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), bu, serie);
7161 omexml.setTiffDataFirstT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), bu, serie);
7162
7163 }
7164 */
7165 s++;
7166 }
7167 writer.setMetadataRetrieve(omexml);
7168 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
7169 writer.setId(file);
7170 writer.setCompression(compression);
7171 s = 0;
7172 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
7173 {
7174 writer.setSeries(s);
7175 PointD p = new PointD(max[px].X - min[px].X, max[px].Y - min[px].Y);
7176 for (int i = 0; i < bis[px].Count; i++)
7177 {
7178 BioImage b = bis[px][i];
7179 writer.setTileSizeX(b.SizeX);
7180 writer.setTileSizeY(b.SizeY);
7181 double dx = Math.Ceiling((bis[px][i].StageSizeX - min[px].X) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[bis[px][i].Resolution].VolumeWidth);
7182 double dy = Math.Ceiling((bis[px][i].StageSizeY - min[px].Y) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[bis[px][i].Resolution].VolumeHeight);
7183 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
7184 {
7185 byte[] bt = b.Buffers[bu].GetSaveBytes(BitConverter.IsLittleEndian);
7186 writer.saveBytes(bu, bt, (int)dx * b.SizeX, (int)dy * b.SizeY, b.SizeX, b.SizeY);
7187 }
7188 progress = (int)((float)i / bis[px].Count)*100;
7189 }
7190 }
7191 bool stop = false;
7192 do
7193 {
7194 try
7195 {
7196 writer.close();
7197 stop = true;
7198 }
7199 catch (Exception e)
7200 {
7201 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
7202 }
7203 } while (!stop);
7204 }
7216 private static int GetBands(PixelFormat format)
7217 {
7218 switch (format)
7219 {
7220 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed: return 1;
7221 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale: return 1;
7222 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb: return 3;
7223 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb:
7224 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppPArgb:
7225 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb:
7226 return 4;
7227 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb:
7228 return 3;
7229 default:
7230 throw new NotSupportedException($"Unsupported pixel format: {format}");
7231 }
7232 }
7243 public static void SaveOMEPyramidal(BioImage[] bms, string file, Enums.ForeignTiffCompression compression, int compressionLevel)
7244 {
7245 if (File.Exists(file))
7246 File.Delete(file);
7247 //We need to go through the images and find the ones belonging to each resolution.
7248 //As well we need to determine the dimensions of the tiles.
7249 Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>> bis = new Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>>();
7250 Dictionary<double, Point3D> min = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
7251 Dictionary<double, Point3D> max = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
7252 for (int i = 0; i < bms.Length; i++)
7253 {
7254 Resolution res = bms[i].Resolutions[bms[i].Resolution];
7255 if (bis.ContainsKey(res.PhysicalSizeX))
7256 {
7257 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
7258 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
7259 {
7260 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
7261 }
7262 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
7263 {
7264 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
7265 }
7266 }
7267 else
7268 {
7269 bis.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new List<BioImage>());
7270 min.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue));
7271 max.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(double.MinValue, double.MinValue, double.MinValue));
7272 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
7273 {
7274 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
7275 }
7276 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
7277 {
7278 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
7279 }
7280 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
7281 }
7282 }
7283 int s = 0;
7284 //We determine the sizes of each resolution.
7285 Dictionary<double, AForge.Size> ss = new Dictionary<double, AForge.Size>();
7286 int minx = int.MaxValue;
7287 int miny = int.MaxValue;
7288 double last = 0;
7289 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
7290 {
7291 int xs = (1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].X - min[px].X) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[0].VolumeWidth)) * bis[px][0].SizeX;
7292 int ys = (1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].Y - min[px].Y) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[0].VolumeHeight)) * bis[px][0].SizeY;
7293 if (minx > xs)
7294 minx = xs;
7295 if (miny > ys)
7296 miny = ys;
7297 ss.Add(px, new AForge.Size(xs, ys));
7298 last = px;
7299 }
7300 s = 0;
7301 string met = "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\" standalone=\"no\"?>" +
7302 "<OME xmlns=\"http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06\" " +
7303 "xmlns:xsi=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance\" " +
7304 "xsi:schemaLocation=\"http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06 http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06/ome.xsd\">";
7305 NetVips.Image img = null;
7306 int ib = 0;
7307
7308 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
7309 {
7310 int c = bis[px][s].SizeC;
7311 if (bis[px][s].Buffers[0].isRGB)
7312 c = 3;
7313 string endian = (bis[px][s].Buffers[0].LittleEndian).ToString().ToLower();
7314 met +=
7315 "<Image ID=\"Image:" + ib + "\">" +
7316 "<Pixels BigEndian=\"" + endian + "\" DimensionOrder= \"XYCZT\" ID= \"Pixels:0\" Interleaved=\"true\" " +
7317 "PhysicalSizeX=\"" + bis[px][s].PhysicalSizeX + "\" PhysicalSizeXUnit=\"m\" PhysicalSizeY=\"" + bis[px][s].PhysicalSizeY + "\" PhysicalSizeYUnit=\"m\" SignificantBits=\"" + bis[px][s].bitsPerPixel + "\" " +
7318 "SizeC = \"" + c + "\" SizeT = \"" + bis[px][s].SizeT + "\" SizeX =\"" + ss[px].Width +
7319 "\" SizeY= \"" + ss[px].Height + "\" SizeZ=\"" + bis[px][s].SizeZ;
7320 if (bis[px][s].bitsPerPixel > 8) met += "\" Type= \"uint16\">";
7321 else met += "\" Type= \"uint8\">";
7322 int i = 0;
7323 foreach (Channel ch in bis[px][s].Channels)
7324 {
7325 met += "<Channel ID=\"Channel:" + ib + ":" + i + "\" SamplesPerPixel=\"1\"></Channel>";
7326 i++;
7327 }
7328 met += "</Pixels></Image>";
7329 ib++;
7330 }
7331 met += "</OME>";
7332 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
7333 {
7334 PixelFormat pf = bis[px][0].Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
7335 Bitmap level = new Bitmap(ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, pf);
7336 int bands = GetBands(pf);
7337 if (bis[px][0].bitsPerPixel > 8)
7338 img = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(level.Data, (ulong)level.Length, level.Width, level.Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Ushort);
7339 else
7340 img = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(level.Data, (ulong)level.Length, level.Width, level.Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Uchar);
7341 int i = 0;
7342 foreach (BioImage b in bis[px])
7343 {
7344 AForge.Size si = ss[px];
7345 double xs = (-(min[px].X - bis[px][i].Volume.Location.X) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[0].VolumeWidth) * bis[px][i].SizeX;
7346 double ys = (-(min[px].Y - bis[px][i].Volume.Location.Y) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[0].VolumeHeight) * bis[px][i].SizeY;
7347 NetVips.Image tile;
7348 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
7349 tile = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Data, (ulong)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Length, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Width, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Ushort);
7350 else
7351 tile = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Data, (ulong)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Length, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Width, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Uchar);
7352 img = img.Insert(tile, (int)xs, (int)ys);
7353 i++;
7354 };
7355 using var mutated = img.Mutate(mutable =>
7356 {
7357 // Set the ImageDescription tag
7358 mutable.Set(GValue.GStrType, "image-description", met);
7359 mutable.Set(GValue.GIntType, "page-height", ss[last].Height);
7360 });
7361 if (bis[px][0].bitsPerPixel > 8)
7362 mutated.Tiffsave(file, compression, 1, Enums.ForeignTiffPredictor.None, null, true, ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, true, false, 16,
7363 Enums.ForeignTiffResunit.Cm, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeX, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeY, true, null, Enums.RegionShrink.Nearest,
7364 compressionLevel, true, Enums.ForeignDzDepth.One, true, false, null, null, ss[px].Height);
7365 else
7366 mutated.Tiffsave(file, compression, 1, Enums.ForeignTiffPredictor.None, null, true, ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, true, false, 8,
7367 Enums.ForeignTiffResunit.Cm, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeX, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeY, true, null, Enums.RegionShrink.Nearest,
7368 compressionLevel, true, Enums.ForeignDzDepth.One, true, false, null, null, ss[px].Height);
7369 s++;
7370 }
7371
7372 }
7373
7383 public void StackThreshold(bool bit16)
7384 {
7385 if (bit16)
7386 {
7387 for (int ch = 0; ch < Channels.Count; ch++)
7388 {
7389 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[ch].range.Length; i++)
7390 {
7391 Channels[ch].range[i].Min = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMin;
7392 Channels[ch].range[i].Max = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMax;
7393 }
7394 Channels[ch].BitsPerPixel = 16;
7395 }
7396 bitsPerPixel = 16;
7397 }
7398 else
7399 {
7400 for (int ch = 0; ch < Channels.Count; ch++)
7401 {
7402 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[ch].range.Length; i++)
7403 {
7404 Channels[ch].range[i].Min = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMin;
7405 Channels[ch].range[i].Max = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMax;
7406 }
7407 Channels[ch].BitsPerPixel = 8;
7408 }
7409 bitsPerPixel = 8;
7410 }
7411 }
7412
7421 public static int GetBitsPerPixel(int bt)
7422 {
7423 if (bt <= 255)
7424 return 8;
7425 if (bt <= 512)
7426 return 9;
7427 else if (bt <= 1023)
7428 return 10;
7429 else if (bt <= 2047)
7430 return 11;
7431 else if (bt <= 4095)
7432 return 12;
7433 else if (bt <= 8191)
7434 return 13;
7435 else if (bt <= 16383)
7436 return 14;
7437 else if (bt <= 32767)
7438 return 15;
7439 else
7440 return 16;
7441 }
7442
7450 public static int GetBitMaxValue(int bt)
7451 {
7452 if (bt == 8)
7453 return 255;
7454 if (bt == 9)
7455 return 512;
7456 else if (bt == 10)
7457 return 1023;
7458 else if (bt == 11)
7459 return 2047;
7460 else if (bt == 12)
7461 return 4095;
7462 else if (bt == 13)
7463 return 8191;
7464 else if (bt == 14)
7465 return 16383;
7466 else if (bt == 15)
7467 return 32767;
7468 else
7469 return 65535;
7470 }
7471
7484 public static PixelFormat GetPixelFormat(int rgbChannelCount, int bitsPerPixel)
7485 {
7486 if (bitsPerPixel == 8)
7487 {
7488 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
7489 return PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
7490 else if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
7491 return PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
7492 else if (rgbChannelCount == 4)
7493 return PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
7494 }
7495 else
7496 {
7497 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
7498 return PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
7499 if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
7500 return PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
7501 }
7502 throw new NotSupportedException("Not supported pixel format.");
7503 }
7517 public static PixelFormat GetPixelFormat(int rgbChannelCount, ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType px)
7518 {
7519 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
7520 {
7521 if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT8 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8)
7522 return PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
7523 else if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT16 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16)
7524 return PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
7525 }
7526 else
7527 {
7528 if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT8 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8)
7529 return PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
7530 else if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT16 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16)
7531 return PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
7532 }
7533 throw new NotSupportedException("Not supported pixel format.");
7534 }
7535
7551 public static BioImage[] OpenOMESeries(string file, bool tab, bool addToImages)
7552 {
7553 //We wait incase OME has not initialized yet.
7554 if (!initialized)
7555 do
7556 {
7557 Thread.Sleep(100);
7558 //Application.DoEvents();
7559 } while (!Initialized);
7560 var meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)new ServiceFactory().getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
7561 reader.setMetadataStore((MetadataStore)meta);
7562 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
7563 try
7564 {
7565 if (reader.getCurrentFile() != file)
7566 {
7567 status = "Opening OME Image.";
7568 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
7569 reader.setId(file);
7570 }
7571 }
7572 catch (Exception e)
7573 {
7574 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
7575 return null;
7576 }
7577
7578 bool tile = false;
7579 if (reader.getOptimalTileWidth() != reader.getSizeX())
7580 tile = true;
7581 int count = reader.getSeriesCount();
7582 BioImage[] bs = null;
7583 if (tile)
7584 {
7585 bs = new BioImage[1];
7586 bs[0] = OpenOME(file, 0, tab, addToImages, true, 0, 0, 1920, 1080);
7587 bs[0].isPyramidal = true;
7588 Images.AddImage(bs[0], tab);
7589 return bs;
7590 }
7591 else
7592 bs = new BioImage[count];
7593 reader.close();
7594 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
7595 {
7596 bs[i] = OpenOME(file, i, tab, addToImages, false, 0, 0, 0, 0);
7597 if (bs[i] == null)
7598 return null;
7599 }
7600 return bs;
7601 }
7602
7608 public static void OpenAsync(string file)
7609 {
7610 Thread t = new Thread(OpenThread);
7611 t.Name = file;
7612 t.Start();
7613 }
7614
7621 public static void OpenAsync(string[] files)
7622 {
7623 foreach (string file in files)
7624 {
7625 OpenAsync(file);
7626 }
7627 }
7628
7635 public static void AddAsync(string file)
7636 {
7637 Thread t = new Thread(OpenThread);
7638 t.Name = file;
7639 t.Start();
7640 }
7641
7647 public static void AddAsync(string[] files)
7648 {
7649 foreach (string file in files)
7650 {
7651 OpenAsync(file);
7652 }
7653 }
7654
7660 public static void Open(string file)
7661 {
7662 OpenFile(file);
7663 }
7664
7670 public static void Open(string[] files)
7671 {
7672 foreach (string file in files)
7673 {
7674 Open(file);
7675 }
7676 }
7677
7691 public static BioImage ImagesToStack(string[] files, bool tab)
7692 {
7693 BioImage[] bs = new BioImage[files.Length];
7694 int z = 0;
7695 int c = 0;
7696 int t = 0;
7697 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
7698 {
7699 string str = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(files[i]);
7700 str = str.Replace(".ome", "");
7701 string[] st = str.Split('_');
7702 if (st.Length > 3)
7703 {
7704 z = int.Parse(st[1].Replace("Z", ""));
7705 c = int.Parse(st[2].Replace("C", ""));
7706 t = int.Parse(st[3].Replace("T", ""));
7707 }
7708 if (i == 0)
7709 bs[0] = OpenOME(files[i], tab);
7710 else
7711 {
7712 bs[i] = OpenFile(files[i], 0, tab, false);
7713 }
7714 }
7715 BioImage b = BioImage.CopyInfo(bs[0], true, true);
7716 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
7717 {
7718 for (int bc = 0; bc < bs[i].Buffers.Count; bc++)
7719 {
7720 b.Buffers.Add(bs[i].Buffers[bc]);
7721 }
7722 }
7723 b.UpdateCoords(z + 1, c + 1, t + 1);
7724 b.Volume = new VolumeD(bs[0].Volume.Location, new Point3D(bs[0].SizeX * bs[0].PhysicalSizeX, bs[0].SizeY * bs[0].PhysicalSizeY, (z + 1) * bs[0].PhysicalSizeZ));
7725 return b;
7726 }
7734 public static void Update(BioImage b)
7735 {
7736 b = OpenFile(b.file);
7737 }
7740 public void Update()
7741 {
7742 Update(this);
7743 }
7744 /* Creating a list of strings called openfile. */
7745 private static List<string> openfile = new List<string>();
7749 private static void OpenThread()
7750 {
7751 OpenFile(Thread.CurrentThread.Name);
7752 }
7756 private static void AddThread()
7757 {
7758 OpenFile(Thread.CurrentThread.Name, false);
7759 }
7760
7769 public static void SaveAsync(string file, string ID)
7770 {
7771 saveid.Add(file);
7772 savefile.Add(ID);
7773 Thread t = new Thread(Save);
7774 t.Start();
7775 }
7783 public static void Save(string file, string ID)
7784 {
7785 SaveFile(file, ID);
7786 }
7787 private static List<string> savefile = new List<string>();
7788 private static List<string> saveid = new List<string>();
7793 private static void Save()
7794 {
7795 List<string> sts = new List<string>();
7796 for (int i = 0; i < savefile.Count; i++)
7797 {
7798 SaveAsync(savefile[i], saveid[i]);
7799 sts.Add(savefile[i]);
7800 }
7801 for (int i = 0; i < sts.Count; i++)
7802 {
7803 savefile.Remove(sts[i]);
7804 saveid.Remove(sts[i]);
7805 }
7806 }
7807
7808 private static List<string> openOMEfile = new List<string>();
7819 public static void OpenOMEThread(string[] file)
7820 {
7821 if (!OMESupport())
7822 return;
7823 openOMEfile.AddRange(file);
7824 Thread t = new Thread(OpenOME);
7825 t.Start();
7826 }
7835 private static void OpenOME()
7836 {
7837 if (!OMESupport())
7838 return;
7839 foreach (string f in openOMEfile)
7840 {
7841 OpenOME(f, true);
7842 }
7843 openOMEfile.Clear();
7844 }
7845
7859 public static void SaveOMEThread(string file, string ID)
7860 {
7861 if (!OMESupport())
7862 return;
7863 saveOMEID = ID;
7864 saveOMEfile = file;
7865 Thread t = new Thread(SaveOME);
7866 t.Start();
7867 }
7868 private static string saveOMEfile;
7869 private static string saveOMEID;
7870
7875 private static void SaveOME()
7876 {
7877 SaveOME(saveOMEfile, saveOMEID);
7878 }
7879 public static bool OmeSupport = false;
7880 static bool supportDialog = false;
7890 public static bool OMESupport()
7891 {
7892 bool isMacOS = RuntimeInformation.IsOSPlatform(OSPlatform.OSX);
7893 if (RuntimeInformation.OSArchitecture == Architecture.Arm64 && isMacOS)
7894 {
7895 OmeSupport = false;
7896 return false;
7897 }
7898 else
7899 {
7900 OmeSupport = true;
7901 return true;
7902 }
7903 }
7904 static NetVips.Image netim;
7915 public static bool VipsSupport(string file)
7916 {
7917 try
7918 {
7919 netim = NetVips.Image.Tiffload(file);
7920 Settings.AddSettings("VipsSupport", "true");
7921 }
7922 catch (Exception e)
7923 {
7924 Console.WriteLine(e.ToString());
7925 return false;
7926 }
7927 netim.Close();
7928 netim.Dispose();
7929 return true;
7930 }
7931 private static Stopwatch st = new Stopwatch();
7932 private static ServiceFactory factory;
7933 private static OMEXMLService service;
7934 private static ImageReader reader;
7935 private static ImageWriter writer;
7936 private loci.formats.meta.IMetadata meta;
7937
7938 //We use UNIX type line endings since they are supported by ImageJ & Bio.
7939 public const char NewLine = '\n';
7940 public const string columns = "ROIID,ROINAME,TYPE,ID,SHAPEINDEX,TEXT,S,C,Z,T,X,Y,W,H,POINTS,STROKECOLOR,STROKECOLORW,FILLCOLOR,FONTSIZE\n";
7941
7950 public static string OpenXML(string file)
7951 {
7952 if (!file.EndsWith(".tif"))
7953 return null;
7954 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
7955 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
7956 return f[0].ToString();
7957 }
7958
7959 public static List<ROI> OpenOMEROIs(string file, int series)
7960 {
7961 if (!OMESupport())
7962 return null;
7963 List<ROI> Annotations = new List<ROI>();
7964 // create OME-XML metadata store
7965 ServiceFactory factory = new ServiceFactory();
7966 OMEXMLService service = (OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService));
7967 loci.formats.ome.OMEXMLMetadata meta = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
7968 // create format reader
7969 ImageReader imageReader = new ImageReader();
7970 imageReader.setMetadataStore(meta);
7971 // initialize file
7972 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
7973 imageReader.setId(file);
7974 int imageCount = imageReader.getImageCount();
7975 int seriesCount = imageReader.getSeriesCount();
7976 double physicalSizeX = 0;
7977 double physicalSizeY = 0;
7978 double physicalSizeZ = 0;
7979 double stageSizeX = 0;
7980 double stageSizeY = 0;
7981 double stageSizeZ = 0;
7982 int SizeX = imageReader.getSizeX();
7983 int SizeY = imageReader.getSizeY();
7984 int SizeZ = imageReader.getSizeY();
7985 try
7986 {
7987 bool hasPhysical = false;
7988 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(series) != null)
7989 {
7990 physicalSizeX = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(series).value().doubleValue();
7991 hasPhysical = true;
7992 }
7993 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(series) != null)
7994 {
7995 physicalSizeY = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(series).value().doubleValue();
7996 }
7997 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(series) != null)
7998 {
7999 physicalSizeZ = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(series).value().doubleValue();
8000 }
8001 else
8002 {
8003 physicalSizeZ = 1;
8004 }
8005 if (meta.getStageLabelX(series) != null)
8006 stageSizeX = meta.getStageLabelX(series).value().doubleValue();
8007 if (meta.getStageLabelY(series) != null)
8008 stageSizeY = meta.getStageLabelY(series).value().doubleValue();
8009 if (meta.getStageLabelZ(series) != null)
8010 stageSizeZ = meta.getStageLabelZ(series).value().doubleValue();
8011 else
8012 stageSizeZ = 1;
8013 }
8014 catch (Exception e)
8015 {
8016 stageSizeX = 0;
8017 stageSizeY = 0;
8018 stageSizeZ = 1;
8019 }
8020 VolumeD volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(stageSizeX, stageSizeY, stageSizeZ), new Point3D(physicalSizeX * SizeX, physicalSizeY * SizeY, physicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
8021 int rc = meta.getROICount();
8022 for (int im = 0; im < rc; im++)
8023 {
8024 string roiID = meta.getROIID(im);
8025 string roiName = meta.getROIName(im);
8026 ZCT co = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
8027 int scount = 1;
8028 try
8029 {
8030 scount = meta.getShapeCount(im);
8031 }
8032 catch (Exception e)
8033 {
8034 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
8035 }
8036 for (int sc = 0; sc < scount; sc++)
8037 {
8038 string type = meta.getShapeType(im, sc);
8039 ROI an = new ROI();
8040 an.roiID = roiID;
8041 an.roiName = roiName;
8042 an.shapeIndex = sc;
8043 if (type == "Point")
8044 {
8045 an.type = ROI.Type.Point;
8046 an.id = meta.getPointID(im, sc);
8047 double dx = meta.getPointX(im, sc).doubleValue();
8048 double dy = meta.getPointY(im, sc).doubleValue();
8049 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(dx, dy), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
8050 an.coord = new ZCT();
8051 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPointTheZ(im, sc);
8052 if (nz != null)
8053 an.coord.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
8054 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPointTheC(im, sc);
8055 if (nc != null)
8056 an.coord.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
8057 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPointTheT(im, sc);
8058 if (nt != null)
8059 an.coord.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
8060 an.Text = meta.getPointText(im, sc);
8061 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
8062 if (fl != null)
8063 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
8064 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
8065 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
8066 if (col != null)
8067 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
8068 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPointStrokeWidth(im, sc);
8069 if (fw != null)
8070 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
8071 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
8072 if (colf != null)
8073 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
8074 }
8075 else
8076 if (type == "Line")
8077 {
8078 an.type = ROI.Type.Line;
8079 an.id = meta.getLineID(im, sc);
8080 double px1 = meta.getLineX1(im, sc).doubleValue();
8081 double py1 = meta.getLineY1(im, sc).doubleValue();
8082 double px2 = meta.getLineX2(im, sc).doubleValue();
8083 double py2 = meta.getLineY2(im, sc).doubleValue();
8084 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(px1, py1), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
8085 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(px2, py2), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
8086 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getLineTheZ(im, sc);
8087 if (nz != null)
8088 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
8089 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getLineTheC(im, sc);
8090 if (nc != null)
8091 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
8092 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getLineTheT(im, sc);
8093 if (nt != null)
8094 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
8095 an.coord = co;
8096 an.Text = meta.getLineText(im, sc);
8097 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getLineFontSize(im, sc);
8098 if (fl != null)
8099 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
8100 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
8101 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getLineStrokeColor(im, sc);
8102 if (col != null)
8103 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
8104 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getLineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
8105 if (fw != null)
8106 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
8107 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getLineFillColor(im, sc);
8108 if (colf != null)
8109 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
8110 }
8111 else
8112 if (type == "Rectangle")
8113 {
8114 an.type = ROI.Type.Rectangle;
8115 an.id = meta.getRectangleID(im, sc);
8116 double px = meta.getRectangleX(im, sc).doubleValue();
8117 double py = meta.getRectangleY(im, sc).doubleValue();
8118 double pw = meta.getRectangleWidth(im, sc).doubleValue();
8119 double ph = meta.getRectangleHeight(im, sc).doubleValue();
8120 an.Rect = ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, pw, ph), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
8121 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getRectangleTheZ(im, sc);
8122 if (nz != null)
8123 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
8124 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getRectangleTheC(im, sc);
8125 if (nc != null)
8126 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
8127 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getRectangleTheT(im, sc);
8128 if (nt != null)
8129 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
8130 an.coord = co;
8131
8132 an.Text = meta.getRectangleText(im, sc);
8133 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getRectangleFontSize(im, sc);
8134 if (fl != null)
8135 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
8136 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
8137 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getRectangleStrokeColor(im, sc);
8138 if (col != null)
8139 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
8140 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getRectangleStrokeWidth(im, sc);
8141 if (fw != null)
8142 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
8143 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getRectangleFillColor(im, sc);
8144 if (colf != null)
8145 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
8146 ome.xml.model.enums.FillRule fr = meta.getRectangleFillRule(im, sc);
8147 }
8148 else
8149 if (type == "Ellipse")
8150 {
8151 an.type = ROI.Type.Ellipse;
8152 an.id = meta.getEllipseID(im, sc);
8153 double px = meta.getEllipseX(im, sc).doubleValue();
8154 double py = meta.getEllipseY(im, sc).doubleValue();
8155 double ew = meta.getEllipseRadiusX(im, sc).doubleValue();
8156 double eh = meta.getEllipseRadiusY(im, sc).doubleValue();
8157 //We convert the ellipse radius to Rectangle
8158 double w = ew * 2;
8159 double h = eh * 2;
8160 double x = px - ew;
8161 double y = py - eh;
8162 an.Rect = ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, w, h), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
8163 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getEllipseTheZ(im, sc);
8164 if (nz != null)
8165 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
8166 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getEllipseTheC(im, sc);
8167 if (nc != null)
8168 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
8169 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getEllipseTheT(im, sc);
8170 if (nt != null)
8171 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
8172 an.coord = co;
8173 an.Text = meta.getEllipseText(im, sc);
8174 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getEllipseFontSize(im, sc);
8175 if (fl != null)
8176 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
8177 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
8178 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getEllipseStrokeColor(im, sc);
8179 if (col != null)
8180 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
8181 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getEllipseStrokeWidth(im, sc);
8182 if (fw != null)
8183 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
8184 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getEllipseFillColor(im, sc);
8185 if (colf != null)
8186 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
8187 }
8188 else
8189 if (type == "Polygon")
8190 {
8191 an.type = ROI.Type.Polygon;
8192 an.id = meta.getPolygonID(im, sc);
8193 an.closed = true;
8194 string pxs = meta.getPolygonPoints(im, sc);
8195 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
8196 pts = ToStageSpace(pts, physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
8197 if (pts.Length > 100)
8198 {
8199 an.type = ROI.Type.Freeform;
8200 }
8201 an.AddPoints(pts);
8202 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPolygonTheZ(im, sc);
8203 if (nz != null)
8204 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
8205 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPolygonTheC(im, sc);
8206 if (nc != null)
8207 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
8208 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPolygonTheT(im, sc);
8209 if (nt != null)
8210 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
8211 an.coord = co;
8212 an.Text = meta.getPolygonText(im, sc);
8213 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPolygonFontSize(im, sc);
8214 if (fl != null)
8215 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
8216 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
8217 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPolygonStrokeColor(im, sc);
8218 if (col != null)
8219 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
8220 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPolygonStrokeWidth(im, sc);
8221 if (fw != null)
8222 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
8223 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPolygonFillColor(im, sc);
8224 if (colf != null)
8225 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
8226 }
8227 else
8228 if (type == "Polyline")
8229 {
8230 an.type = ROI.Type.Polyline;
8231 an.id = meta.getPolylineID(im, sc);
8232 string pxs = meta.getPolylinePoints(im, sc);
8233 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
8234 for (int pi = 0; pi < pts.Length; pi++)
8235 {
8236 pts[pi] = ToStageSpace(pts[pi], physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
8237 }
8238 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(pxs));
8239 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPolylineTheZ(im, sc);
8240 if (nz != null)
8241 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
8242 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPolylineTheC(im, sc);
8243 if (nc != null)
8244 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
8245 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPolylineTheT(im, sc);
8246 if (nt != null)
8247 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
8248 an.coord = co;
8249 an.Text = meta.getPolylineText(im, sc);
8250 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPolylineFontSize(im, sc);
8251 if (fl != null)
8252 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
8253 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
8254 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPolylineStrokeColor(im, sc);
8255 if (col != null)
8256 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
8257 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPolylineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
8258 if (fw != null)
8259 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
8260 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPolylineFillColor(im, sc);
8261 if (colf != null)
8262 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
8263 }
8264 else
8265 if (type == "Label")
8266 {
8267 an.type = ROI.Type.Label;
8268 an.id = meta.getLabelID(im, sc);
8269
8270 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getLabelTheZ(im, sc);
8271 if (nz != null)
8272 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
8273 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getLabelTheC(im, sc);
8274 if (nc != null)
8275 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
8276 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getLabelTheT(im, sc);
8277 if (nt != null)
8278 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
8279 an.coord = co;
8280
8281 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getLabelFontSize(im, sc);
8282 if (fl != null)
8283 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
8284 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
8285 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getLabelStrokeColor(im, sc);
8286 if (col != null)
8287 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
8288 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getLabelStrokeWidth(im, sc);
8289 if (fw != null)
8290 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
8291 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getLabelFillColor(im, sc);
8292 if (colf != null)
8293 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
8294 PointD p = new PointD(meta.getLabelX(im, sc).doubleValue(), meta.getLabelY(im, sc).doubleValue());
8295 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(p, physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
8296 an.Text = meta.getLabelText(im, sc);
8297 }
8298 }
8299 }
8300
8301 imageReader.close();
8302 return Annotations;
8303 }
8304
8312 public static string ROIsToString(List<ROI> Annotations)
8313 {
8314 string s = "";
8315 for (int i = 0; i < Annotations.Count; i++)
8316 {
8317 s += ROIToString(Annotations[i]);
8318 }
8319 return s;
8320 }
8321
8332 public static string ROIToString(ROI an)
8333 {
8334 PointD[] points = an.GetPoints();
8335 string pts = "";
8336 for (int j = 0; j < points.Length; j++)
8337 {
8338 if (j == points.Length - 1)
8339 pts += points[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + points[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
8340 else
8341 pts += points[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + points[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + " ";
8342 }
8343 char sep = (char)34;
8344 string sColor = sep.ToString() + an.strokeColor.A.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.R.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.G.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.B.ToString() + sep.ToString();
8345 string bColor = sep.ToString() + an.fillColor.A.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.R.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.G.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.B.ToString() + sep.ToString();
8346
8347 string line = an.roiID + ',' + an.roiName + ',' + an.type.ToString() + ',' + an.id + ',' + an.shapeIndex.ToString() + ',' +
8348 an.Text + ',' + an.serie + ',' + an.coord.Z.ToString() + ',' + an.coord.C.ToString() + ',' + an.coord.T.ToString() + ',' + an.X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + an.Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' +
8349 an.W.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + an.H.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + sep.ToString() + pts + sep.ToString() + ',' + sColor + ',' + an.strokeWidth.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + bColor + ',' + an.fontSize.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + NewLine;
8350 return line;
8351 }
8362 public static ROI StringToROI(string sts)
8363 {
8364 //Works with either comma or tab separated values.
8365 if (sts.StartsWith("<?xml") || sts.StartsWith("{"))
8366 return null;
8367 ROI an = new ROI();
8368 string val = "";
8369 bool inSep = false;
8370 int col = 0;
8371 double x = 0;
8372 double y = 0;
8373 double w = 0;
8374 double h = 0;
8375 string line = sts;
8376 bool points = false;
8377 char sep = '"';
8378 for (int i = 0; i < line.Length; i++)
8379 {
8380 char c = line[i];
8381 if (c == sep)
8382 {
8383 if (!inSep)
8384 {
8385 inSep = true;
8386 }
8387 else
8388 inSep = false;
8389 continue;
8390 }
8391
8392 if ((c == ',' || c == '\t') && (!inSep || points))
8393 {
8394 //ROIID,ROINAME,TYPE,ID,SHAPEINDEX,TEXT,C,Z,T,X,Y,W,H,POINTS,STROKECOLOR,STROKECOLORW,FILLCOLOR,FONTSIZE
8395 if (col == 0)
8396 {
8397 //ROIID
8398 an.roiID = val;
8399 }
8400 else
8401 if (col == 1)
8402 {
8403 //ROINAME
8404 an.roiName = val;
8405 }
8406 else
8407 if (col == 2)
8408 {
8409 //TYPE
8410 an.type = (ROI.Type)Enum.Parse(typeof(ROI.Type), val);
8411 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Freeform || an.type == ROI.Type.Polygon)
8412 an.closed = true;
8413 }
8414 else
8415 if (col == 3)
8416 {
8417 //ID
8418 an.id = val;
8419 }
8420 else
8421 if (col == 4)
8422 {
8423 //SHAPEINDEX/
8424 an.shapeIndex = int.Parse(val);
8425 }
8426 else
8427 if (col == 5)
8428 {
8429 //TEXT/
8430 an.Text = val;
8431 }
8432 else
8433 if (col == 6)
8434 {
8435 an.serie = int.Parse(val);
8436 }
8437 else
8438 if (col == 7)
8439 {
8440 an.coord.Z = int.Parse(val);
8441 }
8442 else
8443 if (col == 8)
8444 {
8445 an.coord.C = int.Parse(val);
8446 }
8447 else
8448 if (col == 9)
8449 {
8450 an.coord.T = int.Parse(val);
8451 }
8452 else
8453 if (col == 10)
8454 {
8455 x = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
8456 }
8457 else
8458 if (col == 11)
8459 {
8460 y = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
8461 }
8462 else
8463 if (col == 12)
8464 {
8465 w = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
8466 }
8467 else
8468 if (col == 13)
8469 {
8470 h = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
8471 }
8472 else
8473 if (col == 14)
8474 {
8475 //POINTS
8476 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(val));
8477 points = false;
8478 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
8479 }
8480 else
8481 if (col == 15)
8482 {
8483 //STROKECOLOR
8484 string[] st = val.Split(',');
8485 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(int.Parse(st[0]), int.Parse(st[1]), int.Parse(st[2]), int.Parse(st[3]));
8486 }
8487 else
8488 if (col == 16)
8489 {
8490 //STROKECOLORW
8491 an.strokeWidth = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
8492 }
8493 else
8494 if (col == 17)
8495 {
8496 //FILLCOLOR
8497 string[] st = val.Split(',');
8498 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(int.Parse(st[0]), int.Parse(st[1]), int.Parse(st[2]), int.Parse(st[3]));
8499 }
8500 else
8501 if (col == 18)
8502 {
8503 //FONTSIZE
8504 double s = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
8505 an.fontSize = (float)s;
8506 an.family = "Times New Roman";
8507 }
8508 col++;
8509 val = "";
8510 }
8511 else
8512 val += c;
8513 }
8514
8515 return an;
8516 }
8517
8525 public static void ExportROIsCSV(string filename, List<ROI> Annotations)
8526 {
8527 string con = columns;
8528 con += ROIsToString(Annotations);
8529 File.WriteAllText(filename, con);
8530 }
8531
8541 public static List<ROI> ImportROIsCSV(string filename)
8542 {
8543 List<ROI> list = new List<ROI>();
8544 if (!File.Exists(filename))
8545 return list;
8546 string[] sts = File.ReadAllLines(filename);
8547 //We start reading from line 1.
8548 for (int i = 1; i < sts.Length; i++)
8549 {
8550 list.Add(StringToROI(sts[i]));
8551 }
8552 return list;
8553 }
8554
8566 public static void ExportROIFolder(string path, string filename)
8567 {
8568 if (!OMESupport())
8569 return;
8570 string[] fs = Directory.GetFiles(path);
8571 int i = 0;
8572 foreach (string f in fs)
8573 {
8574 List<ROI> annotations = OpenOMEROIs(f, 0);
8575 string ff = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(f);
8576 ExportROIsCSV(path + "//" + ff + "-" + i.ToString() + ".csv", annotations);
8577 i++;
8578 }
8579 }
8580
8581 private static BioImage bstats = null;
8582 private static bool update = false;
8583
8595 public static void AutoThreshold(BioImage b, bool updateImageStats)
8596 {
8597 bstats = b;
8598 Statistics statistics = null;
8599 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
8600 statistics = new Statistics(true);
8601 else
8602 statistics = new Statistics(false);
8603 for (int i = 0; i < b.Buffers.Count; i++)
8604 {
8605 if (b.Buffers[i].Stats == null || updateImageStats)
8606 b.Buffers[i].Stats = Statistics.FromBytes(b.Buffers[i]);
8607 if (b.Buffers[i].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
8608 statistics.AddStatistics(b.Buffers[i].Stats[0]);
8609 else
8610 {
8611 for (int r = 0; r < b.Buffers[i].RGBChannelsCount; r++)
8612 {
8613 statistics.AddStatistics(b.Buffers[i].Stats[r]);
8614 }
8615 }
8616 }
8617
8618 for (int c = 0; c < b.Channels.Count; c++)
8619 {
8620 Statistics[] sts = new Statistics[b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount];
8621 for (int i = 0; i < b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount; i++)
8622 {
8623 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
8624 {
8625 sts[i] = new Statistics(true);
8626 }
8627 else
8628 sts[i] = new Statistics(false);
8629 }
8630 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
8631 {
8632 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
8633 {
8634 int ind = b.Coords[z, c, t];
8635 if (b.Buffers[ind].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
8636 sts[0].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[0]);
8637 else
8638 {
8639 sts[0].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[0]);
8640 sts[1].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[1]);
8641 sts[2].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[2]);
8642 if (b.Buffers[ind].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
8643 sts[3].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[3]);
8644 }
8645 }
8646 }
8647 if (b.RGBChannelCount == 1)
8648 sts[0].MeanHistogram();
8649 else
8650 {
8651 sts[0].MeanHistogram();
8652 sts[1].MeanHistogram();
8653 sts[2].MeanHistogram();
8654 if (b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
8655 sts[3].MeanHistogram();
8656 }
8657 b.Channels[c].stats = sts;
8658 }
8659 statistics.MeanHistogram();
8660 b.statistics = statistics;
8661
8662 }
8663
8668 public static void AutoThreshold()
8669 {
8670 AutoThreshold(bstats, update);
8671 }
8672
8680 public static void AutoThresholdThread(BioImage b)
8681 {
8682 bstats = b;
8683 Thread th = new Thread(AutoThreshold);
8684 th.Start();
8685 }
8686
8705 public static int FindFocus(BioImage im, int Channel, int Time)
8706 {
8707 long mf = 0;
8708 int fr = 0;
8709 List<double> dt = new List<double>();
8710 ZCT c = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
8711 for (int i = 0; i < im.SizeZ; i++)
8712 {
8713 long f = CalculateFocusQuality(im.Buffers[im.Coords[i, Channel, Time]]);
8714 dt.Add(f);
8715 if (f > mf)
8716 {
8717 mf = f;
8718 fr = im.Coords[i, Channel, Time];
8719 }
8720 }
8721 return fr;
8722 }
8723
8732 static long CalculateFocusQuality(Bitmap b)
8733 {
8734 if (b.RGBChannelsCount == 1)
8735 {
8736 long sum = 0;
8737 long sumOfSquaresR = 0;
8738 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
8739 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
8740 {
8741 ColorS pixel = b.GetPixel(x, y);
8742 sum += pixel.R;
8743 sumOfSquaresR += pixel.R * pixel.R;
8744 }
8745 return sumOfSquaresR * b.SizeX * b.SizeY - sum * sum;
8746 }
8747 else
8748 {
8749 long sum = 0;
8750 long sumOfSquares = 0;
8751 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
8752 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
8753 {
8754 ColorS pixel = b.GetPixel(x, y);
8755 int p = (pixel.R + pixel.G + pixel.B) / 3;
8756 sum += p;
8757 sumOfSquares += p * p;
8758 }
8759 return sumOfSquares * b.SizeX * b.SizeY - sum * sum;
8760 }
8761 }
8762
8767 public void Dispose()
8768 {
8769 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
8770 {
8771 Buffers[i].Dispose();
8772 }
8773 for (int i = 0; i < Channels.Count; i++)
8774 {
8775 Channels[i].Dispose();
8776 }
8777 Images.RemoveImage(this);
8778 }
8779
8787 public override string ToString()
8788 {
8789 return Filename.ToString() + ", (" + Volume.Location.X + ", " + Volume.Location.Y + ", " + Volume.Location.Z + ")";
8790 }
8791
8792
8804 public static BioImage operator /(BioImage a, float b)
8805 {
8806 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8807 {
8808 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] / b;
8809 }
8810 return a;
8811 }
8812
8813
8825 public static BioImage operator +(BioImage a, float b)
8826 {
8827 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8828 {
8829 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] + b;
8830 }
8831 return a;
8832 }
8844 public static BioImage operator -(BioImage a, float b)
8845 {
8846 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8847 {
8848 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] - b;
8849 }
8850 return a;
8851 }
8852
8866 public static BioImage operator /(BioImage a, ColorS b)
8867 {
8868 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8869 {
8870 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] / b;
8871 }
8872 return a;
8873 }
8874
8888 public static BioImage operator *(BioImage a, ColorS b)
8889 {
8890 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8891 {
8892 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] * b;
8893 }
8894 return a;
8895 }
8896
8910 public static BioImage operator +(BioImage a, ColorS b)
8911 {
8912 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8913 {
8914 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] + b;
8915 }
8916 return a;
8917 }
8918
8931 public static BioImage operator -(BioImage a, ColorS b)
8932 {
8933 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8934 {
8935 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] - b;
8936 }
8937 return a;
8938 }
8939 }
